Shark Tale is a game based on the Dreamworks animated film. You play as Oscar the speedy, talkative, little fish, who finds himself becoming a hero. The game takes place in over 14 missions, in a variety of over 6 locations.
Shark Tale delivers a variety of gameplay experience.You explore Reef City in full 3D with locations from the movie and also new areas. The player is allowed to sidetrack and interact with the urban environment. The gameplay includes races and chases in which you dodge obstacles such as buildings and bridges. You will have to outrun foes such as sharks, while smashing boxes and such for power-ups and items. There are also dance elements to the game, where you dance to hip hop moves. You have to mix and match moves to the vibe.

locale.title: Gang de Requins
locale.synopsis: Plongez dans l'univers sous-marin du film éponyme, et incarnez Oscar, un petit poisson qui raconte beaucoup de bobards, et qui va finir par le regretter... Le jeu vous propose de nombreuses missions directement tirées du long-métrage pour devenir le héros de Récif City !

locale.title: Garfield and His Nine Lives
locale.synopsis: After eating another huge meal, Garfield is ready for a long nap with a full belly. As he falls asleep, he starts having some very strange dreams as a result of overeating right before his nap. Each dream is crazier than the last. The player's objective is to help Garfield through this nightmare adventure by guiding him safely through each of his nine lives.

locale.title: Garfield et ses Neuf Vies
locale.synopsis: Il est bien connu qu'un chat possède neuf vies et il en va de même pour Garfield, malgré sa paresse légendaire. Garfield et ses Neuf Vies sur GBA est un jeu d'action mettant en scène le matou roux ainsi que Jon, Odie, Arlène et Brick. Traversez neuf niveaux à travers les rêves et cauchemars du chat et faites preuve d'adresse, de rapidité et de ruses pour éviter les obstacles et ennemis les plus délirants.

game.name: Garfield - A La Recherche De Pooky

locale.title: Garfield: The Search for Pooky
locale.synopsis:
Garï¬eld has lost his favorite Pooky Bear...Young players must help Garï¬eld in his search for Pooky. The game takes Garï¬eld through his best known haunts interacting with his favorite characters e.g. Jon, Odie and Arlene to name but a few. No cat's tale would be complete without the usual encounters such as: dogs, mice, spiders & scraps of food.
True to his character Garï¬eld can not resist eating as much as possible throughout the game but food equals' energy & energy enables this fat cat to perform extraordinary moves throughout his adventures in the game. At the same time all sorts of obstacles will have to be avoided, such as web spinning spiders, happy Odie rushing towards Garï¬eld, bad food, annoying kids, angry pit-bulls and more.

Garfield : A la Recherche de Pooky est un jeu plates-formes sur Gameboy Advance. L'ours en peluche adoré du chat le plus paresseux du monde a disparu. Garfield apprend rapidement qu'il a été enlevé par une bande de souris mafieuse. Aidez-le dans ses aventures, et tentez de sauver sa peluche Pooky avant qu'il ne soit trop tard.

locale.title: Gauntlet : Dark Legacy
locale.synopsis: Following the arcade and console inspired time honored traditions of the genre, Gauntlet Dark Legacy puts players in a large, immersive world in which up to four players can go on a hack n slash adventure. Using eight characters ranging from Warriors (you know, the kind that NEEDS FOOD) to Wizards the game lets players destroy almost anything that moves with a wide variety of weapon and devastating magic.

Gauntlet : Dark Legacy sur GameBoy Advance. Vous devez traverser une multitude de mondes en vous y téléportant et revenir avec toutes sortes d'objets magiques. Vous avez le choix entre différents personnages qui disposent de caractéristiques variées. Plus vous tuez de monstres, plus vous gagnez de l'expérience et des points de vie.

game.name: Gegege No Kitarou - Kikiippatsu! Youkai Rettou

locale.title: Gegege no Kitarou - Kikiippatsu! Youkai Rettou
Gegege no Kitarou : Kikiippatsu! Youkai Rettou
Gekido Advance - Kintaro's Revenge
locale.synopsis:
It's Time to Fight!
A year has passed since the epic battle that decided the fate of mankind and claimed the life of the beloved Angela. Dark omens once again tell of the return of an evil presence. Ushi is the last remaining master of the ancient art of Shin-Ken, and he calls upon Tetsuo, his disciple and adopted son, to investigate some strange happenings in a faraway farming village outside the city.

locale.title: Gem Smashers
locale.synopsis: Gem Smashers is an action puzzle game where the object is to free trapped animals by smashing colored gems. Players control one of three prehistoric critters in their quest to eliminate gems of the same color before time expires. Yet before players can smash the gems, they must first transform their character into the appropriate color by finding the correct power-up. Only then will players be able to eliminate all the gems and uncover the hidden exit where the imprisoned animals can escape. Game modes include Story, Arcade, and Vs. Battle, with three additional variants unlocked during the course of play.

Gem Smashers est un puzzle-game sur Gameboy Advance dans lequel vous devez faire disparaître de l'écran des pierres précieuses en les rassemblant par couleur. La cartouche propose plus de 150 niveaux différents à parcourir en solo mais aussi un mode bataille en multijoueur.

locale.title: GEMini
locale.synopsis: Bejeweled style match-3 for the GameBoy Advance.
Un jeu match-3 dans la lignée de Bejeweled, pour GameBoy Advance.
Jogo de quebra-cabeça match-3 estilo Bejeweled.

game.name: Genseishin Justirisers - Souchaku! Chikyuu No Senshi-tachi

locale.title: Genseishin Justirisers - Souchaku! Chikyuu no Sens
Genseishin Justirisers : Souchaku! Hoshi no Senshi-tachi

game.name: Gensou Maden Saiyuuki - Hangyaku No Toushin-taishi

locale.title: Gensou Maden Saiyuuki - Hangyaku no Toushin-taishi
Gensou Maden Saiyuuki : Hangyaku no Toushin-taishi
Gensou Suikoden - Card Stories
locale.synopsis:
GensÅ Suikoden Card Stories (Japanese: å¹»æ³æ°´æ»¸ä¼ã«ã¼ãã¹ãã¼ãªã¼ãº?) is a spin-off title of the Suikoden franchise by Konami which includes both a Game Boy Advance game and a physical collectible card game. Both were released in the fall of 2001 in Japan, neither have been translated into other languages.
Unlike other areas of the Suikoden franchise, in which the storyline is a major element of gameplay, Card Stories focuses mainly on the card battles themselves and less on the plot.
Most of the cards feature characters who appear in both Suikoden and Suikoden II of Konami's role-playing video game series. Several cards also feature characters who would later go on to appear in Suikoden III.
The GBA game retells the story of Suikoden II with a few changes to how they transpire.

locale.title: Curious George
locale.synopsis: Meet and greet your favorite movie characters in this adventure game based on the Universal Pictures and Imagine Entertainment animated feature film, Curious George. When the Man with the Yellow Hat travels to Africa in search of a lost artifact, he returns with some unexpected cargo -- a curious little primate named George. Guide George as he runs, jumps, climbs and swings his way through a variety of adventure-packed levels from the jungle to the Big City, where his spunky and fun-loving nature endears him to new friends and lands him in a series of mis-adventures. Make monkey business as you help George and his friends discover the one item special enough to save the museum from the bulldozer. Loads of bonus content and challenging mini-games keep players busy long after the main story is done.

locale.title: Georges le Petit Curieux
locale.synopsis: Georges le Petit Curieux est un jeu de plates-formes. Vous y incarnez Georges, un singe prêt à tout pour aider son ami Ted à protéger son musée archéologique. Il doit ainsi dérober une idole géante d'une tribu aborigène pour sauver le musée d'une destruction imminente. Jungle, chantier, immeuble, musée, un large panel de décors et de niveaux vous attendent.

game.name: Get Ride! Amdriver - Senkou No Hero Tanjou!

locale.title: Get Ride! Amdriver - Senkou no Hero Tanjou!
Get Ride! Amdriver : Senkou no Hero Tanjou!

game.name: Get Ride! Amdriver Shuggeki! Battle Party

locale.title: Get Ride! Amdriver Shuggeki! Battle Party
Get Ride! Amdriver : Shutsugeki! Battle Party
Ghost Rider
locale.synopsis:
In this sequel to the movie, Mephisto requests Johnny Blaze (The Ghost Rider) to stop the plan to revive Blackheart (son of Mephisto) on Earth which can cause The Apocalypse. This may cause Hell to be taken away from Mephisto because it breaks the no demons on Earth rule given by the Angels. Ghost Rider, although going against Mephisto's will, agrees to stop this plan only to save the woman he loves, Roxanne Simpson.
The player as The Ghost Rider must stop this plan by battling many demons on Earth while on foot with upgradeable attacks done with fists and the Hell chain. The player must also race across miles of land on the Hell Cycle killing the demons on their various transportation ways with the hell chain and fireballs.

Ghost Rider est un jeu d'action et de courses sur Gameboy Advance. Le titre reprend l'univers du film où vous incarnez Johnny Blaze, un cascadeur qui a vendu son âme au diable pour sauver son père victime d'un accident. Le titre est divisé en plusieurs chapitres, dans lesquels il faut alterner phases d'action et phases de courses à moto.

locale.title: Ghost Trap
locale.synopsis: Ghost Trap is a survival horror, similar in style, camera's views and controls to early Resident Evil games. The player controls a scientist, being with friends in a haunted house. He comes between different rooms, collects items and avoids ghosts. He has no gun, the only weapons are traps that are left on the ground. When ghost enters the trap, the player can destroy it.

locale.title: Global Star - Sudoku Fever
locale.synopsis: Sudoku is the puzzle phenomenon from Japan, a game that looks like a math problem, but is in fact a twisting puzzler. The rules are simple: start with a grid consisting of nine three-by-three squares in which some of the numbers are already supplied. Fill in the blank squares so that each column, row, and three-by-three grid contains a number from 1 to 9 with none repeated.

game.name: Go! Go! Beckham! - Adventure On Soccer Island

locale.title: Go! Go! Beckham! : Adventure on Soccer Island
locale.synopsis: Go! Go! Beckham! Adventure on Soccer Island is an Action game, developed by Denki and published by Rage Software, which was released in Europe in 2002.

Go! Go! Beckham! : Adventure on Soccer Island est un jeu d'aventure plates-formes sorti sur Gameboy Advance. Incarnez le célèbre joueur David Beckham dans une version miniaturisée et cartoonisée pour l'occasion, qui a pour mission de renverser un tyran qui tyrannise sur son île tyrannique.

locale.title: Godzilla : Domination !
locale.synopsis:
Six monsters battle through seven destructive locations in an attempt to prove themselves as the greatest monster to walk the Earth. Each monster has a personal set of punches, kicks and special moves to Dominate over the competition.
Game features include 7 monsters each with their own home arena and special moves, power-ups and weapons revealed by destroyings buildings, five different modes including link mode to play against four friends, and customized fights for unlimited styles of gameplay.

Godzilla : Domination ! est un jeu de combat sorti sur Gameboy Advance. Préparez-vous à raser des régions entières sous le feulement de vos pieds gigantesques. En effet, Godzilla a ramené tous ses potes hauts de dizaines de mètres pour joyeusement se mettre sur la tronche dans de grandes arènes où les bonus pullulent.

locale.title: Goemon - New Age Shutsudou!
locale.synopsis: Goemon: New Age Shutsudou! gives the franchise a facelift, putting Goemon and his friends in a futuristic rendition of Japan, fending off a supernatural force threatening the city.

locale.title: Golden Nugget Casino
locale.synopsis: Experience the thrill of high stakes gambling in the Golden Nugget Casino with classic games like Blackjack, Craps and Roulette, plus Slots and Video Poker. When you're down on your luck, visit the ATM then hit the tables for more action. With Golden Nugget Casino, you can be a high roller and leave your wallet at home. Master a variety of card and table games plus slots and video poker and pull the lever on slot machine games including Halloween Spooky and Wild West. Challenge yourself on Video Poker games like Deuces Wild, Joker's Wild, Jacks or Better and Tens or Better. Get a loan from the cashier of up to $2,000 at a time, up to a maximum of $10,000. Password system allows you to enter a password and resume play with a previously saved bank account balance.

locale.title: Golden Sun
locale.synopsis: Evil is slowly covering the world. Forces of darkness are pursuing the lost art of Alchemy, and as they draw ever closer to their foul purpose, mankind hangs in the balance. You and your companions are the last hope: armed with noble weapons, magical Psynergy, and a host of elemental creatures, you must find a way to stem the evil tide.

En una época de oscuridad, una aventura épica comienza...La maldad se está apoderando lentamente del mundo. Las fuerzas de la oscuridad están tras el arte olvidado de la Alquimia y, a medida que se acercan a su terrible propósito, el futuro de la Humanidad pende de un hilo. Tus compañeros y tú sois la unica esperanza. Armados con nobles armas, poderes mágicos llamados Psinergías y una multitud de criaturas elementales, debeis encontrar la forma de detener el curso de los acontecimientos. Se acabó tu vida cotidiana. ¡Ahora un Sol Dorado brilla sobre ti y amplía tus horizontes!

Golden Sun est un jeu de rôle sur Gameboy Advance. A l'aide de vos compagnons, vous devrez tenter d'arrêter les forces du mal qui rongent ce monde. Ces dernières tentent de trouver l'alchimie, une science disparue terriblement puissante.

Ein episches Abenteuer erhebt sich aus der Dunkelheit! Die Mächte der Finsternis suchen nach der verlorenen Kunst der Alchemie. Langsam kommen sie ihrem Ziel näher und die Zukunft der Menschheit liegt im Unklaren. Du und deine Freunde seid die letzte Hoffnung! Ausgestattet mit mächtigen Waffen, einem Arsenal an magischen Formeln und mit der Hilfe elementarer Kreaturen müsst ihr einen Weg finden, das drohenden Unheil von der Welt abzuwenden!

locale.title: Golden Sun: The Lost Age
locale.synopsis: The story of Golden Sun: The Lost Age picks up right near the end of the first game. Golden Sun veterans will be surprised to learn that The Lost Age is played from the point of view of the party being chased as they try to light the remaining two lighthouses, which will unlock the power of alchemy for the world--or will it instead unlock the world's destruction?

locale.title: Golden Sun : L'Âge Perdu
locale.synopsis: Golden Sun : L'Age Perdu est un jeu de rôle sorti sur Gameboy Advance. Second volet de la saga Golden Sun, cet opus vous permet de récupérer l'équipe du premier jeu pour terminer celui-ci et aussi d'affronter vos amis en multijoueur grâce au câble link.

locale.title: Golden Sun : Die Vergessene Epoche
locale.synopsis: Eine neue Epoche dämmert...und die Helden aus Golden Sun versinken in den Strudeln der Vergangenheit. Die Welt steht am Rande eines Schlundes unendlicher Dunkelheit. Eine neue Gruppe von Abenteurer ist vielleicht ihre allerletzte Hoffnung, vielleicht aber auch ihr Untergang. Verfolgt von den Helden aus dem ersten Golden Sun-Epos müssen sie sich beeilen, ihr Schicksal zu erfüllen, bevor die Welt dem namenlosen Vergessen anheim fällt.

locale.title: Gradius Galaxies
locale.synopsis: Gradius Galaxies' side-scrolling action hearkens back to the early days of arcade shoot-'em-ups - wave after wave of enemies hound you through 8 all new stages, and colossal end bosses fill the screen with a constellation of heavy fire. Strap yourself in tight behind the controls of the Vic Viper, a fast and deadly attack ship. Choose the weapons configuration, including twin cannons, photon missiles, and beam lasers, and enhance those weapons during gameplay by grabbing power ups.

Gradius Advance est un shoot'em up sur Gameboy Advance. Le but du titre est de vous frayer un chemin à travers une horde de vaisseaux ennemis tout au long des huit niveaux que comporte le jeu. Choisissez le niveau de difficulté à votre guise et bonne navigation !

locale.title: Grand Theft Auto
locale.synopsis: The Grand Theft Auto series finally makes its way to the Game Boy Advance. You play as a member of the Mob looking for a way out of your vicious lifestyle. The murder of your mentor, however, sets you off on a search for those responsible. To track down the killers, you must complete all-new missions while avoiding every cop in the city. As in previous installments in the Grand Theft Auto series, you can jack cars, explore the city, and wield a variety of weapons.

Grand Theft Auto est un jeu d'action sur Gameboy Advance dans lequel vous incarnez un gangster traqué par la police et par nombre d'autres truands de la ville. Votre ami Vinnie a été tué alors qu'il avait avec lui tout l'argent vous permettant de quitter la sombre ville de Liberty City en toute tranquillité. Retrouvez les assassins, et vengez votre compagnon. Vous n'êtes pas encore près d'arrêter vos méfaits...

game.name: Green Eggs And Ham By Dr. Seuss

locale.title: Green Eggs and Ham by Dr. Seuss
locale.synopsis: Do you like Green Eggs and Ham? That is the question asked by Sam I am, as he leads you through the many zany Seussian worlds in search of this somewhat odd delicacy. "Would you? Could you? In a car? On a boat? On a train? In a tree?" Use the stylized 3-dimensional game board to lead you from adventure to adventure, collecting green eggs and ham as you go. "I do so like green eggs and ham. Thank you! Thank you. Sam I am."

locale.title: Greg Hastings' Tournament Paintball Max'd
locale.synopsis: Paintball professional Greg Hasting's returns in Activision's GREG HASTING'S TOURNAMENT PAINTBALL MAX'D for the Game Boy Advance, the sequel to GREG HASTING'S TOURNAMENT PAINTBALL. The second game in the series includes a number of paintball pros, different modes, and a level editor. Like the previous game, GREG HASTING'S TOURNAMENT PAINTBALL MAX'D includes a number of different gameplay modes. Players work as part of a team (either AI-controlled or with friends) to take down the opposing team in a number of different environments. The single-player campaign mode takes it a step further, putting players in charge of forming a paintball team from a number of unknowns and turning them into paintball champions. Along the way, players will face off against big-name paintball players, including Nicky Cuba, Matt Marshall, Peter Utsching, and, eventually, Greg Hasting himself. Between tournaments, players can purchase new equipment for their characters and spend accumulated skill points to increase their statistics. The biggest addition to MAX'D is the level editor. This allows gamers to create their own paintball arenas ranging from small to large, cluttered to open. Players can add bunkers, rocks, trees, picnic tables, and many other items to the field. Each map can be shared online or played with computer-controlled opponents. The ability to create and share custom levels online will keep players coming back to GREG HASTING'S TOURNAMENT PAINTBALL MAX'D for some time. It provides gamers with everything that makes paintball great without worrying about getting a ball of paint all over their faces.

locale.title: Gremlins : Stripe vs Gizmo
locale.synopsis: In Gizmo's story, the cute Mogwai has to prevent Stripe from ruining Christmas for Kingston Falls by retrieving all the presents that Stripe has stolen. Gizmo uses a flashlight to kill gremlins after rolling into a ball and weakening the gremlins. He also must destroy any gremlins that get in his way. In Stripe's story, he comes up with a scheme to destroy his mortal enemy Gizmo and destroy mogwais. If playing as Gizmo, all the enemies are generic gremlins. If playing as Stripe, the player will instead fight mogwais.

Gremlins : Stripe vs Gizmo est un jeu d'action/plates-forme sorti sur Gameboy Advance. Plongez dans l'univers impitoyable des Gremlins. Pour une fois vous jouez les méchants qui doivent arrêter les Mogwai et leurs terrifiants plans à la bonté sirupeuse.

game.name: Groove Adventure Rave - Hikari To Yami No Daikessen

locale.title: Groove Adventure Rave - Hikari to Yami no Daikesse
Groove Adventure Rave : Hikari to Yami no Daikessen

game.name: Groove Adventure Rave - Hikari To Yami No Daikessen 2

locale.title: Groove Adventure Rave - Hikari to Yami no Daikesse
Groove Adventure Rave : Hikari to Yami no Daikessen 2
GT Advance 2 Rally Racing
locale.synopsis:
More arcade then simulation. GT Advance 2 offers 15 rally cars, which you can tune, upgrade and modify between races, to be raced on 42 different tracks with varying weather conditions and road surfaces (tarmac, dirt, etc.) plus long corners, perfect for power sliding.
By winning each race you unlock new cars to select, and upgrades to previous cars. Along with the championship mode, you can also race against the clock or a friend, and the ability to race for licenses by completing certain areas of tracks.

Más arcade que simulador GT Advance 2 ofrece 15 coches de rally los cuales puedes tunear, mejorar y modificar entre carreras. Conducirás en 42 circuitos diferentes con condiciones climatológicas diversas y tipos de carretera (barro, pista, etc) que junto con largas curvas son perfectas para deslizar. Ganando cualquier carrera desbloqueas nuevos coches para seleccionar y mejoras de los coches anteriores. Durante el modo campeonato podrás competir contra el reloj o un amigo pudiendo correr para ganar títulos completando ciertas pistas.

GT Advance 2 Rally Racing est un jeu de courses sorti sur Gameboy Advance. Mettez-vous au volant de bolides et parcourez de célèbres pistes de rallyes. Entraînez-vous pour tenter de battre vos propres records.

locale.title: GT Advance 3 - Pro Concept Racing
locale.synopsis: Get behind the wheel of the world's top rally cars as you span the globe in quest of a championship. Listen to your navigator as he helps you through more than 40 unique tracks spanning different weather and terrain through 14 grueling stages. Fly over jumps or skid around obstacles on your way to the top of the rally racing circut. Link up with a friend using the GBA link cable for amazing head-to-head competition or watch the action again using the replay mode.

Conocido en Japón como Advance GTA 2, y desarrollado por una compañía afincada en Yokohama especializada en títulos de coches, MTO, GT Advance 3 es un título que entusiasmará a todos los amantes de coches que no pueden resistir estar sin su ración aún cuando no estén ante su sistema casero.

locale.title: GT Advance : Championship Racing
locale.synopsis: A Racing Simulation using "real world" vehicles, mostly Japanese models. similar to the PlayStation Gran Turismo series. Players begin with a single vehicle selected from a range of fairly standard models, that car is entered into a series of races with cash prizes and prize money can be used to purchase additional vehicles or upgrade an existing one.

A vos marques ! Prêt ! Partez ! GT Advance Championship Racing est un jeu de courses sur Gameboy Advance. Choisissez votre voiture parmi 45 modèles authentiques et faites ronfler le moteur. Le mode championnat vous permet de concourir sur 32 circuits différents. De plus, vous avez la possibilité d'améliorer les performances de votre bolide avec 9 catégories de pièces à changer.

locale.title: GT Racers
locale.synopsis: GT Racers is a Racing game, developed by Alten8 and published by Liquid Games, which was released in Europe in 2006.

locale.title: Guilty Gear X : Advance Edition
locale.synopsis:
Based on the original arcade game, it adds tag, survival, training, and 3-on-3 game modes. Game controls can be set to 3 or 4-button mode.
It includes all fighters in arcade game except Robo-Ky. However, Ky Kiske's extra version uses Robo-Ky's "beta" moveset..
The 3-mode character selection from X Plus is included with this release. Characters can be edited to any colours, but do not inherit black select and gold select powers as in the X Plus game.

Guilty Gear X sur Gameboy Advance est un jeu de combat en 2D. Il reste un Gear (une arme biologique) sur Terre et le gouvernement propose un beau paquet à celui qui l'éliminera. 14 volontaires se présentent, tous très différents dans leur style de combat. A vous de jouer. Remplissez votre jauge de tension et lâchez l'attaque ultime au moment opportun.

locale.title: Gumby vs. the Astrobots
locale.synopsis:
Professor Kapp has accidentally invented a machine that can control Gumby's friends, the Astrobots. Minutes after its creation, it naturally gets stolen by the mischievous Blockheads! Who knows what sort of trouble they'll get up to with it!
Gumby vs. the Astrobots is a side-scrolling platform game where you play as Gumby. Explore different books to rescue your friends, such as Pokey, Prickle and Goo, who have all been kidnapped by the Astrobots. Gumby can use his abilities to transform into a clay ball, a minecart, a helicopter and more as he explores various different books to rescue his friends. Throughout each world are ice-creams, Gumby's favourite treat, to collect.

Gumby vs. the Astrobots sur GameBoy Advance est un jeu d'aventure dans lequel vous incarnez l'héroïque Gumby. Le titre vous plonge dans un périlleux voyage pour sauver vos amis. Vous devez utiliser les capacités uniques de Gumby pour venir à bout des Astrobots.

locale.title: Gunstar Super Heroes
locale.synopsis:
Your enemies intend to use a powerful crystal to resurrect the devastating God of Ruin and it's up to the Gunstar Heroes, Blue and Red to stop them! Developed by critically acclaimed developer, Treasure, this fast-paced action game will push your Game Boy Advance to the limits!
-Blast your way through six intense levels and defeat an evil empire -Choose your hero: play as Red or Blue to combat powerful enemies and gigantic bosses -Amazing visuals create an unforgettable gaming experience

Gunstar Future Heroes sur GBA est un jeu d'action ultra-rapide dans lequel votre but est de sauver le monde d'un grand méchant pas beau que vos ennemis veulent ramener à la vie grâce à un cristal magique. Incarnez Rouge ou Bleu, deux membres de Gunstars et frayez-vous un passage dans les niveaux en nettoyant le chemin avec vos puissantes armes.

locale.title: Guy Roux Manager 2002
locale.synopsis: Total Soccer Manager is a Sports game, developed by Exient Entertainment and published by Ubisoft, which was released in Europe in 2001.

Guy Roux Manager 2002 est un jeu de gestion sorti sur Gameboy Advance. Si le monde du football vous passionne mais que jouer des matches n'est pas votre fort, alors ce jeu vous permettra quand même de vous adonner à votre passion dans les coulisses en gérant transferts et entraînements d'une équipe entière.

locale.title: Gyakuten Saiban
locale.synopsis:
The player is Ryuuichi Naruhodou, assigned to his first case. The player will have to press the witnesses for more information, carefully examine the evidences, and have the gut to yell "Objection!" to successfully defend their defendant.
There are four cases in total. In each case, Ryuuichi has to follow the story carefully, examine every scene carefully, and find all evidences to win the court battles!

Phoenix Wright : Ace Attorney sur GBA est le premier volet des aventures judiciaires du héros à la coiffure hérissée. Incarnez un novice du barreau lors de quatre enquêtes qui alternent des phases d'investigation sur le terrain et les phases de tribunal. Il va falloir y défendre votre bout de gras en décelant les failles dans les témoignages adverses et ainsi obtenir le verdict désiré à l'issue du jugement. Mais prenez garde à l'accusation, prête à tout pour gagner.

locale.title: Gyakuten Saiban 2
locale.synopsis:
A sequel to Gyakuten Saiban, this second game in the series continues from where the first game left off, one year later. The basic gaming mechanics are still the same, featuring interesting courtroom battles and detective elements of finding/examining the evidence. However, instead of 5 health points for each courtroom scene, there is a health meter. The health meter is also used for Psycho Locks, a new feature in this game.
Characters from the previous chapter have returned, plus a host of all new characters. There are 4 cases in the whole game, each longer than the previous.

Phoenix Wright : Ace Attorney : Justice for All vous remet dans la peau de Phoenix Wright, avocat de la défense spécialisé dans les causes perdues. Ce titre orienté aventure sur GBA est le deuxième volet de la série sur la console portable de Nintendo. Visiblement indépendantes, les quatre affaires proposées pourraient avoir un lien commun...

locale.title: Gyakuten Saiban 3
locale.synopsis:
The third game in the Gyakuten Saiban series. This time around, the gameplay still follows that of the previous two games, featuring Ryuuichi Naruhodou's third year as a lawyer. The player has to find/examine evidences, press witnesses, and find the true murderers in order to prove the innocence of his defendant.
There are 5 cases in total. In some cases, the player does not control Ryuuichi, but rather some other characters for the courtroom battles. The story is also more intact than the previous games, and it also features a whole new cast of interesting characters.

Ce troisième épisode de la série Phoenix Wright se compose de cinq nouveaux procès qu'il faut remporter en prouvant l'innocence de nos clients. En tant qu'avocat de la défense, Phoenix Wright doit interroger les témoins et enquêter sur le terrain pour trouver les contradictions et les indices qui le conduiront à la vérité. Cet épisode réserve plusieurs surprises et clôt l'intrigue principale amorcée dans le premier volet.

game.name: Hagane No Renkinjutsushi - Meisou No Rondo

locale.title: Hagane no Renkinjutsushi - Meisou no Rondo
locale.synopsis: This RPG basically follows the anime storyline and features an alchemy card system. In it, you make use of "Material Cards" which you can either use on their own or merge them together to form greater cards. You can then use them in battle to create powerful weapons or moves to defeat your enemies.

locale.title: Hagane no Renkinjutsushi : Meisou no Rondo

game.name: Hagane No Renkinjutsushi - Omoide No Sonata

locale.title: Hagane no Renkinjutsushi - Omoide no Sonata
Hagane no Renkinjutsushi : Omoide no Sonata
Hajime no Ippo - The Fighting!
locale.synopsis: Boxing game based on the Japanese anime of the same name.

locale.title: Hamtaro : Ham-Ham Games
locale.synopsis: Put your athletic skills to the test with Hamtaro and his Ham-Ham pals as they compete in the 2004 Ham-Ham Games. You must guide different Ham-Hams to victory in 15 sporting events; including archery, sprinting, sailing, swimming, and more. Root for your favorite Hamtaro characters as they go head-to-head with new Ham-Hams, such as the pirates of Team Seaham. Also, with the Game Boy Advance Game Link Cable, you can trade statistics and collectible costumes with your friends.

Hamtaro : Ham-Ham Games est un jeu de sport sur GBA destiné aux plus jeunes. Les célèbres hamsters sont bien sûr à l'honneur et devront accomplir une quinzaine d'épreuves telles que le sprint 100 mètres, le tournoi de tennis, le lancer de marteau, le plongeon, le tir à l'arc ou encore le beach-volley.

locale.title: Hamtaro : Ham-Ham Heartbreak
locale.synopsis: All the hamsters are bickering, and there's little wonder why! Spat, a meddling troublemaker, is telling fibs and causing heartache everywhere. It's up to Hamtaro and best-girl Bijou to follow Spat, stop the squabbling, and get everyone back on talking terms again.
Interprétez Hamtaro qui, secondé de Bijou, va tenter de mettre fin au projet fou de Zizanie consistant à briser le coeur de tous les ham-ham. Pour cela maitrisez le Voc-Ham et apprenez le be-bop.

locale.title: Hamtaro : Rainbow Rescue
locale.synopsis: One day while playing outside, Bijou witnesses a great rainbow. The rainbow disappears and Prince Bo falls to the ground. The Prince states that he can make rainbows by using his umbrella. He tries to prove it to disbelieving Stan and the rest of the Ham-Hams, but realizes too late that the colors on his umbrella are gone. And thus, Hamtaro and his Ham-Ham friends must set off on a journey in order to collect things that are the proper color for Prince Bo to use for his umbrella so he can create a rainbow to return home.

Hamtaro : Rainbow Rescue est un jeu d'aventure sur GBA. Dans cet épisode, un hamster venu des étoiles débarque sur Terre. Seul souci, il a dispersé les sept couleurs de l'arc-en-ciel pendant sa chute. Les hamsters terriens reçoivent donc la tâche de réunir sept objets qui permettront de reconstituer l'arc-en-ciel.

locale.title: Happy Feet
locale.synopsis: Step into the shoes of a bird who's got some happy feet in this game based on the Happy Feet animated film. Mumble is a young penguin. He's been born into a flock of Empire Penguins who are great at singing. Each penguin needs a Heartsong to attract their soulmate. Mumble, however, is just about the worst singer in the world. The one thing he can do, and do really well, is tap dance. Sing and dance through the penguin world as you interact with Mumble's friends and foes. Don't give up hope that, somewhere in the freezing Artic, you'll find the song to warm someone's heart!

Happy Feet sur GBA est un jeu de rythme tiré du long métrage du même nom. Le titre vous propose d'incarner Mumble le pingouin, roi de la banquise grâce à son talent pour les claquettes. Avec ses amis Gloria et Lovelace, découvrez des tas de jeux musicaux au rythme du rock'n roll, de la pop, du disco et du R&B. Débloquez des bonus tout au long du jeu en exécutant des mouvements de danse élaborés.

locale.title: Hardcore Pinball
locale.synopsis: Leave the quarters at home as you take on four themed pinball tables -- Soccer, RoboMech, Retro, and Station -- all brought to life with realistic pinball physics, animated flippers and scoring elements (bumpers, rails, kickers, spinners and more) and digitized music and sound effects.

locale.title: Hardcore Pool
locale.synopsis:
It's every angle for the win in this game of Billiards. Features realistic ball and table physics, 3D rendered graphics, 8 playable characters, and 5 game modes -- Arcade, Tournament, 8 ball, 9 ball, and Time Challenge.
Cancelled before release (US).

Hardcore Pool est un jeu de billard sur GBA. Dans des environnements en trois dimensions, les matches bénéficient d'une physique réaliste demandant technique et concentration. Huit joueurs différents sont disponibles, ainsi que cinq modes de jeu : Arcade, Tournament, 8 ball, 9 ball, and Time Challenge.

locale.title: Harlem Globetrotters : World Tour
locale.synopsis: For more than 80 years, the "Clown Princes" of the hardwood, have thrilled and delighted worldwide audiences; more than 123,000,000 spectators in 118 countries have witnessed basketball, Harlem Globetrotters style. Now, the Globetrotters, the world's greatest showmen, take their high-flying athleticism, and audacious antics off the road, and right into your home for an exciting game of 2 on 2 hoops!

Le basket s'invite sur la Gameboy Advance avec Harlem Globetrotters : World Tour. Suivez la grande équipe lors de championnats ou de matches amicaux et enchaînez les figures spectaculaires et autres dunks pour devenir le champion incontesté. Relevez le défi et faites crier le parquet.

Harobots : Robo Hero Battling!! est un jeu de rôle d'action sur Gameboy Advance dans lequel vous possédez Haro, un robot de combat tiré de la série Gundam. Vous pouvez l'améliorer et le faire se battre contre d'autres robots.

game.name: Harry Potter And The Sorcerer's Stone

locale.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
locale.synopsis:
The first Harry Potter game for the Game Boy Advance is an action adventure that lets you play as Harry in his first year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, following the story of the book and the movie.
You control Harry from an overhead view and must complete several tasks. These range from mundane class assignments like collecting ingredients for a potion to facing off against a giant troll. To master these challenges, Harry can learn five spells that allow him to push back opponents, flip switches, open doors, levitate objects and more. If Harry is hurt, he can find and eat Bertie Bott's Every Flavor Beans to regain health. By performing admirably in learning spells and completing missions, Harry can gain extra House Points so that Gryffindor might win the House Cup. If he misbehaves by attacking other students, or being caught wandering the halls at night, points will be deducted, however. As seeker for the Gryffindor team, Harry must also compete in Quidditch matches. The game has a special mode for Quidditch and other events where Harry might have to mount his broom.

locale.title: Harry Potter à l'école des sorciers
locale.synopsis: Harry Potter à l'Ecole des Sorciers vous plonge dans l'univers magique du jeune magicien sur Gameboy Advance. Au fil des diverses missions, vous découvrirez les nombreux secrets de Poudlard. En compagnie de vos amis Ron et Hermione, apprenez à chevaucher votre balai ainsi qu'à maîtriser les sortilèges pour devenir un vrai sorcier. Enfin, le Quidditch sera votre nouveau sport favori.

locale.title: Harry Potter to Kenja no Ishi

game.name: Harry Potter Et La Coupe De Feu

locale.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
locale.synopsis: Harry, Ron, and Hermione are back in Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire--a game based on J.K. Rowling's fourth book. The game follows Harry, the wizard-in-training, as he confronts a fire-breathing dragon, rescues friends from the icy depths of the Black Lake, and navigates the twisting corridors of a maze. As Harry, Ron, or Hermione, you can cast a variety of spells in both single-player and cooperative modes.

Harry Potter et la Coupe de Feu sur GBA est le quatrième volet des aventures du sorcier à la cicatrice en forme d'éclair. Dans cet épisode, vous vous promènerez dans les couloirs de Poudlard, vous maîtriserez de nouveaux sorts, vous participerez au tournoi des Trois Sorciers, vous jouerez des matches de Quidditch sur votre balai et rencontrerez bien entendu tous les personnages de la série.

game.name: Harry Potter Et L'ordre Du Phénix

locale.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
locale.synopsis: In Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix, Harry returns for his fifth year of study at Hogwarts and discovers that much of the wizarding community is in denial about the teenager's recent encounter with the evil Lord Voldemort. The Minister for Magic has decided to teach courses in defensive magic, but this leaves the young wizards woefully unprepared to defend themselves against the dark forces threatening them. Meeting secretly with a small group of students who name themselves "Dumbledore's Army", Harry has taken it upon himself to teach his band of students how to defend themselves against the Dark Arts, preparing the courageous young wizards for the extraordinary battle that lies ahead.

Harry Potter et l'Ordre du Phenix est un jeu d'action/aventure sur Gameboy Advance. Le titre vous permet de vous replonger dans l'univers si particulier du jeune sorcier, en y retrouvant les personnages cultes des romans et films. Vous y incarnez Harry, le jeune sorcier de Poudlard, à travers son année scolaire à Poudlard.

game.name: Harry Potter Et Le Prisonnier D'azkaban

locale.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
locale.synopsis: The Dementors are coming, and this time Harry needs his friends. From the opening scene on the Hogwarts Express to the climatic finale on the shore of the great lake at Hogwarts, Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban immerses you in the world of Harry Potter. As Harry, Ron, and Hermione, you'll face the dreaded Azkaban guards, fly the Hippogriff around towers, and explore Hogwarts with the Marauder's Map. Learn spells that allow you to freeze creatures, control dragons, and conjure a Patronus. New two-player mini-games include Flying Seahorse Fishing and Dueling Club mini-games.

Harry Potter et le Prisonnier d'Azkaban est un jeu de rôle sur GBA. Harry, Ron et Hermione luttent au quotidien pour apprendre de nouveaux sorts et sont soudainement plongés au coeur d'un grand mystère. Des quêtes secondaires sont au programme. Certaines fonctionnalités se débloquent en connectant la cartouche à la GameCube.

locale.title: Harry Potter to Azkaban no Shuujin

game.name: Harry Potter And The Chamber Of Secrets

locale.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
locale.synopsis:
The game for Game Boy Advance based on the second Harry Potter book and movie is, like its predecessor, an action adventure, this time with an isometric perspective.
In Harry's second year at Hogwarts, bad things are happening. The ancient Chamber of Secrets has been opened, and what lurks within is attacking students. To get through this ordeal alive (and advance the plot) Harry must again complete various challenges. These mostly consist of navigating large mazes - fighting monsters, solving puzzles, flipping switches and pressing buttons for doors to open. Six spells are available to help. As Harry is often in places he shouldn't be, stealth sequences are also a large part of the game. To avoid teachers and prefects, he can sneak around slowly and hide behind curtains. If he is caught, he is thrown out (to try again) and house points can be deducted.
As in other Potter games, there are a lot of collectibles, found both in plain view and in hidden areas. Sets of Famous Wizard cards unlock bonuses, Every Flavour Beans get Harry passwords that let him move through shortcuts in the school and Chocolate Frogs increase his maximum stamina.
Finally, Quidditch is also back in this game, this time in three-dimensional space, viewed from the back.

locale.title: Harry Potter et la Chambre des Secrets
locale.synopsis: Harry Potter et la Chambre des Secrets est un jeu d'action/aventures sorti sur Gameboy Advance. Retrouvez Harry et ses amis dans ce titre inspiré des secondes aventures du petit sorcier. En bonus, participez à des matches de Quidditch.

locale.title: Harry Potter to Himitsu no Heya

game.name: Harry Potter - Coupe Du Monde De Quidditch

locale.title: Harry Potter: Quidditch World Cup
locale.synopsis: Handheld adaptation of the Electronic Arts fantasy sports game. Take any of the Hogwarts Houses to triumph in the Hogwarts Quidditch Cup and then use your new skills to take your country to victory in the Quidditch World Cup. Players can choose between nine international Quidditch teams, each with its own distinctive playing style: USA, England, France, Germany, the Nordic Team, Spain, Australia and Bulgaria featuring Viktor Krum. GBA owners get to experience the first ever Harry Potter multi-player game for the platform. Link up to go head to head with your friends in magical, fast and exciting two-player action.

Enfourchez votre balai dans Harry Potter : Coupe du Monde de Quidditch sur Gameboy Advance. Choisissez de représenter une des classes de Poudlard ou carrément une équipe internationale pour remporter la coupe du sport aérien le plus prisé des sorciers.

game.name: Harvest Moon - Friends Of Mineral Town

locale.title: Harvest Moon : Friends of Mineral Town
locale.synopsis: As a child, you spent a memorable summer on a farm in the country and experience a whole new world of excitement. Years have passed, and now the long-neglected farm that holds fond memories is yours! It is up to you to successfully rejuvenate the farm and build a life for yourself. The best part is that you can do it any way you want! Plant and harvest crops, raise farm animals, marry the woman of your dreams, and start a family! Take over the reins of life, and create your own pastoral adventure!

Harvest Moon : Friends of Mineral Town est un jeu de rôle et de gestion sur GBA dans lequel vous devez rajeunir une ferme et vous occuper convenablement de votre entourage (famille et amis). L'héroïne a désormais la possibilité de se marier et d'avoir des enfants. Quelques mini-jeux sont aussi au programme.

game.name: Harvest Moon - More Friends Of Mineral Town

locale.title: Harvest Moon : More Friends of Mineral Town
locale.synopsis: Live the simple life as a farmer in Harvest Moon: More Friends of Mineral Town. This game is similar to the original Harvest Moon: Friends of Mineral Town, but now you can play as a girl who has left the city to pursue a life on the farm. You'll take part in growing crops, managing livestock, finding a husband, and raising children.

locale.title: Bokujou Monogatari: Mineral Town no Nakama Tachi f
Hatena Satena
locale.synopsis:
Hatena Satena was released by Hudson way back in 2001 for the Game Boy Advance. It's similar in nature to the Picross series of games - single screen grid puzzles where you're given clues on where to chip away, eventually revealing a picture in the grid. Elements of Minesweeper are also present - each square you reveal will let you know how many of the same color square are touching it.
Hatena Satena features cute, interesting character designs by Super Lovers, the fashion and art brand that (I believe) did Super Milk Chan. While the game is solely in Japanese and does feature quite a bit of text, it's completely playable by anyone regardless of language skill.

locale.title: Heidi : Le Jeu Officiel
locale.synopsis: Heidi : Le Jeu Officiel reprend l'univers du long métrage du même nom. Retrouvez tous les endroits mythiques de la série : le village, la maison du grand-père... et interagissez avec la nature et les animaux : certains seront agressifs, timides... A vous de les amadouer

game.name: Hello Kitty Collection - Miracle Fashion Maker

locale.title: Hello Kitty Collection - Miracle Fashion Maker
Hello Kitty Collection : Miracle Fashion Maker
Hello Kitty: Happy Party Pals
locale.synopsis:
In Hello Kitty: Happy Party Pals Hello Kitty needs help to organize parties. The game consists of different levels (parties) that need to be planned. This includes inviting guests, gathering supplies and keeping everyone happy. The guests' happiness is shown through a percentage by talking to them, but it is also visible through a meter above their heads. If a certain rating is achieved Hello Kitty can move on to the next level. The game contains many Sanrio characters and it is the first Hello Kitty game for the GBA.
The first party is a small one in Kitty's playroom and she needs to invite two family members. Kitty can freely move around in the house to collect supplies such as a table cloth, a music disc, balloons etc. The gathered supplies are stored in a journal. The journal also shows who to invite. Kitty needs to do this by walking up to them and initiating a conversation. The guests are not always the same and items are not always in the same location. When talking to a potential guest their happiness rating is shown. By talking to them or giving items that rating can be improved, but only up to a certain level. The final part of the planning is decorating the room, with, for instance, the cloth and the balloons. Once the party starts Kitty can talk to the characters or play music to improve their happiness rating. The music needs to be matched with the guests. Old tunes will only make the elder people happy, but young people can for instance be given cake instead or you can play a game with them.
Many parts of the planning involve mini-games. Kitty can for instance make cakes. She needs to pour dough on a cooker with six burners, quickly flip them to prevent them from burning and then transfer them to a plate with a time limit of one minute. The second party takes place in the garden and Kitty can play the Bouncing Balloons mini-game in the sandbox, a Bust-A-Move clone. Based on the player's score various types of food are provided for the party. With each new party new environments are introduced, such as a garden, a park, an arcade etc. with more guests and items.
The third party is a park picnic. It has a mini-game that is a Concentration variant, matching identical cards. Guests can also be made happy by playing the Cutie Catch game. It is based on throwing a ball by determining the angle and the power of the throw so the other character can catch it and vice versa. The fourth party takes place at a Sushi restaurant and the fifth one at the Arcade. Other mini-games are a Dance Dance Revolution-like rhythm game, a sliding puzzle game, and designing custom invitations in a simplified art program, using images and colours that match the recipient's taste. Many items and activities return for the different parties. After each completed level a password is provided and it possible to access the thirteen mini-games right away from the main menu.

Dans Hello Kitty : C'est la Fete ! retrouvez la coqueluche favorite des petites filles. Explorez le monde merveilleux d'Hello Kitty, et découvrez tous les ingrédients qui feront de cette boom une réussite. Trouvez le lieu idéal et contactez les amis de Kitty grâce au téléphone. Vous pouvez leur envoyer des messages et des invitations. Participez à treize mini-jeux délirants dans un univers très coloré.

game.name: Hello! Idol Debut - Kids Idol Ikusei Game

locale.title: Hello! Idol Debut - Kids Idol Ikusei Game
Hello! Idol Debut : Kids Idol Ikusei Game
Herbie - Fully Loaded
locale.synopsis: Inspired by Walt Disney Pictures' feature film Herbie: Fully Loaded, the action-packed video game thrusts players into the high-octane world of 3D stock car racing. The video game offers fans a chance to slip behind the wheel of one of the world's most beloved cars, Herbie the Love Bug, while enjoying fun power-ups, personalized racing moves, hazards and free replays of unlocked races.

locale.title: Justice League Heroes - The Flash
locale.synopsis: Justice League Heroes: The Flash, developed by WayForward Technologies for the Game Boy Advance system, lets gamers play as DC Comics' The Flash, wielding his Speed Force to strike enemies before they can strike back, unlock powerful combination attacks and slow-down time to defeat adversaries in slow motion. As the Fastest Man Alive, gamers also enlist the support of fellow Justice League members by calling in special attacks from Superman, Batman, Wonder Woman and other DC Comics super heroes.

locale.title: Héros de la Ligue des Justiciers : Flash
locale.synopsis: Jeu d'action dans lequel vous incarnez l'homme le plus rapide de l'univers en collant rouge. Utilisez des combos-éclair, attaquez les ennemis par surprise et échappez aux dangers grâce à votre vitesse fulgurante. Combattez les super-vilains et faites-vous aider par les autres membres de la ligue.

locale.title: Hey Arnold ! The Movie
locale.synopsis: A big problem calls for a big head. Future Tech Industries has come to town and wants to level the boarding house and the rest of the block. Follow Arnold and his friends through a whirlwind adventure to try and save the neighborhood.

Hey Arnold ! The Movie sur Gameboy Advance est un jeu de plates-formes/action. Incarnez 5 personnages issus du célèbre dessin animé télévisé. 5 environnements sont disponibles à l'intérieur desquels il faut vous frayer un chemin et récupérer le maximum de bonus.

locale.title: Hi Hi Puffy AmiYumi - Kaznapped!
locale.synopsis: Hi Hi Puffy AmiYumi: Kaznapped! is a platform video game based on the Cartoon Network animated television series Hi Hi Puffy AmiYumi. This one was made exclusively for Nintendo's Game Boy Advance.

locale.title: High Heat Major League Baseball 2002
locale.synopsis:
High Heat 2002 is the 3rd game in the "High Heat" series. Gone from the previous two games is the Sammy Sosa title. Like the previous games HH2002 is a total baseball simulator. You can set back and just manage your team or you can get right on the field and play each game. You can configure the game in many different formats.
You can: Lengthen or Shorten a season Create new teams Re-arrange the divisons move players from different teams before the game starts Change team settings Create custom made players ...and generally do just about anything you want
From the swing of the bat to making blockbuster trades you have all the controls.

High Heat Major League Baseball 2002 sur GBA est le cinquième volet de cette série sportive. Ces jeux de gestion sportive mettent en scène les vrais joueurs et équipes du célèbre tournoi américain. Tous sont jouables en mode gestion d'équipes ou en tant que joueur sur le terrain.

locale.title: High Heat Major League Baseball 2003
locale.synopsis:
The High Heat series returns for another season of baseball, this time with the following updates:
Improved Truplay AI technology, allowing more true to life animations for batter, fielders and pitchers, etc. All the updated team rosters for the new season Two man commentary team On field coaches and managers And new gameplay modes including home run derby, fantasy draft, create-a-player, batting practice and a two on two challenge.

High Heat Major League Baseball 2003 sur GBA est le cinquième volet de cette série sportive. Ces jeux de gestion sportive mettent en scène les vrais joueurs et équipes du célèbre tournoi américain. Tous sont jouables en mode gestion d'équipes ou en tant que joueur sur le terrain.

game.name: High School Musical - Livin' The Dream

locale.title: High School Musical : Livin' the Dream
locale.synopsis: Help the Wildcats find the missing instruments in time for the state competition. Play as Gabriella, Troy, Sharpay and Ryan, each with unique abilities. Explore East High while solving the mystery to find the lost instruments. Dance to your favorite songs from both movies.

Le jeu tiré du film des studios disney a deux modes: histoire et Lecture rapide. En mode histoire, le joueur doit retrouver les objets volés et résoudre des énigmes pour trouver l'identité du voleur. En mode "Quick Play", le joueur danse surcertaines des chansons des films, notament Breaking Free et What Time Is It?
Hikaru No Go sur Gameboy Advance est le premier volet du jeu de Go basé sur le manga du même nom. Le jeu de Go est un jeu de stratégie japonais très ancien.
Hikaru No Go 2 sur Gameboy Advance est le deuxième volet du jeu de Go basé sur le manga du même nom.

game.name: Himawari Doubutsu Byouin - Pet No Oishasan Ikusei Game

locale.title: Himawari Doubutsu Byouin - Pet no Oishasan Ikusei
Himawari Doubutsu Byouin : Pet no Oishasan Ikusei Game
Horsez
locale.synopsis: In Horsez, you join a new academy where you need to train your horse to make him into a champion. You get to take care of an adorable foal.

locale.title: Hot Potato!
locale.synopsis: Reminiscent of the original arcade style games, players steer a bus with a group of multicolored spuds on it. As the bus rolls down the streets, players will release waves of spuds down the street ahead of them, and if a potato runs into a potato of the same color, they will save that potato. There's constant screen action as each spud is animated, and waves its arms to attract your attention. The little spuds are cute, displaying a wide range of comical anims and they're literally everywhere. It's up to players to capture the spuds and save the Earth for good!

Hot Potato! est un jeu de réflexion/action sorti sur Gameboy Advance. Aidez une multitude de patates de l'espace à rentrer chez elles en les conduisant dans un fantastique bus à patates. Mais la route est piégée et il vous faudra vous creuser les méninges pour vous en sortir.

locale.title: Hot Wheels - All Out
locale.synopsis: Hot Wheels World Challenge lets you become a fearless stunt driver and pull off wild stunts in the best Hot Wheels cars. In Hot Wheels Stunt Track Challenge you'll compete in the hottest, most extreme Game Show out there! Fearless drivers impress the audience by beating the competitors and performing wild stunts to win Episodes and better cars.

locale.title: Hot Wheels - Velocity X
locale.synopsis: Can you handle a typical Hot Wheels day filled with criminal racing gangs, huge loops, fast speeds, brutal crashes, and an arsenal of weapons? Hot Wheels Velocity X tests your driving skills in dangerous missions spanning five destructible levels. You must do whatever it takes to complete the missions--speed through loops, pull off wild stunts, catch big air off a jump, drive up walls and buildings, find hidden shortcuts, or simply just run your opponents off the road.

locale.title: Hot Wheels : Burnin' Rubber
locale.synopsis: Start your engines and race for the championship in your favorite Hot Wheels cars as they fly over jumps, careen around hairpin turns and speed through radical environments!

Ressortez les petites voitures de votre enfance car les Hot Wheels sont de retour dans le jeu de courses Hot Wheels : Burnin' Rubber sur Gameboy Advance. Vous avez aussi la possibilité de customiser votre véhicule entre deux courses.

locale.title: Hot Wheels : Stunt Track Challenge
locale.synopsis: Players are thrust into competition on a hot new extreme game show -- on which they must complete perilous stunts and win intense races. The goal is to beat opponents and impress the audience with fearless maneuvers, in order to advance into other episodes and win better cars. At the end of the season, the driver with the most courage and best stunt skills will cruise away in a gold-plated car as the Hot Wheels Champion. Players choose from 30 authentic Hot Wheels cars to compete in 24 stunt challenges on 12 different tracks set in environments such as Buccaneer Bay, Jurassic Jam, Zero Gravity Zone, Tiki Island, Spider Alley and Lava Land. Players can also customize their cars with unique colors, wheels and decals.

Los jugadores se enfrentarán en competición en un nuevo y ardiente videojuego de juegos extremos, en el que deberán completar acrobacias peligrosas y ganar intensas carreras. El objetivo es vencer a los oponentes e impresionar al público con las más valientes maniobras, para avanzar a otros episodios y ganar mejores coches. Al final de la temporada, el piloto con más valentía y mejores habilidades en acrobacias saldrá en un automóvil dorado como el campeón de Hot Wheels. Los jugadores eligen entre 30 auténticos coches Hot Wheels para competir en 24 desafíos de acrobacia y 12 pistas diferentes ambientadas en entornos como Buccaneer Bay, Jurassic Jam, Zero Gravity Zone, Tiki Island, Spider Alley y Lava Land. Los jugadores también pueden personalizar sus coches con colores únicos, ruedas y calcomanías.

Hot Wheels Stunt Track Challenge est un jeu de courses en 3D sur GBA. Parmi les modes de jeu disponibles : le Super Show (exécution de défis de figures et courses de championnat) et le Champion League (série de 12 courses). Les 12 parcours différents, déclinés en 30 épreuves, se répartissent dans six environnements.

locale.title: Hot Wheels : World Race
locale.synopsis: In Hot Wheels Highway 35 World Race, racing is taken to a new level as players are thrust into the unique futuristic Hot Wheels fantasy world where life revolves around the most intense stunt racing ever imagined. Players race against the clock on extreme tracks featuring split/multi-level courses, obstacles and speeds unlike anything ever experienced before. Players will be able to pull-off wild gravity-defying stunts, speed through huge loops, drive up walls, find hidden shortcuts or simply just race opponents through volcanoes, ice, mountains and more. The game lets players choose from authentic Hot Wheels cars.

Hot Wheels : World Race est un jeu de courses en trois dimensions sur GBA. Plusieurs modes de jeu sont disponibles : Course Rapide, Contre-la-montre, Championnat et Multijoueurs. La quinzaine de circuits proposés alterne des décors variés : pyramides, volcan, ville sous la neige, forêt ou encore plage.

game.name: Hudson Best Collection Vol. 1 - Bomber Man Collection

locale.title: Hudson Best Collection Vol. 1 - Bomber Man Collect
Hudson Best Collection Vol. 1 : Bomber Man Collection

game.name: Hudson Best Collection Vol. 2 - Lode Runner Collection

locale.title: Hudson Best Collection Vol. 2 : Lode Runner Collec

locale.synopsis: Hudson Best Collection Vol. 2 : Lode Runner Collection sur GBA est une compilation qui rassemble sur la même cartouche Lode Runner et Championship Lode Runner, deux titres initialement sortis sur Nes. Dans ces jeux d'action/réflexion, le joueur doit parcourir des niveaux en ramassant une certaine quantité d'or et en évitant les ennemis qui patrouillent.

locale.title: Hudson Best Collection Vol. 2 : Lode Runner Collection

game.name: Hudson Best Collection Vol. 3 - Action Collection

locale.title: Hudson Best Collection Vol. 3 - Action Collection
Hudson Best Collection Vol. 3 : Action Collection

game.name: Hudson Best Collection Vol. 4 - Nazotoki Collection

locale.title: Hudson Best Collection Vol. 4 - Nazotoki Collectio
Hudson Best Collection Vol. 4 : Nazotoki Collection

game.name: Hudson Best Collection Vol. 5 - Shooting Collection

locale.title: Hudson Best Collection Vol. 5 - Shooting Collectio
Hudson Best Collection Vol. 5 : Shooting Collection

game.name: Hudson Best Collection Vol. 6 - Bouken-jima Collection

locale.title: Hudson Best Collection Vol. 6 - Bouken-jima Collec
Hudson Best Collection Vol. 6 : Bouken-jima Collection
Hugo : Bukkazoom!
locale.synopsis: In the wacky and cartoonish fast-paced kart racing game, Hugo Bukkazoom!, players control a host of characters from the Hugo world as they zip around the free roaming universe. This simple and easy to play racing game boasts three different and distinct environments, five game play modes, unlockable karts and power ups as well as multiple game play modes.
Hugo : Bukkazoom! est un jeu de courses sur Gameboy Advance. Défiez Hugo et ses amis au volant de karts étranges, dans des environnements microscopiques à l'échelle d'un insecte.

game.name: Hunter X Hunter - Minna Tomodachi Daisakusen

locale.title: Hunter X Hunter : Minna Tomodachi Daisakusen

locale.synopsis: Adapté du manga Hunter X Hunter de Togashi, Hunter X Hunter : Minna Tomodachi Daisakusen permet de rejouer la section qui se déroule sur Greed Island avec les 2 héros mais aussi certains membres de la brigade fantôme.

locale.title: Hunter X Hunter : Minna Tomodachi Daisakusen!!
I Spy Challenger!
locale.synopsis: I Spy Challenger! is a Puzzle game, developed by Black Hammer Game and published by Scholastic, Inc., which was released in 2002.

I Spy Challenger! est un jeu d'énigme conçu pour les enfants de 6 à 10 ans basé sur la série de livre pour enfant "I Spy", composé de mini-jeux rapides comme Hoop Drop, Match Attack et Grid Grab. Avec 84 niveaux et des milliers de façons de jouer, I Spy Challenger offre une nouvelle expérience à chaque partie.

locale.title: Ice Climber
locale.synopsis: Twenty years after their debut on the NES, mountain climbers Popo and Nana return to scale the heights as part of the NES Classic Series for the Game Boy Advance. As Popo (player two plays as Nana), you must use your trusty mallet to work your way up the mountain by chipping away at the blocks overhead and then jumping through the resulting hole. Your mallet is also useful for eliminating pesky enemies, including polar bears, seals, and mountain men.

Partez à la conquête de pics escarpés, franchissez des ravins glacés et assommez des créatures des neiges, en solo ou en duo dans Ice Climber sur GBA. Utilisez votre marteau pour briser les blocs de glace et vous défendre, et sautez de palier en palier jusqu'au sommet. Franchissez le huitième palier pour atteindre le stage bonus, puis ramassez le plus de légumes possible et partez dans les airs avec l'un de vos amis condors.

locale.title: Ice Nine
locale.synopsis: Get ready to take part in an undercover operation to stop an evil plan to steal "Ice Nine," a destructive computer virus. As Tom Carter, you'll perform a variety of missions that slowly unlock a conspiracy within the CIA. You have an arsenal of tactical equipment, including a sniper rifle, submachine guns, shotguns, night vision goggles, and more. Take down your artificial intelligence-controlled enemies in different environments, or challenge up to three of your friends in a deathmatch arena.

Ice Nine est un jeu de tir à la première personne sur GBA. Vous êtes un jeune agent nommé James Clayton, recruté par la CIA pour une mission secrète. En effet, le programme destructeur Ice Nine vient d'être dérobé. Une fois le briefing de chaque niveau reçu, de multiples armes pourront être utilisées pour réussir vos objectifs : fusil à lunette, grenades, mitraillette, roquettes, fusil à pompe, etc.

locale.title: Enchanted : Once Upon Andalasia
locale.synopsis: Become enchanted with the official game based on the Disney animated movie. This fairy tale story follows the beautiful princess Giselle as she is banished by an evil queen from her magical, musical animated land and finds herself in the gritty reality of the streets of modern-day Manhattan. Shocked by this strange new environment that doesn't operate on a "happily ever after" basis, Giselle is now adrift in a chaotic world badly in need of enchantment!

locale.title: Il était une Fois
locale.synopsis: Il était une Fois est un jeu d'aventure directement tiré du long-métrage de Walt Disney qui alterne les images animées et filmées. Le titre propose donc de revivre l'histoire point par point. Vous incarnez tour à tour la princesse, le prince et un écureuil ; trois personnages pour trois manières de jouer différentes, alternant la jouabilité au stylet et à la croix directionnelle. Retrouvez l'ambiance Disney dans un mélange d'aventure, d'action et de mini-jeux.

locale.title: Inspector Gadget - Advance Mission
locale.synopsis: Inspector Gadget: Advance Mission is an Action game, developed by Magic Pockets and published by DreamCatcher Interactive, which was released in 2001.

Le diabolique professeur Gang a mis au point cinq machines destructrices. Vous incarnez l'Inspecteur Gadget aidé de sa nièce Sophie et de son chien Finot. Vous devez retrouver ces machines et les détruire. Au fil des missions vous pouvez à tout moment changer de personnage possédant leurs attributs propres.

locale.title: Inspector Gadget Racing
locale.synopsis:
Based on the animated cartoon by DIC (Super Mario Bros. Super Show, all three Sonic cartoons, The Real Ghostbusters) of the same name, Inspector Gadget Racing is a racing game developed by Bit Managers that is similar to games like the Mario Kart series, Vivid Image's Street Racer and other kart racing games for the SNES and Game Boy Advance. Selectable characters include Inspector Gadget (with both the Gadget Van and Gadget Mobile), Penny/Sophie (in a 4X4 truck), Brain (in an ice cream truck), Chief Quimby (in a police car), Dr. Claw, Agent Abdul (in a truck) and Agent Bruce.
The characters have their own power ups, for example Penny/Sophie has a shield, Gadget has his Gadget Mallet and Agent Bruce has an oil slick Spy Hunter-style. They can still pick up other power-ups, like missiles, bubblegum (to slow down an opponent), a shield and others. The game also has land-based courses, air-based courses and underwater-based courses
The game has multiple languages, like LSP's other Inspector Gadget game for the Game Boy Advance, Inspector Gadget: Advance Mission (English, Spanish, German, French, Italian and Dutch)
Retrouvez les personnages de l'univers du dessin animé sur des pistes où tous les moyens sont bons pour arriver premier.

locale.title: International Karate Advanced
locale.synopsis: International Karate Advanced is a GBA remake of International Karate 2000 for the Game Boy Color with the 3-way free-for-all from IK+ rather than the standard 1-on-1 from the original IK and IK2000. It features the same 12 playable characters, but now the game tells you the skill of the character in a scale of 1 to 5 stars. The same classic bonus games from IK+ and IK2000 have returned, as well as a practice dojo, which was previously included in the Game Boy Color game

locale.title: International Superstar Soccer
locale.synopsis: International Superstar Soccer is a Sports game, developed and published by Konami, which was released in Europe in 2001.

ISS Advance est un jeu de simulation de foot développé par Konami sur Gameboy Advance. Les modes du soft sont Match amical, Coupe du Monde et Séance de tirs au but. Vous avez à votre disposition 40 équipes nationales avec les vrais noms des joueurs. Prolongez votre passion dans un mode multijoueur avec vos amis.

locale.title: International Superstar Soccer Advance
locale.synopsis:
International Superstar Soccer Advance brings the soccer series to battery-powered life, with gameplay resembling the original SNES game. The action is viewed from above, with players drawn large, and the area of the screen in view is pre-defined.
In this edition you can play a knockout cup competition as well as friendlies and penalty practice. 40 teams are featured, with the real players all present with 9 different ability categories. There are 5 difficulty levels.
A running commentary by Jon Champion is provided. There are 8 different formations and 8 strategies on offer, and man-marking can be specified.

ISS Advance est un jeu de simulation de foot développé par Konami sur Gameboy Advance. Les modes du soft sont Match amical, Coupe du Monde et Séance de tirs au but. Vous avez à votre disposition 40 équipes nationales avec les vrais noms des joueurs. Prolongez votre passion dans un mode multijoueur avec vos amis.

game.name: Inuyasha - Naraku No Wana! Mayoi No Mori No Shoutaijou

locale.title: Inuyasha - Naraku no Wana! Mayoi no Mori no Shouta
Inuyasha : Naraku no Wana! Mayoi no Mori no Shoutaijou
Invader
locale.synopsis:
Invader is a vertical scrolling shoot-em-up for the Nintendo Game Boy Advance. There are 8 levels to shoot through each ending with a end-boss. The player can select from 2 different ships each with specific features. Enemies leave coins that can be spent in the Shop, where upgrades such as weapons, extra lives, and credits are available for purchase.
Game modes include Arcade, Survival, Boss Attack and 2 player Cooperative via the Link cable.

Invader est un shoot them up à défilement vertical pour la Game Boy Advance. Il y a 8 niveaux et chacun se terminant par un boss de fin. Le joueur peut choisir parmi deux navires différents, chacun avec des caractéristiques spécifiques. Les ennemis laissent des pièces qui peuvent être dépensés dans la boutique, où encore mettre à jour votre arsenal, etc.

locale.title: Iridion 3D
locale.synopsis: In this Afterburner-inspired Gameboy Advance launch title, a player pilots the SHN fighter through seven pseudo-3D levels. Returning to Earth from a space mission, the protagonist notices that the Iridion empire has taken over. The SHN fighter can be upgraded with five different types of weapons for varying methods of destruction. This is German developer Shin'en's first English game, however, they have prior experience, having developed sound drivers for both the GBA and GBC.

Iridion 3D est un jeu de tir/action sur Gameboy Advance. Dans la peau d'un prospecteur interstellaire de retour sur Terre après un long voyage sur la planète Orion, vous découvrez que le maléfique Iridion a décidé de ravager la planète bleue. Préparez-vous à faire face durant les six stages qui composent le soft. Le sort de la galaxie est entre vos mains !

locale.title: Iridion II
locale.synopsis: This sequel to Iridion 3D is different in gameplay, but twice as much action. Piloting in Kiloblaster Style mechanics from a 3D perspective, you fight through 15 levels of pulse-pounding action that will keep you up all night. Six different weapons with upgrade ability will give you awesome firepower to stop your foes. The storyline goes that a hundred years have passed since the Earth was attacked by the vicious IRIDION forces. Wanting revenge over their lost systems, they attack once more. Earth is too far away to send help, and you're the only one that could stop them.
Il est la suite d'Iridion 3D. Il délaisse le shoot 3D pour être un shoot them up à défilement vertical classique.

locale.title: It's Mr. Pants
locale.synopsis:
Rare's website mascot, Mr. Pants, stars in his very own video game for the Game Boy Advance. He's prepared hundreds of fiendish puzzles to scramble your brain!
Pieces fall onto the game board with only a limited time to place them. To clear the pieces, players will need to make shapes that are at least a 2x3 rectangle, or bigger rectangles and squares. Three different modes of play are available - Puzzle, Wipeout, and Marathon - and progressing through the puzzles will earn players assorted bizarre underwear-clad artwork.

It's Mr. Pants sur GBA est un puzzle-game à l'ambiance complètement dingue. Ici, il va falloir regrouper des petites pièces de couleur différentes afin de les faire disparaître. La cartouche fait intervenir aussi bien la forme que la couleur des pièces, l'objectif changeant selon le type de partie choisie.

locale.title: J.League Pocket
locale.synopsis: J.League Pocket is a Sports game, developed by KCEO and published by Konami, which was released in Japan in 2001.

game.name: J.league Pro Soccer Club O Tsukurou! Advance

locale.title: J.League Pro Soccer Club o Tsukurou! Advance
J.League Pro Soccer Club o Tsukurou! Advance

game.name: Jajamaru Jr. Denshouki - Jalecolle Mo Arisourou

locale.title: Jajamaru Jr. Denshouki - Jalecolle mo Arisourou
Jajamaru Jr. Denshouki : Jalecolle mo Arisourou
James Pond : Codename RoboCod
locale.synopsis: In his second adventure James Pond must retrieve the toys Dr Maybe has stolen. Pond has been armed with an Inspector Gadget-style stretch device, which he can use to view higher areas or claw onto ceilings so as to slide across them. The gameplay takes place across worlds themed around particular types of toys, such as sporting goods, candy and aircraft. The levels scroll sideways, although a small amount of vertical movement is included. On each level Pond must collect 2 penguins and reach the exit, although there are usually multiple exits and lots of secret areas to explore. After completing each pair of two worlds (each of which has three sub levels), a boss must be faced.

James Pond : Codename RoboCod est la suite sur GBA de James Pond Underwater Agent, sorti en 1990 sur diverses consoles. Entre James Bond et Inspecteur Gadget, James Pond, alias RoboCod, doit déjouer les plans de Dr Maybe qui vole des jouets dans des fabriques du Pôle Nord. Dans chaque niveau, vous devez récupérer deux pingouins avant de rejoindre la sortie. Un boss vous attend à la fin des mondes.

locale.title: Jazz JackRabbit
locale.synopsis:
A cross between Bugs Bunny and Han Solo, Jazz is up to his usual world saving tricks, although this time there's an even bigger incentive: money.
In an original GBA exclusive title, Jazz must explore 24 levels for as much money as he possibly can. That money can then go towards new weapons with which to destroy the enemy, such as the usual assortment of blasters, rocket launchers and flamethrowers.
Along with the single player adventure, multiplayer modes are also included for up to 4 people, with game modes ranging from the usual deathmatch style to capture the flag.

locale.title: Jet Grind Radio
locale.synopsis:
The hip-hop Dreamcast hit makes it's way to the Game Boy Advance. Your favorite skaters from Jet Grind Radio return in true 3D blasting through exciting and diverse levels. Grab your spray cans and hit the streets painting the town in your colors while avoiding the cops and rival gangs. It's not easy being a kid in Tokyo but with your Overdrive Magnetic-Motor Skates and a need for self-expression you're on your way to making the town yours!
Features multiple game modes including one-on-one races, freestyle skating for points, timed tagging sessions and multiple playable characters that have a completely unique look and feel, power-ups that allow you, the skater, to have extra powers.

Jet Set Radio sur Gameboy Advance met en scène une bande de riders armés de bombes de peinture et amateurs de power-ups. Il s'agit d'effectuer des graffitis tout en évitant les patrouilles de flics et les gangs rivaux. Parmi les modes de jeu, on note la présence de courses en duel, de freestyle et de tags en temps limité.

game.name: Jgto Kounin Golf Master - Japan Golf Tour Game

locale.title: JGTO Kounin Golf Master - Japan Golf Tour Game
JGTO Kounin Golf Master : Japan Golf Tour Game

game.name: Adventures of Jimmy Neutron Boy Genius - Attack of the Twonkies, The

locale.title: The Adventures of Jimmy Neutron Boy Genius : Attac
locale.synopsis: This platform adventure game based on the hit Nickelodeon show and movie series finds Jimmy returning from outer space -- with an alien life-form stowaway. The alien starts cuddly and cute, but quickly becomes a ferocious beast with a voracious appetite for destruction. Once again Jimmy Neutron must use a revolutionary invention system to create some inspired gadgets to capture and contain the quickly multiplying alien attack. Players are able to create over 26 gizmos, 11 inventions, and four super inventions. There are of course also secret gizmos hidden in each level give Jimmy Neutron enhanced power-ups. With the help of these gadgets, Jimmy makes his way through six episodes spanning 15 levels including Jimmy's Lab, Twonkus-3, The Neighborhood, Downtown, Retroland and the Final Showdown.

locale.title: Jimmy Neutron un Garçon Génial : L'Attaque des Twonkies
locale.synopsis: Jimmy Neutron : Un Garçon Génial : L'Attaque des Twonkies sur GBA est un jeu d'action et de plates-formes mettant en scène le petit génie de la série. Vous devez combattre les Twonkies qui, dès qu'ils entendent de la musique, se multiplient. Pour cela, Jimmy doit, chaque jour, créer des inventions qui lui permettent de vaincre ces ennemis. Parcourez douze mondes et vingt-cinq niveaux pour éliminer la vermine.

game.name: Adventures of Jimmy Neutron Boy Genius - Jet Fusion, The

locale.title: The Adventures of Jimmy Neutron Boy Genius : Jet F
locale.synopsis: Brilliant minds know how to bring a book to life, but it takes a boy genius to actually bring it to life, literally. By inventing the 'Virtual World Reproducing Machine', Jimmy has created the ultimate book report by changing Retroville into the world of his favorite spy - Jet Fusion. Jimmy will now explore dangerous deserts, treacherous seas, and mysterious forests on an expedition to save Jet Fusion from the evil Professor Calamitous and return Retroville back to it's original form. Join Jimmy in a high tech, platform adventure-filled game stuffed with exciting action and brain twisting puzzles!

Las aventuras de Jimmy Neutron es un videojuego basado en la serie animada de TV del mismo nombre. Jimmy ha inventado un nuevo dispositivo de reproducción virtual, pero algo sale mal y convierte a Retroville en un mundo virtual, el profesor Calamitous está detrás.
