A lo largo del juego, deberás recoger piezas para las invenciones mayores y menores que ayudaran a Jimmy a continuar al siguiente nivel. Ayúdate del invento principal de cada nivel para derrotar al jefe y con los inventos menores deshazte de los enemigos más débiles. ¡salva a la ciudad!

locale.title: Jimmy Neutron, un garçon génial : Jet Fusion
locale.synopsis: Dans Jimmy Neutron : Jet Fusion sur game boy advance, incarnez le célèbre petit garçon à la grosse tête pour de nouvelles aventures ! Evoluez dans votre univers équipé de toutes les inventions sorties de votre cerveau génial, qui vont vous aider à repousser les vilains pas beaux qui vous veulent du mal.

locale.title: Jimmy Neutron Boy Genius
locale.synopsis: Initiate contact with another galaxy and launch a makeshift satellite into space before breakfast. That's nothing for Jimmy Neutron, the teenage super genius whose amazing inventions often get him into heaps of trouble. This time, it's up to you to get Jimmy out of his toughest tangle. You'll go through six levels, including Jimmy's house, the Asteroids, Yolkus Underworld, Yolkus City, and Retroland. Jet around on Goddard, Jimmy's proudest invention that can turn into the Goddard Pogo, Goddard Scooter, and the Goddard Sled. Can Jimmy's get himself through this grand adventure?

locale.title: Jimmy Neutron: Un Garçon Génial
locale.synopsis: Jimmy Neutron : Un Garçon Génial est un jeu d'action/plates-formes sorti sur Gameboy Advance. Retrouvez tout l'univers déjanté de la série Jimmy Neutron dans un jeu où vous décidez directement de ce qu'il faut faire. Pour cela, vous avez accès à une multitude d'inventions délirantes.

locale.title: Jonny Moseley Mad Trix
locale.synopsis:
Jonny Moseley Mad Trix is an extreme skiing game, in the vein of Tony Hawk's Pro Skater and Dave Mirra Freestyle BMX.
As Jonny Moseley, Tanner Hall, or a number of other skiers, you must perform various stunts while racing down several different courses, including both mountains and cities, to unlock more courses and secret characters.
The GBA version has an isometric viewpoint, instead of the 3D of the console versions, and has simplified controls.
Jonny Moseley Mad Trix est un jeu de sport sorti sur Gameboy Advance. Dévalez des pistes enneigées à fond la caisse sur vos deux skis. Vous pouvez faire du half-pipe ou être lâché d'un hélico.

locale.title: Juka and the Monophonic Menace
locale.synopsis:
A long time ago, the mysterious "Ancients" created machines across the land that were able to harness the power of sound. The Ancients disappeared, leaving only their devices for future civilizations to discover. Years later, the "Settlers" arrived and built their cities in the lands where the machinery was left, and all was prosperous.
However, nothing remains perfect forever. Powerful alchemists tried to harness the power of the Ancients' machines in their lust for power, and war broke out. Those that tried to use the Ancients' machines, or The Dark Alchemists, as they became known, were killed or exiled, and peace eventually returned. Rumour has it though, that the last of the Dark Alchemists, the Monophonic Menace, has returned to conquer the world.
Juka and the Monophonic Menace is an action-adventure game. The title character, Juka, is an alchemist who can collect ingredients from trees, water, bushes, and other places to mix and create potions. Potions can be used as a form of defense against enemies, can alter the landscape, or even activate machines. Juka also has a "Sound Staff", which can be used to absorb and fire back different types of sounds at certain enemies.

Juka and the Monophonic Menace est un jeu de rôle et d'action sur GBA. L'histoire tourne autour de Juka, jeune alchimiste dont la mission est de libérer le pays d'Oba de la "menace monophonique" qui règne depuis la disparition de plusieurs villageois. Pour cela, il doit s'aider des potions qu'il crée lui-même ainsi que de sa maîtrise de l'art antique pour terminer les 25 quêtes différentes de l'aventure où il croisera une cinquantaine de personnages.

locale.title: Jurassic Park III : Island Attack
locale.synopsis: Won't these dinosaurs ever die? Refusing to succumb to extinction, the big, bad monsters of Jurassic Park return for another dino-sized adventure. Make your way through 12 levels of action, using high-tech weaponry to stalk to the prehistoric beasts before they can stalk you. Ten different species will terrorize you throughout the JURASSIC PARK locales. With graphics and play that rival coin-operated games, JURASSIC PARK III: Island Attack might just be the biggest thing to ever happen to handheld gaming.

Jurassic Park III : Dino Attack est un jeu d'action/aventure sorti sur Gameboy Advance. Vous voilà à nouveau sur une île remplie de dinosaures et c'est à vous seul d'en échapper. Pour cela vous devrez les tuer en 2D, en 3D et même en motocross, c'est dire.

locale.title: Jurassic Park III : Park Builder
locale.synopsis: Clearly, the folks who built the original park were guilty of a few oversights. Think you can do any better? Try your hand at plotting out all of the details of the creation and management of a dinosaur park in JURASSIC PARK III: Park Builder. A strategy-simulation title of the highest caliber, the game leaves you in charge of 100 dinosaur species you have the task of placing them and maintaining their health. Of course, there's also the matter of the restaurants, shops, rides, and other attractions. If the park you create is too boring, poorly maintained, or excessively expensive, no one will show up, so you'd better use some seriously discerning judgment. In addition to managing the park, you'll have to pick up DNA strands from throughout the park to create new dinosaurs to keep the people coming back. Does it sound like too much to handle? Just wait until one of your prehistoric pals escapes on opening day.

Jurassic Park III : Park Builder est un jeu de gestion sur Gameboy Advance. A partir de rien, vous devez développer votre propre Jurassic Park. Avec un maximum d'attractions, ainsi qu'une multitude de créatures préhistoriques différentes, votre but est d'attirer les foules.

locale.title: Jurassic Park III : Kyouryuu ni Ainiikou!
Jurassic Park III : The DNA Factor
locale.synopsis: Jurassic Park III: The DNA Factor recreates the Jurassic Park world and takes players into an interactive pre-historic adventure. The game is a fun and unique mix of side-scrolling adventure stages and intense puzzle action. Jurassic Park III: The DNA Factor includes more than 10 species of dinosaurs and 12 huge levels to explore.

Jurassic Park III: The DNA Factor recrea el mundo de Jurassic Park y lleva a los jugadores a una aventura prehistórica interactiva. El juego es una mezcla divertida y única de fases de aventura de desplazamiento horizontal e intensos puzzles. Jurassic Park III: The DNA Factor incluye más de 10 especies de dinosaurios y 12 enormes niveles para explorar.

Jurassic Park III : The DNA Factor est un jeu d'action/plates-formes sur Gameboy Advance. Le soft est découpé en une douzaine de missions. Chacune d'elles vous amène à récupérer puis à reconstituer des fragments d'ADN. Pour arriver à vos fins, il vous faut éviter divers ennemis et combattre des charmantes bestioles.

game.name: Jurassic Park Institute Tour - Dinosaur Rescue

locale.title: Jurassic Park Institute Tour - Dinosaur Rescue
Jurassic Park Institute Tour : Dinosaur Rescue
Justice League : Injustice for All
locale.synopsis: Justice League: Injustice for All demonstrates that when global catastrophe strikes and the world lies in peril, the Justice League, the greatest super heroes of all time, are called in to save the day. Fighting for truth, justice and freedom, Superman, Batman, Wonder Woman, The Flash, Green Lantern, Hawkgirl and Martian Manhunter have banded together to fight for the common good against the Injustice League: The Joker, Lex Luthor, Mongul, Cheetah, Solomon Grundy, The Shade, Star Sapphire, Copperhead, Gorilla Grodd, Felix Faust and The Manhunter Robots.

Si vous aimez les collants flashy et les capes qui volent au vent, alors Justice League : Injustice For All est fait pour vous. Dans ce jeu de plates-formes sur Gameboy Advance, tous les super-héros se retrouvent et s'assemblent pour vaincre les super vilains.

locale.title: Justice League Chronicles
locale.synopsis: Super villains have unleashed a triple threat for global domination and it's up to the World's Greatest Super Heroes, the Justice League, to save the Earth from danger. Justice League provides an interactive, episodic adventure on the Game Boy Advance that simulates the stylistic, animated appeal of the popular series with a new, distinct, dynamic look and feel.

Justice League : Chronicles sur Gameboy advance est une aventure inspirée de la série éponyme. La Ligue des Justiciers part enquêter sur une grande puissance psychique localisée en Arctique. Vous incarnez les super-héros par équipe de deux, l'IA contrôle le héros que vous n'avez pas choisi. A noter qu'un deuxième joueur peut vous rejoindre en coopération.

locale.title: K-1 Pocket Grand Prix
locale.synopsis: K-1 Pocket Grand Prix is a Sports game, developed by Daft and published by Konami, which was released in Japan in 2002.

locale.title: K-1 Pocket Grand Prix 2
locale.synopsis: K-1 Pocket Grand Prix 2 is a Sports game, developed by Daft and published by Konami, which was released in Japan in 2002.

game.name: Kaiketsu Zorori To Mahou No Yuuenchi - Ohimesama O Sukue!

locale.title: Kaiketsu Zorori to Mahou no Yuuenchi - Ohimesama o
Kaiketsu Zorori to Mahou no Yuuenchi : Ohimesama o Sukue!

game.name: Kami No Kijutsu - Illusion Of The Evil Eyes

locale.title: Kami no Kijutsu - Illusion of the Evil Eyes
Kami no Kijutsu : Illusion of the Evil Eyes
Kao the Kangaroo
locale.synopsis:
Crikey! Kao's been stolen from down under! It's up to you to get him home to the Outback.
Unlike the Windows and Dreamcast versions of this game, the GBA version is a 2D side scrolling platform game. You control Kao the Kangaroo through twenty-seven levels. You basic modes of travel are running or jumping but in later levels, you will have snowboarding, flying and jet skiing. As you travel along, enemies try to stop you. You must kill or avoid these enemies. Your main weapon is a pair of boxing gloves with which you can pound enemies but, if you push down and attack, you can also do a tail spin to attack lower-height enemies. In each level, there are flags you can pick up and, by pressing select, you can drop them to create your own continue point.

Dans ce jeu de plates-formes sur Gameboy Advance, le joueur dirige Kao le Kangourou armé de gants de boxe qui distribue des pains à ceux qui tentent de lui barrer la route. Kidnappé, puis évadé, vous devez aider le marsupial à retrouver le chemin de sa maison.

locale.title: Kappa no Kai-kata - Kaatan Daibouken!
locale.synopsis: A strange platformer where you play a Kappa (river child) based on a Japanese anime of the same name.

locale.title: Karnaaj Rally
locale.synopsis:
Karnaaj Rally is a handheld racing game which is played from a top down perspective and mixes 2D and 3D graphics. It's an arcade racer similar to Micro Machines where the player competes against three other racers on a number of different tracks. To his help, the player has a temporary turbo which he can refill by driving over special items that he finds on the race tracks. Weapons exist too; rockets and mines can be used by the player to stop the competition from winning.
The game's career mode allows the player to compete and progress in four different race series. Each of these has unique vehicles and courses. While racing the player can earn money which can be used to upgrade the car's tires and engine as well as buy more armor, rockets and mines. There's also a gambling option. The player can bet by guessing on different outcomes from the races, such as the right finishing order.
The game also has a multiplayer mode for up to four players.

locale.title: Kawa no Nushi Tsuri 3 & 4
locale.synopsis: Kawa no Nushi Tsuri 3 & 4 is a compilation of remakes of Legend of the River King GB and Legend of the River King 2. The games have enhanced graphics.

game.name: Kawa No Nushi Tsuri 5 - Fushigi No Mori Kara

locale.title: Kawa no Nushi Tsuri 5 - Fushigi no Mori kara
Kawa no Nushi Tsuri 5 : Fushigi no Mori kara
Kelly Slater's Pro Surfer
locale.synopsis:
Do you like to surf? Have you ever imagined surfing at different remote locations around the world? Well, Kelly Slater takes you around the world on his boat to surf some of the more famous beaches. With a control scheme similar to all the other Activision O2 brand games, it's easy to jump into the game and surf.
PS2, XB, and GC description, further below is the GBA description.
Game Play Modes: Infinite Time - With no clock, no objectives, and nobody around, this gives you the best opportunity to just enjoy the surf.
High Score - With 3 minutes, how high of a score can you get?
Icon Challenge - See how many icons you can collect and how high of a score you can get before time runs out.
Career Mode - Select a surfer and journey around the world to surf the best waves on the best beaches. As you progress you will unlock new beaches, new surf boards, and new tricks which will be usable in all the other modes of play.
Multiplayer Modes: Push - Two players surf simultaneously in an attempt to "push" the split screen towards their opponent's half of the screen. As you score points the screen gets pushed more. The winner is decided once one player is pushed from the screen.
Head to Head - Similar to Push but the screen is stationary and the winner is the person with the highest points when the time runs out.
Time Attack - Players take turns to achieve the most points possible. The more points you get the less time is alloted to your opponent.
The Pros in the game: Kelly Slater, Lisa Andersen, Tom Carroll, Tom Curren, Nathan Fletcher, Donavon Frankenreiter, Bruce Irons, Rob Machado, Kalani Robb, and some other secret characters.
The beaches in the game: Sebastian, Trestles, Mavericks, Antarctica, Jaws, Pipeline, Teahupoo, Bells, Curren's Point, Kirra, G-Land, J-Bay, Mundaka, Cortez Bank, and perhaps some other tucked-away hide-aways.
The PS2 version of the game also includes a playable demo of Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 4
GBA description
Surf Modes: Championship - Compete against 8 other surfers. You progress by surfing in 12 stages, 3 heats per stage. Your surf score is tallied from each heat and the top 3 surfers of the stage get to move on.
Challenge - Pick a surfer and do challenges around the world.
Drop In - Instant action surfing - go and just surf.
Multiplayer - With a Link Cable and another copy of the game you and a friend can link up to compete against each other.
The Pros are the same as above.
The beaches in the game: Sebastian, Trestles, Mavericks, Waimea Bay, Jaws, Pipeline, Teahupoo, Bells, Curren's Point, Kirra, G-Land, J-Bay, Mundaka, Cortez Bank, and perhaps some other tucked-away hide-aways.

Kelly Slater's Pro Surfer est un jeu de surf sur GBA. Vous voyagez dans treize lieux exotiques tels que les USA, l'Europe, l'Afrique, l'Australie et l'Afrique du Sud, à la recherche de la vague parfaite. Vous pouvez contrôler l'un des neuf surfeurs célèbres proposés pour effectuer de multiples figures et enchaînements réels ou fantaisistes.

game.name: Keroro Gunsou - Taiketsu! Gekisou Keronprix Daisakusen De Arimasu!!

locale.title: Keroro Gunsou - Taiketsu! Gekisou Keronprix Daisak
Keroro Gunsou : Taiketsu! Gekisou Keronprix Daisakusen de Arimasu!!

game.name: Kessaku Sen! - Ganbare Goemon 1, 2 - Yuki Hime To Magginesu

locale.title: Kessaku Sen! - Ganbare Goemon 1, 2 - Yuki Hime to
Kessaku Sen! : Ganbare Goemon 1, 2, Yuki Hime to Magginesu
Kid Paddle
locale.synopsis: To win the very new Ultra console 3000, Kid Paddle must win the City Game challenge and need to prove he is the king of the video games. But the challenge is serious and Kid will be help by his friends Horace and Big-bang which will become his coaches.You will be able to play to 26 different games. Some of the games are platform, some other are like the old arcade and others like mini games but all integrates the spirit "gore" and politically incorrect of the series of comic strip. Created by Midam in 1996, the comic strip Kid Paddle is a big success in Europe country. The 9 published albums were sold with more than 2,5 million specimens and the series of animated drawing is one of the best audiences.

Le plus célèbre des sales gosses se retrouve chez City Game où le gérant Mirador vient d'installer une toute nouvelle borne d'arcade. C'est l'occasion rêvée de se confronter aux horribles Blorks ! Incarnez Kid Paddle et Petit Barbare à travers trente niveaux dans ce jeu de plates-formes sur GBA.

locale.title: Kid's Cards
locale.synopsis: In Majesco's Kids Cards, players can choose single-player games or link up with up to three friends in multi-player mode. The fluid interface allows for easy pick-up and play and features unique settings for each of the five card games. The game also features three soundtracks to enhance the overall game play experience. Included games are Go Fish, War, Crazy Eights, Old Maid and Slap Jack.

game.name: Kidou Gekidan Haro Ichiza Haro No Puyo Puyo

locale.title: Kidou Gekidan Haro Ichiza Haro no Puyo Puyo
Kidou Gekidan Haro Ichiza Haro no Puyo Puyo

game.name: Kidou Senshi Gundam Seed - Tomo To Kimi To Koko De.

locale.title: Kidou Senshi Gundam Seed - Tomo to Kimi to Koko de
Kidou Senshi Gundam Seed : Tomo to Kimi to Koko de.

game.name: Kidou Tenshi Angelic Layer - Misaki To Yume No Tenshi-tachi

locale.title: Kidou Tenshi Angelic Layer - Misaki to Yume no Ten
locale.synopsis: Kido Tenshi: Angelic Layer is an RPG based on CLAMP's anime and manga series of the same name. The story is a retelling of the anime series, though much of the exposition is abridged for the game. It centers on a 12-year-old girl named Misaki Suzuhara who comes to Tokyo to attend an exclusive middle school. Upon first arriving in Tokyo, she sees a crowd gathered around a large outdoor TV screen. It seems there is some kind of fighting match going on, and Misaki is captivated by the amazing fighting skill of Athena, a champion fighter.

locale.title: Kidou Tenshi Angelic Layer : Misaki to Yume no Tenshi-tachi
Kien
locale.synopsis: Discover the Secret of Kien! For 7,000 years the planet of Malkut has been wisely ruled by the 7 Masters of the Absolute. But chaos has been reborn as evil corrupts the Land of Harmony. The 7 Masters have vanished, mystical warriors were slaughtered, and the temples are doomed in blood. The only hope that remains is imprisoned in the hearts and wills of two young apprentices. Their fate is to fight evil, reveal truth and to discover the secret of Kien.

Dans Kien, jeu d'action sorti sur Gameboy Advance, la planète Malkut qui a été sous la gouvernance des sept Maîtres de l'absolu pendant 7000 ans a malgré tout sombré dans le chaos. Les maîtres ont disparu, les guerriers sont morts et les temples bafoués. Deux apprentis restant encore en vie sont les seuls espoirs de cette planète. 23 niveaux sont à parcourir dans la peau d'un des deux personnages jouables dans ce jeu de plates-formes .

locale.title: Kill.Switch
locale.synopsis: Aiming and moving in cover and blind-fire modes is tricky, though. To gain the 3-D effect, some detail gets sacrificed. Usually this is no problem, but occasionally you'll have a tough time recognizing an object. You move from area to area to engage a new group of enemies. You'll conveniently find crates for cover and barrels to help you pull off big explosions. Locking the enemy in your crosshairs, signified by your crosshairs turning red, doesn't guarantee a direct hit? The accuracy depends on the weapon of choice. A shotgun will normally provide a kill on the first shot. If you have an automatic rifle, your shots are relatively inaccurate even if your aim is true.

Kill.switch est un jeu d'action à la troisième personne sur GBA. Dans un monde au bord d'un conflit global, le joueur se retrouve en première ligne. Il s'agit donc de se déplacer à couvert puis de débusquer ses ennemis. Six niveaux sont disponibles et des modes de jeu supplémentaires peuvent être débloqués.

locale.title: Killer 3D Pool
locale.synopsis: Killer 3D Pool brings the classic bar room game to your Game Boy Advance in full 3D! Playing against 15 computerized opponents of varying skills at 4 different styles of pool game, your aim is to beat all newcomers. Killer 3D Pool has four different versions of pool each with it's own distinct style and rules: English 8-ball, U.S. 8-ball, U.S. 9-Ball and Killer. Play your friends in a two-player match, or for the ultimate two-player experience, use a second Game Boy Advance with Multiplayer mode. You don't want to miss this!

Killer 3D Pool sur GBA est un jeu de billard pour toute la famille qui profite d'un mode multijoueur et de nombreuses variantes de règles qui augmentent la durée de vie. Le titre possède une interface agréable et accessible à tous. Les différents modes satisferont tous les joueurs, qu'ils soient occasionnels ou habitués.

locale.title: Kim Possible : Drakken's Demise
locale.synopsis: Kim Possible's new adventure leads her into battle with Falsetto Jones, Gemini, Duff Killigan, Shego, and Dr. Drakken in four intense episodes. In each new episode, Kim gains gadgets and acrobatic abilities that allow her to bounce up walls, judo-flip henchmen, reflect laser beams, and spray hot sauce to melt icy obstructions. If all else fails, you can engage her stealth suit and make her invisible to enemy eyes. Once Kim acquires new gadgets and abilities, you can then replay earlier levels to access areas that were previously unreachable.

Kim Possible : Drakken's Demise sur GBA est un jeu de plates-formes dans lequel vous retrouvez l'héroïne de la série télé avec tous ses gadgets pour une lutte acharnée contre le mal. Découvrez quatre aventures inédites et des nouveaux gadgets dans chaque niveau pour un total de huit objets à rassembler.

game.name: Kim Possible - Revenge Of Monkey Fist

locale.title: Kim Possible : Revenge of Monkey Fist
locale.synopsis:
Kim Possible's buddy Ron Stoppable has been kidnapped by the evil ninja master, Monkey Fist! Help Kim battle her way through familiar foes such as Dr. Drakken, Shego, and of course, Monkey Fist, as you travel across the globe and search far and wide for Ron.
Revenge of Monkey Fist is a sidescrolling platformer where players take control of Kim Possible. Kim has an assortment of punches, kicks and acrobatic moves that she can use to dispatch enemies. She's not short of high-tech gadgets, either: she can use laser lipstick, compact case bombs, invincibility watches, to name a few. Kim's buddy Wade can also contact her from time to time to provide Kim with useful tips and hints.
As you progress through the game, you can unlock pictures by collecting gems which are scattered throughout the levels. You can also unlock short clips from the show as you make your way through the game's eight stages.

locale.title: Kim Possible III : Team Possible
locale.synopsis: Based on Disney's animated series Kim Possible, Team Possible follows Kim and Ron Stoppable as they battle villains, including Senor Senor, Monkey Fist, and Dr. Drakken. During the game, you can switch between Kim and Ron, and you can use their unique gadgets to complete objectives. Kim Possible 3: Team Possible features single- and multiplayer modes, as well as collectible trading cards and unlockable minigames.

locale.title: Kingdom Hearts : Chain of Memories
locale.synopsis:
Adventure is in the cards !
Kingdom Hearts: Chain of Memories delivers an entirely new adventure and set the stage for Kingdom Hearts II. Sora, Donald, and Goofy travel through many vast and colourful worlds in search of their missing companions. Encounter over 100 of your favourite Disney and Final Fantasy friends and foes.
Collect mysterious cards that open doors to new adventures, unlock powerful abilities, and call familiar friends to your side.
Experience big, bold graphics and high-quality animation.

Kingdom Hearts : Chain of Memories sur GBA est un jeu d'action/aventure faisant le lien entre les deux opus PS2. Ici, le système de combat change légèrement puisqu'il s'agit de combats utilisant des cartes. Vous frappez vos ennemis avec votre keyblade mais la puissance de vos coups dépend de celle de vos cartes. Découvrez donc les évènements qui ont conduit Sora à sombrer dans un sommeil artificiel.

game.name: Kinniku Banzuke - Kimero! Kiseki No Kanzen Seiha

locale.title: Kinniku Banzuke - Kimero! Kiseki no Kanzen Seiha
Kinniku Banzuke : Kimero! Kiseki no Kanzen Seiha

game.name: Kinnikuman 2-sei - Seigi Choujin E No Michi

locale.title: Kinnikuman II-Sei - Seigi Choujin e no Michi
Kinnikuman II-Sei : Seigi Choujin e no Michi
Kirby & the Amazing Mirror
locale.synopsis: The Mirror World has been invaded by an evil shadow, and Kirby's got to save the day! Fortunately, he won't have to go it alone! He's been split into four Kirbys of different colors, and with his trusty cell phone, he can call up his colorful clones to lend a hand!

Kirby and the Amazing Mirror est un jeu de plates-formes sur GBA. En plus de ses habituelles capacités (flotter dans l'air et aspirer ses ennemis), le petite boule rose possède désormais des pouvoirs angéliques qui lui donnent des ailes, un arc et des flèches, ainsi qu'un téléphone portable pour communiquer avec d'autres personnages du jeu.

locale.title: Hoshi no Kirby : Kagami no Daimeikyuu
Kirby : Nightmare in Dream Land
locale.synopsis: Everyone in Dream Land has lost the ability to dream! It seems that King Dedede has stolen the Star Rod, the source of power for the Fountain of Dreams, and given its fragmented pieces to his goons for safekeeping. The world needs a hero... a round pink one. As Kirby embarks on an adventure to recover the Star Rod, he'll have to copy every trick in the book to bring good dreams back to Dream Land.

Kirby's Adventure sur Gameboy Advance est un jeu de plates-formes dans lequel vous dirigez une petite boule de gomme rose qui a la faculté d'aspirer ses ennemis pour s'approprier leurs pouvoirs. Votre but est de rassembler les fragments du Bâton Etoile volé par le Roi Dadidou pour que les résidents du Pays des Rêves puissent de nouveau dormir sur leurs deux oreilles.

locale.title: Hoshi no Kirby : Yume no Izumi Deluxe

game.name: Kisekko Gurumii - Chesty To Nuigurumi-tachi No Mahou No Bouken

locale.title: Kisekko Gurumii - Chesty to Nuigurumi-tachi no Mah
Kisekko Gurumii : Chesty to Nuigurumi-tachi no Mahou no Bouken
Klonoa 2 : Dream Champ Tournament
locale.synopsis: Floppy-eared hero Klonoa returns in another fast-paced, colorful side-scrolling adventure for the Game Boy Advance. In his latest challenge, Klonoa must race against time and other dream travelers in the Dream Champ Tournament to collect stars, sun and moon stones to become the ultimate Dream Champion. Combining platform, puzzle and adventure elements, Klonoa 2: Dream Champ Tournament is just the adventure fans of the series have been anticipating. Explore the intricate and puzzle-packed worlds where you'll meet a wide variety of interesting creatures! Solve Fiendishly-Designed Puzzles ? Use Boxes, Bomb Boxes, Switches, Pressure Switches, Goomis, Springs and Scales in your quest for glory. Hoverboard Races ? Each world contains a fast-paced thrill ride of gem collecting fun! Master your Skills to Win ? Klonoa must prove his skills against other dream travelers in the Dream Champ Tournament.

locale.title: Kaze no Klonoa G2 : Dream Champ Tournament
Klonoa : Empire of Dreams
locale.synopsis: A grumpy Emperor suffering from insomnia has banned dreaming and imprisoned Klonoa for breaking the law. To prove his courage and win his freedom, Klonoa must defeat the monsters that are creating havoc throughout the empire. Help our hero in his most perilous journey yet and experience the all-new thrills!

Es una historia alterna a la serie de consolas, lanzado en 2001 para Game Boy Advance. Sigue la historia de Klonoa después de misteriosamente despertar en el reino de Jillius donde es acusado por el rey de dormir, cosa que no está permitida en el reino a causa de que el emperador padece de insomnio.

Klonoa : Empire of Dreams est un jeu de plates-formes sorti sur Gameboy Advance. Un méchant tyran a décrété que rêver était interdit. Et bien entendu vous incarnez un héros qui a enfreint cette règle et se retrouve enfermé. Vous devrez vous évader et bouter les méchants hors du royaume.

game.name: Klonoa Heroes - Densetsu No Star Medal

locale.title: Klonoa Heroes - Densetsu no Star Medal
Klonoa Heroes : Densetsu no Star Medal
Koala Brothers - Outback Adventures
locale.synopsis: You're never too young for adventure, at least when the Koala Brothers are involved! The Brothers and all their best buddies are waiting for new friends to join them on adventures through the beautiful Australian Outback. Preschoolers can play as all their favorite characters from the Koala Brothers TV show in 10 games packed with between 4 and 20 levels apiece. Kids learn how to handle the easy controls by using graphic-based instructions, so no reading is required! Players can help the brothers find George's lost mail, play tennis with Archie, hop around as Josie the Kangaroo, help Lolly run her ice cream truck, and more!

game.name: Koinu-chan No Hajimete No Osanpo - Koinu No Kokoro Ikusei Game

locale.title: Koinu-chan no Hajimete no Osanpo - Koinu no Kokoro
Koinu-chan no Hajimete no Osanpo : Koinu no Kokoro Ikusei Game
Konami Collector's Series : Arcade Advanced
locale.synopsis: Contains emulated ports of Frogger, Time Pilot, Yie Ar Kung-Fu, Gyruss, Scramble, and Rush-N Attack.

locale.title: Konami Krazy Racers
locale.synopsis: Konami Krazy Racers is a kart racing game with super deformed racers. It features famous Konami characters like Goemon (from Ganbare Goemon), Dracula (from Castlevania), and Vic Viper (from Gradius). There are 16 courses to race through, and you can collect coins to buy items. Gameplay is similar to that of Mario Kart.

Konami Krazy Racers est un jeu de courses sur Gameboy Advance. Prenez le volant aux côtés des célèbres personnages Konami comme Goemon, Dracula, le Ninja... et découvrez les 16 circuits que comporte le soft. Afin d'améliorer votre kart, vous devez récolter des pièces tout au long du parcours. Faites chauffer le moteur et surpassez vos adversaires.

game.name: Konchuu No Mori No Daibouken - Fushigi Na Sekai No Juunin-tachi

locale.title: Konchuu no Mori no Daibouken - Fushigi na Sekai no
Konchuu no Mori no Daibouken : Fushigi na Sekai no Juunin-tachi
Kong : King in Atlantis
locale.synopsis:
Kong: King of Atlantis is based closely on the companion movie to Kong: The Animated Series, incorporating the plot of the video version in an action-packed, side-scrolling adventure.
When an ancient prophecy starts to come true, the sunken city of Atlantis begins to rise. The evil Queen Reptilla plans to trick Kong into becoming her King, using him as her slave to unite the warring clans of Atlantis for her own evil gains. In a race against time, Jason must convince Kong that Queen Reptilla is evil, in the hope that together they can save the islands of Kong and Atlantis and their inhabitants.

Kong : King in Atlantis sur GBA est un jeu d'action dans lequel vous pouvez incarner trois personnages : Jason, Lua et Kong. Quand une ancienne prophétie se réalise, la cité engloutie d'Atlantis ressurgit des eaux. Vous devez combattre vos ennemis, sauvez vos alliés et trouver des objets magiques pour sauver l'île de Kong ainsi qu'Atlantis et ses habitants.

game.name: Kong - The 8th Wonder Of The World

locale.title: Kong : The 8th Wonder of the World
locale.synopsis: Kong: The 8th Wonder of the World is an action/adventure video game developed by Ubisoft for the Nintendo Game Boy Advance. In Europe, it is known as King Kong: The Official Game of the Movie. Due to the limited technology the Game Boy Advance has, King Kong: The 8th Wonder of the World is very different from the home console versions of the game. In this game, players switch between various roles - one being the movie exhibition visiting Skull Island to do filming which comprises actress Ann Darrow, director Carl Denham and scriptwriter Jack Driscoll, and the 25 ft gorilla and king of Skull Island, King Kong. While the overhead human section focuses on puzzle-solving and adventuring elements, Kong sections are combat-oriented side-scrollers.

Jeu d'action inspiré du long métrage de Peter Jackson. Retraçant les aventures du gorille géant, le jeu vous propose tout d'abord des phases d'exploration/aventure dans la jungle avant d'ensuite incarner l'animal et d'affronter des dinosaures. Retrouvez ainsi les moments clés du film.

locale.title: Kong : The Animated Series
locale.synopsis: Our modern world and an ancient land have come together on Kong Island, a secret world of prehistoric beasts which protects the 13 sacred stones - the key to ultimate power! Join Kong, Jason and his friends in an amazing platform adventure, battling prehistoric creatures, to rescue the stones from the forces of evil and save the planet.

Kong : The Animated Series est un jeu d'action sorti sur Gameboy Advance. Le jeu reprend l'univers et les personnages de la série télévisée du même nom. Vous pouvez y jouer le célèbre primate King Kong ainsi que son ami humain Jason.

game.name: Konjiki No Gashbell!! - Makai No Bookmark

locale.title: Konjiki no Gashbell!! - Makai no Bookmark
Konjiki no Gashbell!! : Makai no Bookmark

game.name: Konjiki No Gashbell!! - Unare! Yuujou No Zakeru

locale.title: Konjiki no Gashbell!! - Unare! Yuujou no Zakeru
Konjiki no Gashbell!! : Unare! Yuujou no Zakeru

game.name: Konjiki No Gashbell!! - Unare! Yuujou No Zakeru 2

locale.title: Konjiki no Gashbell!! - Unare! Yuujou no Zakeru 2
Konjiki no Gashbell!! : Unare! Yuujou no Zakeru 2

game.name: Konjiki No Gashbell!! The Card Battle For Gba

locale.title: Konjiki no Gashbell!! The Card Battle for GBA
Konjiki no Gashbell!! The Card Battle for GBA

game.name: Konjiki No Gashbell!! Yuujou No Zakeru - Dream Tag Tournament

locale.title: Konjiki no Gashbell!! Yuujou no Zakeru - Dream Tag
Konjiki no Gashbell!! Yuujou no Zakeru : Dream Tag Tournament
Kouchuu Ouja Mushiking : Greatest Champion e no Michi

game.name: Koukou Juken Advance Series Eigo Koubun Hen - 26 Units Shuuroku

locale.title: Koukou Juken Advance Series Eigo Koubun Hen - 26 U
Koukou Juken Advance Series Eigo Koubun Hen : 26 Units Shuuroku

game.name: Koukou Juken Advance Series Eijukugo Hen - 650 Phrases Shuuroku

locale.title: Koukou Juken Advance Series Eijukugo Hen - 650 Phr
Koukou Juken Advance Series Eijukugo Hen : 650 Phrases Shuuroku

game.name: Koukou Juken Advance Series Eitango Hen - 2000 Words Shuuroku

locale.title: Koukou Juken Advance Series Eitango Hen - 2000 Wor
Koukou Juken Advance Series Eitango Hen : 2000 Words Shuuroku
Kuru Kuru Kururin
locale.synopsis: Kuru Kuru Kururin is an innovative puzzle game in which the main character is inside a helicopter, and he must navigate himself through a maze in the least amount of time possible. Movements must be timed and precise, because if the helicopter's propeller hits a wall, 3 seconds is added to the timer. The protagonist's mission is to retrieve his brothers, who will join him after he finds them. He also finds many power-ups that will allow him to customize his helicopter's appearance.

Kuru Kuru Kururin est un jeu de réflexion sur Gameboy Advance. Dans ce soft, vous dirigez un bâton qui est en rotation permanente sur lui-même à travers divers environnements semés d'embûches. Kuru Kuru Kururin demande au joueur de l'adresse, de la concentration et beaucoup de réflexes.

locale.title: Kururin Paradise
locale.synopsis:
Kururin Paradise is the sequel to the GBA launch title, Kuru Kuru Kururin. In this game, Kururin and his family see an advertisement for the circus, which takes place at 6:00. Kururin's family arrive there on time, but Kururin is late, and when he gets there, everybody is missing! It's up to Kururin to search across the land for his missing family using his faithful helicopter, the Heririn. As in the first game, Kururin must navigate his way through fairly narrow mazes, trying not to hit the walls. Three consecutive hits, and the Heririn is destroyed, and you must start the stage again.
Paradise is vastly improved from the original game. It is now possible to find hidden keys in the levels, which open up locked doors, allowing for branched paths in the world map. Certain paths also lead to boss encounters, which take the form of an addictive mini-game including, but not limited to, lawn mowing, gathering stars, flying Kururin himself through clouds, and hopping across a path dodging helicopter blades. If you beat the boss, these mini-games are then added to your mini-game library, where you can play them against up to three friends using only one cart.
The game also features twelve toys built in that can be accessed by selecting one from a menu, then turning your GBA off, then on again. Most of them are fairly useless or incomprehensible in Japanese, but there are a couple of interesting ones, like the love tester, the musical note player, and the memory match game.

Kururin Paradise sur Gameboy Advance est un jeu d'action/réflexion dans lequel vous dirigez un petit personnage bleu aux commandes d'une machine volante. Pour traverser les niveaux, vous devez prendre garde à ne pas cogner les pales de la machine sur le décor. Une tâche plutôt difficile puisque les pales tournent continuellement.

locale.title: Ice Age
locale.synopsis: Ice Age makes the jump to the small screen in this Game Boy Advance platformer. Based on events depicted in the motion picture, Ice Age tasks players with guiding both Manny the Mammoth and Sid the Sloth through ten levels of platform-oriented action. Starting out, players control Manny who, along with the human baby Roshan, must navigate a myriad of environments while keeping saber-tooth tigers, hedgehogs, and bees at bay. To do so, Manny is capable of hurling large nuts as makeshift projectiles at any on-screen enemies. Wild animals aren't the only obstacle players will encounter, as they'll need to move a sleeping rhinoceros to advance and inhale skunk fumes to float over dangerous chasms.

locale.title: L'age de glace
locale.synopsis: Retrouvez tous les héros du film d'animation dans cette adaptation sur console portable. Vous pourrez y jouer l'énorme Manny doté d'une force colossale, ou Sid bien plus souple.

locale.title: Ice Age 2 - The Meltdown
locale.synopsis:
An adventure game based on the sequel to Fox's CG animated film.
The Ice Age is ending and our subzero heroes return in this action adventure video game set in a melting paradise of water parks, geysers and tar pits. Manny the Mammoth, Sid the Sloth and Diego the Sabre-Toothed Tiger are back and realize that the melting glaciers will soon flood their valley. With the help of everyone's favorite sabre-toothed squirrel from the first movie, Scrat, help your big friends cross the perilous landscape to safety. Scrat will dig, swim, sniff, spin and roll his in his never-ending quest to collect acorns. In the process, he serves as the unwitting hero in the quest to save the land from a giant flood.

locale.title: L'age de glace 2
locale.synopsis: Retrouvez Scrat, Manny, Sid et Diego dans une aventure complètement gelée. Tiré du long métrage éponyme, le jeu vous demander d'échapper au plus grand déluge de la Préhistoire. Vous débutez dans un parc de glace et devez parcourir dix niveaux juchés de pièges, courses et autres mini-jeux pour sauver votre fourrure.

locale.title: L'Aigle De Guerre
locale.synopsis: In the game's Story Mode, players play Napoleon Bonaparte who leads the revolutionary army into battle against the British. Set in the late 18th century, Napoleon's story is told in Fire Emblem fashion via strategic maps and character dialogue. However, the game takes many liberties with historical accuracy, such as Napoleon fighting man-eating ogres and abominable snowmen. The objectives for the missions vary slightly, but the basic idea is to send out units, defeat the enemy and take over the opponent's stronghold.

locale.title: L'Aigle de Guerre
locale.synopsis: L'Aigle de Guerre est un jeu de stratégie sorti sur Gameboy Advance. Incarnez le célèbre Empereur français Napoléon dans un jeu de stratégie sur portable en temps réel. Contrôlez vos troupes, faites attention à leur moral et remportez la victoire.

game.name: Tim Burton's The Nightmare Before Christmas - The Pumpkin King

locale.title: Tim Burton's The Nightmare Before Christmas - The
locale.synopsis: Much to the dismay of Jack Skellington and the citizens of Halloween Town, unusual bugs have started to infest their township. At the root of this ever-increasing bug invasion is Oogie Boogie, a former holiday king who is determined to take over Halloween. With help from his friends Sally, the mayor, and Dr. Finklestein, Jack and his trusted pal Zero embark on a quest to rid the town of bugs and stop Oogie Boogie from carrying out his evil plot. As Jack, you must battle Oogie's creepy henchmen using an arsenal of different weapons and navigate through booby traps, mazes, and puzzles.

locale.title: L'Étrange Noël de monsieur Jack : Le Roi des citrouilles
locale.synopsis: Le scénario nous en apprend un peu plus sur les origines de Jack et le joueur a bien évidemment la possibilité de visiter les lieux du film comme Halloween Town par exemple.

locale.title: The Wild Thornberrys: Chimp Chase
locale.synopsis: Wild Thornberrys: Chimp Chase TV?s favorite explorers are coming to the Game Boy Advance this fall. Darwin has been kidnapped and Eliza and her family must travel the globe in search of her chimp. In this side-scrolling adventure game, players travel through 12 exotic levels featuring Africa, South America, Australia and even the Arctic Circle.

locale.title: La Famille Delajungle : A la poursuite de Darwin
locale.synopsis: Des rues de Londres aux plaines d'Afrique, Eliza tente le tout pour le tout - au risque de perdre son don de parler aux animaux - au cours du plus grand défi jamais rencontré.

locale.title: Expedition der Stachelbeeren : Zoff im Zoo
The Wild Thornberrys Movie
locale.synopsis: Wild Thornberrys: Chimp Chase TV?s favorite explorers are coming to the Game Boy Advance this fall. Darwin has been kidnapped and Eliza and her family must travel the globe in search of her chimp. In this side-scrolling adventure game, players travel through 12 exotic levels featuring Africa, South America, Australia and even the Arctic Circle.

locale.title: La Famille Delajungle : Le Film
locale.synopsis: Retrouvez la Famille Delajungle dans un voyage riche en rebondissements. Des rues de Londres aux plaines d'Afrique, Eliza tente le tout pour le tout - au risque de perdre son don de parler aux animaux - au cours du plus grand défi jamais rencontré.

locale.title: Home on the Range
locale.synopsis: The Home on the Range GBA takes up where the movie left off. Alameda Slim, Rico and the three Willies have escaped from jail and are up to their old tricks. Ever since Buck, Maggie and the other farm animals helped put the outlaws behind bars, they have been schemin' to escape jail. Now, they're out and it's up to Buck, Jeb, Lucky Jack and the others to round them up once more! Many familiar locations from the film are revisited in this high-spirited action adventure.

locale.title: La Ferme se Rebelle
locale.synopsis: Protégez la ferme des prairies du bonheur contre Alameda Slim et sa bande de malfrats en cavale ! Avec Buck le plus grand cheval de l'Ouest ou Jeb le bouc grognon, partez à la recherche de ces impitoyables hors-la-loi et attrapez-les avant qu'il ne soit trop tard...

locale.title: March of the Penguins
locale.synopsis:
Based on the documentary March of the Penguins, this game follows the story of the emperor penguins as they embark on a long journey to breed their young. The game has been divided into twelve chapters, with different gameplay. The penguins need to be navigated through the environment, find a suitable mate, find food, take care of the egg, guard the young ones and finally make it all the way back.
A large part of the game is based on the concept of Lemmings. As the penguins march on, players need to help them land softly, melt obstacles, attract them in a certain direction using fish and place trampolines, ramps, slides, bridges and steps to make them access new areas. The levels can be explored using binoculars and the penguins need to collect a certain amount of snowflakes to pass. The penguins cannot die. When they fall off a cliff, they simply restart at the beginning of the level, but the players needs to bring them to the end as a group to succeed.
Other levels have the penguins slide down hills with faster gameplay, feature mazes, or take place underwater where predators need to be avoided while collecting food. In the later parts of the game, guarding the eggs adds an new layer of difficulty. As soon as a penguin hits an obstacle it is dropped. There is little time to pick it up again or it freezes. It also need to be taken to a warm spot before the thermometer time runs out.
Some educational content has also been included. Next to the habits, more information about the penguin migration in provided in between levels.

locale.title: La Marche de l'Empereur
locale.synopsis: Dans l'adaptation du jeu vidéo la marche des l'empereurs, vous pourrez guider les adorables manchots empereurs dans leur incroyable aventure de survie, défiant les éléments, au nom de la vie et de la famille. Cette quête magique de «ludo-éducation» est une expérience d'apprentissage délicieuse et stimulante mettant en vedette certains des animaux les plus aimés sur Terre ... et mettant en vedette certains des prédateurs et des environnements les plus dangereux jamais rencontrés!

locale.title: The Mummy
locale.synopsis:
The Mummy for the Game Boy Advance is set in the 1930s, combining exotic locations with high-adventure and action. You play as the O'Connells, with the ability to control any of the three player characters at any time.
In the game, players control all their favorite characters, including Alex, Evy, and Rick O'Connell, as they adventure through underground Egyptian ruins in search of treasure. Pitting the player against both villains from the television series including Imhotep, and new ones as well, The Mummy for the Game Boy Advance offers a compelling story and a challenging adventure for people of all ages.

locale.title: La Momie
locale.synopsis: Incarnez Alex, Rick ou Evy O'Connel, la famille d'aventuriers. La momie est à vos trousses. Percez le mystère du royaumes des morts pour lui échapper. Retrouvez tout l'univers de la série télé

game.name: Little Mermaid, The - Magic In Two Kingdoms

locale.title: The Little Mermaid: Magic in Two Kingdoms
locale.synopsis: Disney's The Little Mermaid: Magic in Two Kingdoms invites kids to experience their favorite moments, both under the sea and on land, from Disney's classic film. The game offers eight new games with Ariel and other memorable characters like Flounder, Sebastian, Eric, Ursula, King Triton, and even Ursula. Players have fun playing music with Sebastian, racing with Flotsom and Jetsam, illuminating Ariel and Eric as they boat on a lake and more.

locale.title: La Petite Sirène : Aventure Magique entre Terre et Mer
locale.synopsis: La Petite Sirène : Aventure Magique entre Terre et Mer sur GBA vous permet de littéralement plonger avec la princesse du fond des océans. Retrouvez le prince Eric, Sébastien et Polochon pour 8 mini-jeux aussi bien sous l'eau que sur la terre ferme. Réussissez tous les défis pour déjouer les plans de la maléfique et cruelle pieuvre Ursula.

locale.title: Treasure Planet
locale.synopsis: Get ready for an epic adventure of bloodthirsty pirates and buried treasure. Treasure Planet brings Robert Louis Stevenson's Treasure Island not just right up-to-date but into the future--one in which the spaceship Legacy is overrun by mutinous pirates, led by the cyborg John Silver. You'll take on the role of Jim as he solar-surfs and performs action moves with the help of Morph, who can transform into various items. Embark on a voyage through 10 levels, minigames, and boss challenges as you view original artwork, behind-the-scenes game footage, and stored movie clips.

locale.title: La Planète au Trésor
locale.synopsis: Revivez l'aventure du film d'animation de Disney en retrouvant vos héros préférés. Vous jouez Jim Hawkins qui part à la recherche du trésor de tous les trésors, en faisant attention à Long John Silver.

game.name: Smurfs, The - The Revenge Of The Smurfs

locale.title: Smurfs, The - The Revenge of the Smurfs
locale.synopsis: The Revenge of the Smurfs is an Action game, developed by Bit Managers and published by Infogrames, which was released in Europe in 2002.

locale.title: La Revanche des Schtroumpfs
locale.synopsis: Tout comme Les Schtroumpfs sorti plus tôt, le but est de délivrer différents schtroumpfs (Schtroumpf Gourmand, Schtroumpf à lunettes, Schtroumpf Farceur, et la Schtroumpfette), enfermés par Gargamel. Il s'agit d'un jeu de plateforme classique, qui se décompose en 20 niveaux répartis sur quatre tableaux. S'ajoute un boss à la fin de chacun de ces derniers (la plante carnivore, le serpent, le dragon et Gargamel assisté du Cracoucas). L'interface et les graphismes, plus colorés, diffèrent du jeu sorti en 1996.

locale.title: Sum of All Fears, The
locale.synopsis: The RAINBOW SIX franchise returns with yet another stunning installment from author Tom Clancy. Lead a three-man hostage rescue squad through level after harrowing level of enemy fire and intense strategic planning. One of the better team-based graphical efforts ever to grace the small screen, THE SUM OF ALL FEARS is heavily influenced by the cinematic version of the story, which stars Ben Affleck and Morgan Freeman. Whether you're a series fan or you're just looking for a good action game, this one's a must-have.

locale.title: La Somme de toutes les Peurs
locale.synopsis: Retrouvez l'univers du célèbre romancier Tom Clancy dans ce jeu qui suit directement la trame du film.

game.name: Land Before Time, The - Into The Mysterious Beyond

locale.title: The Land Before Time: Into the Mysterious Beyond
locale.synopsis: Action game based on the animated movie franchise. Take control of five popular and loved young dinosaurs from the The Land Before Time movies and Venture through NICE spectacular areas, each with its own unique game play and environments, in order to find the young T-rex Chomper. Players have to use the different strengths and abilities of the individual dinosaurs to help the others overcome various obstacles and dangers. The game features advanced graphics and sound over its predecessor and makes the world of the dinosaurs come alive on a handheld like never before. Easy and intuitive tutorials makes the game available for players of all ages.

locale.title: La Vallée du Petit Dinosaure : Aventures vers l'Inconnu
locale.synopsis: Vous incarnez Petit Pied et tout ses amis : Cera, Backy, Pointu, Petrie et Gobeur. Ce dernier s'est aventuré par mégarde hors de la Vallée et ne retrouve plus son chemin. Ses amis vont aller le chercher même si cela implique qu'ils devront se rendre au mystérieux Au-delà ! Aidez-les à retrouver leur ami puis surmonter les obstacles en tirant parti des forces et aptitudes de chacun.

locale.title: Lady Sia
locale.synopsis:
Lady Sia is a young female warrior princess who's attempting to save her homeland from the cruel beastmen, the T'soas.
At the opening Sia is being thrown in prison. A veiled figure eventually helps her escape, and that's where you begin the game. Run, jump, crawl, climb, sneak and slash your way past monsters, demons, and assorted perils in order to save your empire from the evil race of the animal creatures.

Lady Sia est un jeu d'action/plates-formes sur Gameboy Advance. Aux côtés d'une guerrière d'expérience, vous devez sauver votre pays de la domination des terrifiants T'soas et du sorcier Onimen. Votre périple débute dans une prison d'où vous vous évaderez pour faire régner la justice.

Mit Hilfe des Riesen Griffin aus dem Gefängnis entkommen, stürzt sich die mutige junge Prinzessin Sia in einen abenteuerlichen Kampf gegen die T'soas, gefährliche Monster, die es auf ihr geliebtes Heimatland abgesehen haben. Die einzige Chance, in den mysteriösen Fantasywelten mit jeweils fünf Level und einem Geheim-Level gegen die bizarren Kreaturen zu bestehen, liegt darin, immer neue Waffen und Zauberkräfte zu erringen.

La preciosa Lara Croft regresa a Game Boy Advance con una aventura tan grande como todas las que ha protagonizado. Haciendo uso de todas sus habilidades, Lara deberá recuperar un bastón mágico relacionado con su familia, a medida que nosotros descubrimos más cosas de su pasado.

La plus célèbre exploratrice de tous les temps débarque dans une nouvelle aventure illustrée par Tomb Raider Legend sur GBA. Lara Croft se met en quête d'un des plus précieux trésors du monde, une arme capable d'instaurer la paix dans le monde mais également de précipiter sa chute. Déjouez donc les pièges sur votre chemin, combattez vos ennemis qui se disputent le même butin et utilisez les aptitudes acrobatiques de la belle pour vous en sortir.

game.name: Lara Croft Tomb Raider - The Prophecy

locale.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider - The Prophecy
locale.synopsis:
Lara Croft discovers a manuscript which speaks of a mysterious occult magic which will bring desolation on earth in the near future. This prophecy also talks of three legendary stones which are linked with the mentioned devastation. Fascinated, Lara travels around the globe in search of these fabled stones. Along the way she'll meet enemies both human and otherwise and will also have to deal with dark magic of sorts.
Lara is now in a "quasi-3D" overhead environment, as opposed to the 2D-platformer view of the previous handheld (GBC) versions. This view proves helpful while Lara runs, jumps, shimmys, and shoots around. Although there is lack of a save feature, there is a password system which lets you restore back to 'almost' where you left.
Nueva entrega de las aventuras de Lara, pero esta vez en Game boy Advance, y con un aspecto totalmente diferente a todo lo visto hasta ahora, pero con el mismo espíritu de siempre.

Tomb Raider : The Prophecy est un jeu qui vous place dans la peau de Lara Croft. Le scénario envoie donc Lara chercher la pierre noire mais très vite elle se rend compte qu'il existe plusieurs pierres. De la Suède au Cambodge, le titre vous fait visiter des environnements divers et variés.

game.name: Dr. Seuss' - The Cat In The Hat

locale.title: Dr. Seuss' - The Cat in the Hat
locale.synopsis: Go beyond the zany fun of the movie with an unbelievable adventure starring you as The Cat in the Hat. The Cat's crate has been opened and Seussian magic has turned the house inside out. You'll encounter all the wacky characters from the movie as you race to restore order to the house before Mom comes home. The Cat has his amazing umbrella, floating moves, and other tricks up his sleeve to help you through the 16 levels of pandemonium.

locale.title: Le Chat Chapeauté
locale.synopsis: Amusez-vous avec cette drôle d'aventure sur GBA inspirée du long métrage où vous devenez le Chat Chapeauté. Le coffre du Chat a été ouvert et la magie qui s'est échappée a mis sens dessus dessous la maison. Dépêchez-vous de remettre de l'ordre avant que la maman de Sally et de Conrad ne rentre. Utilisez l'ombrelle du Chat pour réaliser des tours étonnants comme flotter ou capturer des créatures à travers plus de vingt niveaux.

game.name: Cat In The Hat By Dr. Seuss, The

locale.title: The Cat in the Hat by Dr. Seuss
locale.synopsis: Based on the original Dr. Seuss book (not the movie), this adventure game lets young players control the Cat in the Hat as he's looking for objects to play games with. Collecting the objects unlock different arcade games that can be played over and over again to try to beat the best scores.

locale.title: Le Chat Chapeauté
locale.synopsis: Le chat chapeauté : Amusez-vous avec cette drôle d'aventure sur GBA inspirée du long métrage où vous devenez le Chat Chapeauté. Le coffre du Chat a été ouvert et la magie qui s'est échappée a mis sens dessus dessous la maison. Dépêchez-vous de remettre de l'ordre avant que la maman de Sally et de Conrad ne rentre. Utilisez l'ombrelle du Chat pour réaliser des tours étonnants comme flotter ou capturer des créatures à travers plus de vingt niveaux.

locale.title: The Haunted Mansion
locale.synopsis: Remember the old Haunted Mansion ride at Disneyland? Probably the better question is, how could you not? The creepy hallways, the gliding chairs, the crystal ball, and all of the ghosts -- the popular attraction has frightened children and entertained adults for decades. And now the ride has come to life on the silver screen and on the Game Boy Advance. Developed by Pocket Studios, the game itself follows a standardized action-adventure formula. Main hero Zeke, armed with a magical lantern called the Beacon of Souls, moves about the mansion environment, captures the 999 ghosts, solves puzzles and restores light to rooms.

locale.title: Le manoir hante et les 999 fantomes
locale.synopsis: L'attraction de Disneyland fait une apparition de jeu vidéo dans le manoir hanté et les 999 fantômes. Dans la célèbre maison, un garçon chargé de la tâche peu enviable de mettre au repos 999 esprits maléfiques en essayant de ne pas devenir le numéro 1000. Inspiré par À la fois le film et le tour, les environnements de Haunted Mansion comportent des casse-tête uniques, des passages secrets, et beaucoup de secteurs pour que vous puissiez courir, sauter, combattre, et escalader votre chemin à travers le manoir. Il n'y a pas de retour en arrière maintenant.

game.name: Chronicles Of Narnia, The - The Lion, The Witch And The Wardrobe

locale.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, The Witch, and
Le Monde de Narnia: Le Lion, la Sorciere Blanche et l'Armoire Magique
locale.synopsis: Le Monde de Narnia : Chapitre 1 : Le Lion la Sorciere Blanche et l'Armoire Magique reprend l'univers du film (et donc aussi celui du livre de C.S. Lewis) dans un jeu d'action sur GBA. Le joueur dirige les enfants Pevensie dans leur lutte pour sauver Narnia de la terrible menace que représente la Sorcière Blanche.

game.name: Le Monde De Némo - L'aventure Continue

locale.title: Le Monde de Némo : L'Aventure Continue
Le Monde de Némo : L'Aventure Continue
locale.synopsis: Le Monde de Nemo : L'Aventure Continue sur GBA rassemble une série de mini-jeux tirés du scénario du film de Pixar/Disney. Vous retrouverez tous les personnages du long métrage dans 22 mini-jeux différents.

locale.title: The Land Before Time
locale.synopsis:
Exploring a cave at the edge of the Great Valley, Littlefoot and his friends are trapped by a rock fall. As they try to find a way out, Spike notices they are not alone? There?s a Sharptooth sleeping in the cave! The young dinosaurs scatter and soon become lost in the Mysterious Beyond? Cera has been captured in the desert by a Scorposaurus. Spike is trapped on an island deep in the swamp by an angry Sharptooth. Ducky is hiding from a Spiderdon in the caves.
Petrie soon finds Littlefoot and the two of them set out to rescue their friends and get home.

locale.title: Le Petit Dinosaure
locale.synopsis: Basé sur le dessin animé, ce titre propose d'incarner le dinosaure de votre choix pour de folles compétitions au sein d'un décor coloré et cartoon.

locale.title: Charlotte's Web
locale.synopsis:
Charlotte's Web is based on the new 2006 holiday hit movie released by Nickelodean Movies, Walden Media, and Paramount Pictures.
Play as Wilbur, the pig, or Templeton, the rat throughout four settings: Zuckerman Farm, the countryside, a junkyard, and the Country Fair. Throughout the journey, you'll unlock arcade-style mini-games and take on a variety of amusing and complex missions. Collect letters of the alphabet to help Charlotte spell out messages in her web, stash firewood so Mr. Zuckerman can't cook in his smokehouse, release rats imprisoned by the nasty crows, and collect tickets so Fern and Avery can play at the carnival
The game features a wide range of gameplay elements that include exploration, stealth, and puzzles. Be rewarded with high-quality movie stills and sharp gameplay visuals.
Nintendo DS has even more exclusive features including taking on the role of Fern and use the stylus to feed, bathe, or pet Wilbur, as well as a variety of unlockable mini-games, including Wi-Fi and touch screen mini-games.

locale.title: Le Petit Monde de Charlotte
locale.synopsis: Le Petit Monde de Charlotte est un jeu d'action et de plates-formes sur Gameboy Advance, reprenant l'univers du film du même nom, lui-même inspiré du roman éponyme de E.B.White. Le titre vous propose d'incarner Wilbur, le petit cochon futé de l'histoire, en évitant à tout prix les pièges tendus par Monsieur Arable et les autres animaux belliqueux.

locale.title: The Polar Express
locale.synopsis: An adventure game based on the CGI-animated Robert Zemeckis movie starring Tom Hanks and based on the children's book by Chris Van Allsburg. When a doubting young boy takes an extraordinary train ride to the North Pole, he embarks on a journey of self-discovery that shows him that the wonder of life never fades for those who believe. Climb aboard the Polar Express and meet memorable characters from the film as you race across train tops, ride runaway rail cars, and sort through mountains of presents. Explore massive 3D environments including the North Pole and The Polar Express. Interact with recognizable characters from the movie, including Hero Girl, Know-it-All, Lonely Boy, Hero Boy, the Hobo, Smokey & Steamer and the Elves. Play mini-games, solve puzzles, and search for lost presents.

locale.title: Le pôle express
locale.synopsis: Montez à bord du Pôle Express, un train magique qui vous mène jusqu'au pôle Nord ! Rencontrez les personnages du film en montant sur le toit du train, en conduisant des voitures folles et en vous frayant un chemin parmi des montagnes de cadeaux. Une aventure extraordinaire vous attend !

locale.title: The Lion King 1 1/2
locale.synopsis: Timon and Pumbaa return to let you experience all their adventures in the Lion King films. The Lion King 1 1/2 offers three gameplay modes: solo, collaborative, and team-up. In each mode, you must master each character's unique abilities to overcome various obstacles and challenges. As you progress through the levels, you can unlock special challenges, bonus levels, and clips from the movie The Lion King 1 1/2. Now you can relive the movie's story and interact with its characters, including Simba and Rafiki.

game.name: Lord Of The Rings, The - The Fellowship Of The Ring

locale.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
locale.synopsis: J.R.R. Tolkien's Middle-earth is a land of beauty, magic, and darkness. In The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring, you follow Tolkien's narrative from the Shire to the halls of Moria, and finally to the banks of the River Anduin. Gameplay alternates between melee, archery, sorcery, and stealth as you control Frodo, Gandalf, and Aragorn. Join this band of heroes in their quest to destroy the One Ring, which contains all the power of the dark lord Sauron.

locale.title: Le Seigneur des anneaux : La Communauté de l'anneau
locale.synopsis: Revivez l'histoire originale du premier livre du Seigneur des Anneaux en incarnant tour à tour le magicien Gandalf, le guerrier Aragorn et le Hobbit Frodon. Le jeu puise directement son inspiration dans le livre et laisse donc de côté tout le design issu du film de Peter Jackson.

game.name: Lord Of The Rings, The - The Return Of The King

locale.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
locale.synopsis: Return to Middle-earth in a game based on the epic final chapter of the The Lord of the Rings movie trilogy. Developed using the same digital assets as the films, The Return of the King recreates in stunning detail the final events of the War of the Ring. Become the heroes who determine the fate of Middle-earth as you traverse the haunted Paths of the Dead, defend Minas Tirith, and even play co-op multiplayer with a friend as you march against the impenetrable Black Gates of Mordor. The fate of Middle-earth is in your hands.

locale.title: Le Seigneur des anneaux : Le Retour du roi
locale.synopsis: Incarnez l'un des 9 héros principaux tirés du 3ème volet des aventures cinématographiques du Seigneur des Anneaux et revivez les plus féroces batailles de l'histoire de la Terre du Milieu.

locale.title: The Lord of the Rings : Ou no Kikan

game.name: Lord Of The Rings, The - The Third Age

locale.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Third Age
locale.synopsis: In The Lord of the Rings: The Third Age, you can travel in the wake of the Fellowship while exploring your own path and periodically intersecting the major events of the film trilogy. Through both familiar and new locations, you must fight to save or destroy Middle-earth in an epic adventure. Encounter the demonic Balrog in the Mines of Moria, defend the fallen city of Osgiliath, or try to destroy Helm's Deep. These choices and many more will confront you as you align yourself with the people of Middle-earth or undertake missions on behalf of Sauron.

locale.title: Le Seigneur des anneaux : Le Tiers-Age
locale.synopsis: Parcourez la Terre du Milieu avec six nouveaux personnages jouables issus de la trilogie. Améliorez vos héros grâce à un système de gestion des compétences et à plus d'un demi-million de combinaisons d'armes, d'objets et d'armures. Essayez un tout nouveau système de combats au tour par tour pour un contrôle stratégique total lors des confrontations. Faites équipe avec un ami grâce au mode coopératif.

locale.title: The Lord of the Rings : Nakatsukuni Daisanki

game.name: Lord Of The Rings, The - The Two Towers

locale.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
locale.synopsis: The second chapter in the epic story of Middle-earth pits you against Sauron and the evil forces of Mordor. In The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers, you'll battle an army of 10,000 Uruk-Hai on the walls of Helm's Deep, hordes of Orcs on the plains of Rohan, and even the monstrous Cave Troll in Balin's Tomb. Guide Aragorn, Gimli, or Legolas through 13 interactive environments, using each character's unique moves, skills, and weaponry to complete your quest.

locale.title: Le Seigneur des anneaux : Les Deux Tours
locale.synopsis: La version GBA du Seigneur des Anneaux : Les Deux Tours regroupe les événements contés dans les deux premiers films à la manière d'un hack and slash. Vous contrôlez Aragorn, Legolas, Frodon et même Gandalf pour avancer dans votre quête vers les Terres du Mordor.

locale.title: The Lord of the Rings : Futatsu no Tou
Léa : Passion Vétérinaire
locale.synopsis: Avec Léa Passion Vétérinaire sur GBA, soignez vos animaux préférés : examinez les malades, faites votre diagnostic et accueillez-les au sein de votre clinique. Pour les guérir, il faut leur apporter les soins nécessaires mais aussi jouer avec eux et veiller à ce qu'ils aient à manger. Gérez au mieux la clinique : acquérez de nouveaux instruments de soin, de la nourriture, des jouets et aussi de nouveaux bâtiments pour recueillir les animaux.

game.name: Legend Of Dynamic Goushouden - Houkai No Rondo

locale.title: Legend of Dynamic Goushouden - Houkai no Rondo
Legend of Dynamic Goushouden : Houkai no Rondo
Legends of Wrestling II
locale.synopsis:
The sequel is enhanced and improved first part, in which you control a fighter or a party of them in most unbloody fighting sport, which is called wrestling. Over 65 famous "Champions" are available to you, such as Hulk Hogan, Andre The Giant, Rowdy Roddy Piper, Bruno Sammartino, Bret "Hitman" Hart, Sid Vicious, "Big Poppa Pump" Scott Steiner and Jerry "The King" Lawler.
There are many types of fights, including 6- and 8-man Elimination Bouts, Cage, Battle Royal, Ladder, Table and 3- and 4-way dances, also Body Slam Challenge with Big John Studd and tag-team tournaments with great teams such as The Road Warriors, Steiner Brothers, British Bulldogs, Nasty Boys, Rock-n-Roll Express and more.
Create-A-Legend feature now is bigger and better, allowing players to make their ultimate grappler.

locale.title: LEGO Bionicle
locale.synopsis: LEGO Bionicle is an Action game, developed by Saffire and published by Lego Media, which was released in 2001.

Il n'existe plus que le chaos sur l'île Mata-Nui depuis que le maléfique Makut est arrivé. Heureusement, une légende raconte que six héros délivreraient l'île. Sans plus attendre, vous partez à l'aventure et gardez l'espoir de pourvoir changer les choses.

locale.title: LEGO Island - Xtreme Stunts
locale.synopsis:
Island Xtreme Stunts is a mixture of different genres in a single game. The player explores a LEGO-based environment in an open world format: ride a skateboard, drive, fly and pilot a range of vehicles all whilst performing stunts and tricks while taking on the bad guy, Brickster. The player is cast as Pepper Roni, a lead stuntman in a big movie production set on LEGO Island.
Even though the player is free to go wherever he wants, there is a story behind the game divided over 25 missions. All the missions are stunt-based. Running around the world in 3rd-person view, the controls are pretty basic and do not offer the trick combinations of other stunt/trick-based games. It is easy to pick up and play, even for the younger players, without worrying too much about what button combination will do what trick. Instead the player can focus on the missions by only having to complete basic tricks with a few button presses.

locale.title: LEGO Island 2 - The Brickster's Revenge
locale.synopsis: The Brickster is back and out to cause more mischief in this wild, racing, chasing, island-hopping sequel. In your quest to piece together The Informaniac's Constructopedia, you'll drive, scuba-dive, fly a place and even ride a dinosaur as you chase the Brickster down through these amazing new LEGOÂ® worlds. Meet all kinds of fun characters along the way as you journey through the game. You'll need all your skills to solve the puzzles and achieve your ultimate goal, to prevent LEGO Island being ruined.

locale.title: LEGO Knights Kingdom
locale.synopsis: Lego Knights Kingdom est un jeu inspiré de l'univers médiéval des petites briques de plastique. Il y est question de quatre chevaliers partis à la recherche du Coeur du bouclier magique des âges. Avant de le trouver, ils devront faire leur preuves au travers de neuf quêtes remplies de monstres à combattre.

locale.title: LEGO Racers 2
locale.synopsis:
Following the first game, Rocket Racer issues a new challenge to find the best racer in the galaxy, summoning the greatest racers of all time to Planet Xalax for the Galactic Racing Championship. Players must prove their driving skills in four different worlds to qualify for the ultimate race on planet Xalax.
The Story Game mode is where all the real action of Lego Racers 2 takes place. In this mode, you become a new racer, determined to become Galactic Racing Champion. Along the way, other racers challenge you as your quest to become number 1 continues. The more races you win, the more Golden Blocks you receive and also the more parts for your car you win. Golden Blocks help you move throughout the different levels of the game. You start out with zero Golden Blocks and move up as you win more races.
There are also a number of multiplayer modes - with or without CPU cars. The game supports 4-way link-up.

Lego Racers 2 est un jeu de courses sur Gameboy Advance. Vous devez vaincre vos adversaires pour gravir les échelons et arriver enfin à battre le meilleur pilote de l'univers Rocket Racer. Le soft offre une multitude de circuits variés et plusieurs objets à récolter qui facilitent votre course.

locale.title: LEGO Soccer Mania
locale.synopsis: In Lego Soccer Mania, you can play soccer any way you want. Start by building your own team from over 150 different players, ranging from pirates and knights to Arctic explorers. Then, practice your shots in the Skill Zone. Once you're ready for the big game, you can challenge the opposition across various action-packed environments, using power-ups to gain the competitive edge. Lego Soccer Mania takes you on wild tracks with various themes, from the Wild West to Mars.

game.name: Lego Star Wars - The Video Game

locale.title: LEGO Star Wars - The Video Game
locale.synopsis: Lego Star Wars blends Lego toys with the characters, stories, and vehicles from the prequel eras of the Star Wars universe. Now you can experience scenes from The Phantom Menace, Attack of the Clones, and Revenge of the Sith while controlling characters such as Obi-Wan Kenobi, Yoda, and Anakin Skywalker. Use the Jedi "force" to solve puzzles and manipulate environments. During your journey, you'll do everything from pod racing on Mos Espa to repelling the droid onslaught in the Genosian arena. Your friend can even join the action to help you at any time during your game.

locale.title: LEGO Star Wars : Le Jeu Vidéo
locale.synopsis: Lego Star Wars : Le Jeu Vidéo sur GBA vous propose de revivre la trilogie des épisodes I à III en compagnie des petits bonshommes jaunes démontables. Retrouvez les grands moments des films et combattez la menace Sith dans la peau de nombreux personnages : de puissants Jedi (dont Obi-Wan Kenobi, Anakin Skywalker et le Maître Yoda), de courageux droïdes comme R2-D2 ou encore le maladroit Binks, Chewbacca le Wookie et bien d'autres encore.

game.name: Lego Star Wars 2 - The Original Trilogy

locale.title: LEGO Star Wars II - The Original Trilogy
locale.synopsis: Lego Star Wars II: The Original Trilogy has you controlling LEGO versions of the original Star Wars heroes.

locale.title: LEGO Star Wars II : La Trilogie Originale
locale.synopsis: Lego Star Wars II : La Trilogie Originale sur GBA est un jeu d'action dans lequel on retrouve les petits bonshommes jaunes nous retraçant les origines de la saga de George Lucas. Retrouvez donc Un Nouvel Espoir, L'Empire Contre-Attaque et Le Retour du Jedi dans un seul et même jeu où vous pouvez contrôler chaque personnage de la série, quel qu'il soit, et refaire les niveaux avec n'importe qui. Utilisez votre sabre laser et le pouvoir de la Force pour défaire Dark Vador.

game.name: Jackie Chan Adventures - Legend of the Dark Hand

locale.title: Jackie Chan Adventures : Legend of the Dark Hand
locale.synopsis: Are you Chan enough? As Jackie Chan, martial arts master and expert archeologist, you have | to take a quest around the world to defeat the evil Dark Hand organization. Their sinister demons seek to enter the earthly realm and it's up to you and your cunning wit, martial arts skill and magical scrolls to stop them in their tracks.

locale.title: Les Aventures de Jackie Chan : La Légende de la Main Noire
locale.synopsis: Jackie Chan Adventures sur Gameboy Advance est un jeu d'action inspiré du dessin animé du même nom. Le héros est un expert en artefacts anciens doublé d'un agent secret pour la "section 13" du gouvernement. Sa nièce de onze ans devient son apprentie et partenaire dans ses aventures autour du globe. Tous deux sont à la recherche de douze talismans sacrés sensés protéger la Terre de démons chinois et accordant des pouvoirs fantastiques.

locale.title: Piglet's Big Game
locale.synopsis: It is another blustery day in the Hundred Acre Wood and Pooh, Tigger, Roo, Rabbit, Owl and Eeyore are having bad dreams of Heffalumps and Woozles. Pooh dreams that his honey is gone. Rabbit dreams his harvesting machine is broken. Roo dreams his ball is stuck in a tree. And Eeyore has lost the colors in his dreams. In this fun-filled adventure in dreams it is up to Piglet to save the day by being the bravest Piglet of all!

locale.title: Les Aventures de Porcinet
locale.synopsis: Rien ne va plus dans la forêt des Rêves Bleus. Winnie et Tigrou ont des ennuis. Qu'à cela ne tienne Porcinet va venir les sauver dans le jeu d'aventure Les Aventures de Porcinet sur Gameboy Advance. Explorez avec lui 7 mondes différents et échappez aux éphélants et aux nouiffes.

locale.title: Care Bears - The Care Quests
locale.synopsis: Care Bears: Care Quest is an Action game, developed by Sirius Games and published by The Game Factory, which was released in 2005.

locale.title: Les Bisounours : Mission Calins
locale.synopsis: Les Bisounours : Mission Calins sur GBA est un jeu de plates-formes et de réflexion dans l'univers des petites peluches toutes mignonnes. Choisissez votre bisounours préféré parmi ceux disponibles et partez vivre d'adorables aventures au pays de Bisouland.

game.name: Lemony Snicket's A Series Of Unfortunate Events

locale.title: Lemony Snicket's A Series of Unfortunate Events
locale.synopsis:
Based on the movie (and first three books of the series), Lemony Snicket's a Series of Unfortunate Events for Game Boy Advance puts players in the unfortunate shoes of the incredibly unlucky Baudelaire orphans: Violet, Klaus, and Sunny.
Each orphan has an unusual talent that will let them progress through three chapters (each with over a dozen levels). Though the game looks like a traditional side-scroller, combat takes a backseat to clever puzzle-solving and adventure game elements. The three orphans must use their talents, along with items found in the world, and various interactions to escape each level and avoid the evil Count Olaf and his elaborate plans to inherit the children's fortune.
Inventions also take a big role in this game, and players will have to assemble them from common household objects. For example, in one level, Violet will be hunting for ice cream scoopers, soup cans, and a crank to invent an "apple chucker" which can help defeat Count Olaf's friends.
The game offers quite a bit of replayability, too, with quest points and exotic books earned for discovering all the game's quirky secrets.

locale.title: Les Désastreuses Aventures des Orphelins Baudelaire
locale.synopsis: Les Désastreuses Aventures des Orphelins Baudelaire est un jeu tiré du film lui-même inspiré par une oeuvre littéraire. Après avoir perdu leurs parents dans un mystérieux incendie, les orphelins sont envoyés chez leur sinistre oncle, le comte Olaf, qui ne reculera devant rien pour mettre la main sur la fortune de la famille Baudelaire. Jouez alternativement avec Klaus, Violette et Prunille Baudelaire dans de nombreuses missions plus ou moins tirées de l'oeuvre originale

locale.title: Franklin's Great Adventures
locale.synopsis: Franklin's Great Adventures is an adventure cross-platform game that plays out in eight episodes. It features three playable characters: Franklin and his two friends, Bear and Beaver. In the course of the episodes the three kids help the people of their town.

locale.title: Les Grandes Aventures de Franklin
locale.synopsis: Les Grandes Aventures de Franklin sur GBA regroupe une multitude de mini-jeux dans lesquels vous incarnez Franklin et aidez tous les personnages fétiches de la série dans un série de challenges plus amusants les uns que les autres.
