Oddworld : Munch's Oddysee est jeu de plates-formes/aventures sorti sur Gameboy Advance. Contrôlez Munch ou Abe pour les sortir des griffes des scientifiques fous qui les ont capturés. Pour cela, usez et abusez des boissons fortifiantes et des armes farfelues mises à leur disposition.

game.name: Ohanaya-san Monogatari Gba - Iyashikei Ohanaya-san Ikusei Game

locale.title: Ohanaya-san Monogatari GBA : Iyashikei Ohanaya-san Ikusei Game
One Piece
locale.synopsis: One Piece on Gameboy Advance or the eternal quest of Monkey D. Luffy to become the king of pirates. A platform game where the hero gains many abilities, taken from the series. In addition to a main quest sprinkled with boss to beat, the game offers some mini-games.

One Piece sur Gameboy Advance ou l'éternelle quête de Monkey D. Luffy pour devenir le roi des pirates. Un jeu de plates-formes où le héros acquiert de nombreuses capacités, tirées de la série. Outre a quête principale parsemée de boss à battre, le jeu propose quelques mini-jeux.

game.name: One Piece - Going Baseball - Haejeok Yaku

locale.title: One Piece - Going Baseball - Haejeok Yaku

game.name: One Piece - Going Baseball - Kaizoku Yakyuu

locale.title: One Piece - Going Baseball - Kaizoku Yakyuu
One Piece : Going Baseball, Kaizoku Yakyuu

locale.synopsis: One Piece Dragon Dream! est un RPG d'action mettant en vedette le héros de la série Luffy comme personnage principal. Le jeu commence quand Luffy rencontre une mystérieuse fille et finit par perdre sa mémoire. Pour restaurer sa mémoire, Luffy et ses amis décident de revivre des aventures passées,en sélectionnant de nouveaux endroits à partir de votre carte pirate et en travaillant à travers des séquences d'histoires qui représentent une histoire originale créée exclusivement pour le jeu. Lorsque vous effacez des événements, les souvenirs restaurés de Luffy sont stockés sur un graphique pour une visualisation rapide.

locale.title: Onimusha Tactics
locale.synopsis:
Young warrior, Onimaru is given the Oni Gauntlet as he rushes to defend his village from the demon hordes of Nobunaga Oda. Onimaru soon discovers from the old man Sandayu, that although he has been living in the peaceful province of Iga, he is of the Oni clan and had been secreted away. Additionally, with the power of the Oni Gauntlet, he can absorb the souls of enemies and use the demon Genma stones to recreate lost weapons and armor. With this new knowledge of who his is and of his destiny, he assembles a hasty squad of fighters including his sister Ororo and sets off to avenge his province and stop Nobunaga's demonic war upon the land.
Onimusha Tactics is a turn-based strategy game between the player's side and the enemy's side. In each level you can bring a squad of no more than 10 people. There are no items to buy or sell, however equipment is available and customizable. Upgrades of existing weapons and armor can be done using the defeated souls of enemies absorbed into the Oni Gauntlet. New weapons and armor can be found or created through fusion of Genma Stones. Recipes must be found for each separate item before it can be fused.
Most characters have a normal attack, the ability to use items and several special techniques for battle. Additionally there is an issen ability that randomly shows up and allows your character to counter-attack and instantly kill any enemy who foolishly attacks that character directly in the next round.

Onimusha Tactics est un jeu de stratégie tactique au tour par tour sorti sur Gameboy Advance. Retrouvez l'ambiance de la saga des Onimusha dans cet opus portable qui vous permet de gérer vos armées lors d'affrontements dantesques.

locale.title: Operation Armored Liberty
locale.synopsis: Operation: Armored Liberty puts gamers in command of an M1A1 Abrams Battle Tank as they battle against Soviet-built T72s, take out S.C.U.D. launchers, and Iraqi helicopter gun-ships. The object: liberate Baghdad.

locale.title: Oriental Blue : Ao no Tengai
locale.synopsis: Oriental Blue: Ao No Tengaiis an RPG from the Far East of Eden series. It has a unique magic system and different pathways the story can take depending on in-game choices.

Oriental Blue : Ao no Tengai est un jeu de rôle sur Gameboy Advance. Dans un pays qui ressemble étrangement au Japon médiéval, vous incarnez Tenran et Aoi, deux jeunes adolescents bien décidés à combattre la sombre menace qui plane sur leur terre sacrée. La principale particularité du titre vient de la progression de l'histoire, qui est non-linéaire. Ainsi, si vous perdez contre un boss, le jeu ne se termine pas, mais une histoire différente s'ouvre à vous.

locale.title: Noddy - A Day in Toyland
locale.synopsis: Noddy wakes up in his colourful building block house and starts his day with a smile. Driving around Toyland he meets several friends who are in need of help -and Noddy is always willing to lend a hand. Play and interact with Noddy and other favourite characters from Toyland including Big Ears, Mr. Sparks, Miss Pink Cat, Tessie Bear, Dinah Doll, Martha Monkey and Mr. Wobbly Man. Visit Big Ears or help Mr Sparks locate his tools or find Tessie Bear's dog and help her make delicious strawberry ice cream.

locale.title: Oui-Oui : Une Journée au Pays des Jouets
locale.synopsis: Le héros de la série va donc devoir diligemment remplir les différentes missions que les habitants vont lui confier. Ainsi, il faudra conduire Potiron récupérer sa bicyclette ou emmener les Quillons à la gare afin qu'ils ne manquent pas le départ du train.

locale.title: Ozzy & Drix
locale.synopsis: A 2D platformer with 3D elements, Ozzy & Drix is based on the hit cartoon series from the Kids' WB! which in turn is based on the movie Osmosis Jones. Join the gross-out adventures of a white blood cell "cop," Ozzy, and his over-the-counter cold pill sidekick, Drix. Fans of the hit series will now be part of the action on Game Boy Advance. Whiz down a blood cell highway in the "Cel Camino," provide protection from the dreaded "Phlegm-alanche," face off against nemesis Spryman and Gluteus and more as Ozzy & Drix live and play in their world inside teenage boy Hector Cruz.

Ozzy & Drix sur Gameboy Advance est un jeu de plates-formes basé du dessin animé éponyme. Nos héros étant des cellules à l'intérieur d'un humain, vous irez à la rescousse du maire de la cité intestinale d'Hector à travers des graphismes 3D et une progression horizontale.

game.name: Paard And Pony - Paard In Galop

locale.title: Pac-Man Collection
locale.synopsis:
Four classic Pac-Man games are included in this collection from Namco:
1. Pac-Man: The original arcade classic, complete and un-cut. 2. Pac-Mania: A conversion of the 1987 update to Pac-Man, which takes the elements of the original arcade game and puts it into an isometric view, as well as adding the ability to jump. 3. Pac-Man Arrangement: Never re-produced outside of the arcade, Arrangement again uses the elements of the original Pac-Man and adds a fifth ghost, who can change shape and size when combined with the other 4 ghosts, and make life harder for Pac-Man. New power-ups are also included, like the ability to dash quickly around the screen, warp points to get from one place to the other and new ways of catching ghosts. Pac-Attack: Like Tetris before it, you must fit falling blocks together to complete a line to clear the screen. In this case, the falling tiles also have ghosts in them, and once the Pac-Man tile appears (a tile with the Pac-Man symbol), Pac-Man will eat all of the ghosts that are in his path until he gets to a dead end.

Pac-Man Collection est un jeu d'action sur Gameboy Advance. Jouez avec le glouton Pac-Man et avalez tout sur votre passage : fantômes, billes et fruits. Découvrez le mode Arcade Pac-Man Arrangement spécial, avec des niveaux en 3D, des coups spéciaux, des pouvoirs et des gros fantômes.

locale.title: Pac-Man Pinball Advance
locale.synopsis: It's Pac-Man meets Pinball! PMPA merges classic Pac-Man action with pinball, reminiscent of Kirby's Pinball Land, letting the player choose from different table backgrounds, the goal of which is to advance through the tables, hitting certain parts to gain power-ups, even the ability to eat pellets and eat the ghost foes (Blinky, Inky, Pinky and Clyde) and rescue Pac-Mans friends, including Ms. Pac-Man as well. There are also mini-games to be played such as a vertical shooter and classic Pac-Man mazes.

Pac-Man vient rouler sur les tables de flipper. Pac-Man Pinball Advance sur Gameboy advance comprend seize niveaux répartis sur deux flippers et plusieurs mini-jeux. Vous aurez certains objectifs comme délivrer des villageois des griffes des Fantômes. Heureusement, vous pouvez compter sur l'aide de Ms. Pac-Man et des multiples bonus, comme des multi-balles par exemple.

locale.title: Pac-Man World
locale.synopsis: Unlike most "Pac-games," Pac-Man World is a platform-adventure in which the round, yellow hero progresses through over 20 levels of action. He still faces opposition, however, from ghostly nemeses like Inky, Blinky, Pinky, and Clyde. He must also run, jump, and swim his way past other malevolent creatures, such as skeletons, spiders, and killer fish. Thankfully, Pac-Man has a variety of attack methods. Excluding ghosts, most baddies are susceptible to projectile "Pac-Dots," the "Ultra Butt-Bounce" (which also helps him jump higher), or the "Rev Roll," a speed burst allowing Pac-Man to make lengthy jumps off ramps. When disposing of ghosts though, he must first ingest a good old-fashioned Power Pellet, then devour them before its effects wear off.

Pac-Man World est un jeu de plates-formes sur Gameboy Advance vous permettant de jouer avec la plus célèbre petite boule jaune de l'univers vidéoludique dans des décors en 3D. Aidez Pac-Man dans son aventure, et venez à bout des nombreux ennemis qui tentent de lui barrer la route.

locale.title: Pac-Man World 2
locale.synopsis: Long ago, back in medieval times, an evil spirit known as Spooky had terrorized all of Pac-Land. In response to this, the great Wizard Pac created a potion that turned 5 ordinary fruit into the "Golden Fruit." A young knight called Sir Pac-alot fought and sealed Spooky underneath a large tree using the Golden Fruit, which were attached to the branches of the tree. In the present time late at night, Inky, Pinky, Blinky and Clyde sneak into the village and, in their mischief, pick the Golden Fruit off the tree in the center of town. Unfortunately, this has released Spooky from his prison. Spooky tells the ghosts to take the Golden Fruit and follow him if they wish to rid the land of the Pac-people forever. When Pac-Man awakes, he hears the news from Professor Pac about the Golden Fruit and Spooky, and sets off to defeat the ghosts and Spooky.

Spooky, le meilleur ennemi du célèbre Pac-Man, s'est échappé de la prison dans laquelle il avait été enfermé. Aidez le célèbre mangeur de fantômes dans Pac-Man World 2, un jeu de plates-formes sur GBA, à venir à bout des plans machiavéliques du vil Spooky, et à ramener sérénité et calme au Pac-Village et à Pac-Land.

game.name: Paws And Claws - Best Friends - Dogs And Cats

locale.title: Paws & Claws : Best Friends, Dogs & Cats
Paws & Claws : Pet Resort
locale.synopsis: Care for and pamper all of your favorite creatures at your own Paws & Claws Pet Resort. Nurture and love the animals to grow your pet care business and become every animal's best friend!

locale.title: Payback
locale.synopsis:
Influenced by Grand Theft Auto, Payback is set across 4 different cities totaling 100 square kilometers of landscape. You can perform all manner of illegal activities to try to achieve wealth, including carjackings, murders, shootings and run-overs.
Stealing vehicles is the real meat of the game, as these must be used for the various missions, which are obtained by walking over to phone boxes, as in GTA. There are dozens of these, all with different handling characteristics, and include trucks, buses and even boats.
The mission structures are non-linear, meaning that how you perform in one part can affect how later parts unfold, and the game includes Perspective Corrected 3D graphics with realistic shadows and rotational effect, as well as a full 3D soundtrack of aggressive rap and mid-tempo rock.

Payback sur GBA est un jeu d'action s'inspirant librement des premiers GTA. Avec sa vue hélicoptère, dirigez un petit malfrat dans les rues d'une grande ville, chargé de remplir des missions pour les caïds du coin. Volez des voitures, commettez des effractions, tuez, pillez s'il le faut mais veillez à remplir vos objectifs.

game.name: Pazuninn - Umininn No Puzzle De Nimu

locale.title: Pazuninn - Umininn no Puzzle de Nimu
Pazuninn : Umininn no Puzzle de Nimu
Penny Racers
locale.synopsis: Sometime in the 1980s, the Japanese Choro-Q Racing toys made their way to U.S. shores. Renamed Penny Racers for the benefit of American sales, the wind-up cars were built to perform different tricks (wheelies and spins, mostly) when a penny was inserted into their chassis. The plastic racers are still very popular in Japan, inspiring a video game called CHORO-Q ADVANCE. The U.S. release of the game is called GADGET RACERS, and it's every bit as exciting as the toys that it's based on. Command any of 50 unique vehicles through 40 different courses of obstacles, tricks, and general mayhem. You can customize your racer to meet your specifications, using more than 130 different parts to soup things up upgrade your tires, brakes, steering, engines, and more. Adding to the excitement is the fact that you can get four players competing for glory via a link cable and for Game Boy Advance consoles. It's a mystery why the toys no longer roam the bedroom floors of American households, but maybe this awesome video game will create a resurgence.

Penny Racers est un jeu de courses sur Gameboy Advance. Équipez votre véhicule de nombreux gadgets, et prenez place à de nombreuses courses totalement délirantes seul ou à plusieurs au volant de voitures miniatures.

locale.title: Peter Pan - Return to Neverland
locale.synopsis: Disney's Peter Pan: Return to Never Land is an Action game, developed by Crawfish Interactive and published by Disney Interactive Studios, which was released in 2002.

locale.title: Peter Pan : Retour Au Pays Imaginaire
locale.synopsis: Vous incarnez Peter Pan qui doit aller sauver la fée clochette des mains du Capitaine Crochet. Le problème étant que sans Clochette, Peter ne peut plus voler...

game.name: Peter Pan - The Motion Picture Event

locale.title: Peter Pan : The Motion Picture Event
locale.synopsis: Explore, soar and save the day in an action-packed epic adventure, based on Universal Studios' motion picture event, Peter Pan. Play as Peter Pan and join Wendy, John, Michael and Tinker Bell on a fantastic journey from London to Neverland. Relive fierce pirate battles, hair-raising danger, narrow escapes and ultimately face off against the notorious Captain Hook. Played from a three-quarter view perspective, Peter Pan can fly, jump, dive, roll, walk, and use his sword to fight enemies. In addition to combat, puzzle solving, and platform jumping, players have to collect special objects for extra lives and bonus points. Developed by Saffire, Peter Pan also features digitized scenes from the movie.

Peter Pan : The Motion Picture Event est un jeu d'action sur Gameboy Advance. Incarnez Peter Pan dans cette aventure épique pleine d'action et combattez des pirates sanguinaires, évitez d'effroyables dangers avant d'affronter le célèbre capitaine Crochet. Avant d'en arriver là, vous devrez remplir de nombreuses petites missions, comme récupérer des pièces d'or, ou éviter un chien.

locale.title: Petz : Hamsterz Life 2
locale.synopsis:
This is the second game in the Petz Hamsterz series. Adopt a hamster to care for and train. Choose from five types of hamsterz. Watch your hamster grow and build his own Ham-Country that other hamsterz can move to.
The better you raise your hamster, the bigger he becomes, and the more energy he has to build a big Ham-Country. Compete against your friends in mini-games.

locale.title: Petz Vet
locale.synopsis: Petz Vet introduces players to life as a veterinarian, diagnosing and treating 35 different medical cases. Being a vet is always an interesting occupation, as you quickly learn while taking care of a dog with a broken leg, a bunny with a stomach ache, a cat with asthma, a sunburned frog, a bird with - who knows? Do you know what happens when a dog accidentally swallows aspirin? You'll learn, when you assume the role of veterinarian in this busy animal hospital. In addition to taking care of the animals' medical needs, you can also perform some basic caretaking functions, such as washing and grooming your pet.

game.name: Pferd And Pony - Best Friends - Mein Pferd

locale.title: Pferd & Pony - Best Friends - Mein Pferd
Pferd & Pony : Best Friends, Mein Pferd

game.name: Pferd And Pony - Lass Uns Reiten 2

locale.title: Phalanx
locale.synopsis:
A futuristic shooter, Phalanx is the name of the prototype starfighter flown by Wink Baufield, a genetically enhanced pilot. It is sent to protect and reclaim Delia IV, a planet in the Andromeda galaxy, which has been colonized by humans for interstellar research purposes. However, an unknown and powerful alien force has overtaken the planet, the military defenses have been completely overwhelmed, and all hope rests on the Phalanx.
You fly through eight levels, first through various locations in Delia IV, and then you invade the aliens themselves. Like most shooters, you can upgrade your weapons by picking up bonus items dropped by enemy craft.

Phalanx est le nom du vaisseau que vous pilotez dans ce shoot'em up sur votre Gameboy Advance. La planète Delia IV de la galaxie Andromède est attaquée par des aliens. Le seul espoir des hommes réside dans le vaisseau prototype que pilote Wink Baufield. Après avoir défendu la galaxie Andromède, il devra attaquer les aliens à la source pour exterminer la menace. En détruisant les navettes ennemies, de nombreux bonus apparaissent, vous donnant des missiles plus puissants.

locale.title: Phantasy Star Collection
locale.synopsis:
This collection contains the original Phantasy Star trilogy, together in one game. Phantasy Star has you leading a group of warriors, working in the arts of combat (both offensive and defensive) and magic, through a maze of evil into the heart of where it resides. It is your job to destroy it, in this case, three times over.
1. Phantasy Star - travel to the Algo Solar System and take on King Lassic, who has brought the menace of evil to the galaxy.
2. Phantasy Star II - a new evil is taking over the planet Mota, and only you can restore peace and defeat the deadly forces that come in waves on your path victory.
3. Phantasy Star III: Generations of Doom - although defeated, evil still finds a place in the galaxy. Take your party to 7 different worlds through 3 generations, and use all you have to rid it once and for all.
The Saturn version has Phantasy Star IV: The End of the Millennium as well.

Phantasy Star Collection est une collection de 3 jeux de rôles sortis sur Gameboy Advance. Que vous ayez raté les premiers pas de la saga Phantasy Star, ou tout simplement que vous vouliez revivre l'expérience de ces épisodes, cette cartouche Gameboy Advance comblera vos attentes.

locale.title: Phil of the Future
locale.synopsis: Players help their favorite characters from the popular Disney Channel series save a town overrun with the mischievous pets from the future "The Blahs". As Phil, Keeley or Curtis, players collect and assemble more than 20 futuristic gadgets to solve puzzles, overcome obstacles and capture the blahs to save the day. With several mini-games and unlockable features, "Phil of the Future" offers players hours of fun.

game.name: Pikapika Nurse Monogatari - Nurse Ikusei Game

locale.title: Pikapika Nurse Monogatari - Nurse Ikusei Game
Pikapika Nurse Monogatari : Nurse Ikusei Game
Pinball Advance
locale.synopsis: Pinball Advance features the Tarantula, Jailbreak and Daredevil pinball tables, all fully rendered in shiny 3D and each with their own exclusive single and multiball game modes. The Tarantula table will allow budding pinball wizards to venture into the spider?s lair and fight their way onto the scoreboard overcoming the terror of the table. In Jailbreak, players will have to prove their innocence to the judge or escape past the prison guards. Finally, The Daredevil will let players take their chances with the Wheel of Death and The Loop of Fire.

Pinball Advance est un jeu de réflexion sur Gameboy Advance. Le soft propose 3 tables de flipper. Le Dare Devil qui exploite le thème des grosses cylindrées, le Jail Break qui a pour sujet l'évasion d'une prison, ou encore le Tarantula qui traite d'une grosse araignée.

locale.title: Pinball Challenge Deluxe
locale.synopsis: Pinball Challenge Deluxe is an Action game, developed by Binary 9 Studios and published by Ubisoft, which was released in 2002.

Pinball Challenge Deluxe est un jeu de flipper sur Gameboy Advance. Le soft propose pas moins de huit tables de flipper, chacune étant directement accessible dès le début du jeu. On retrouve donc les composantes habituelles de tout jeu du genre : les traditionnelles rampes, les bumpers et toute une flopée de pièges vicieux.

locale.title: Pinball Tycoon
locale.synopsis: Pinball Tycoon is a pinball simulation featuring four themed tables. Each table has its own goals and objectives. Dig for gold in California Gold Rush, strike oil in Black Gold, become a movie millionaire in Hollywood Mogul and win a fortune in Golden Chance.

locale.title: Pink Panther : Pinkadelic Pursuit
locale.synopsis: Pink Panther: Pinkadelic Pursuit is an Action game, developed by Super Empire and published by Wanadoo, which was released in 2002.

Pink Panther : Pinkadelic Pursuit est un jeu de plates-formes et de réflexion sur Gameboy Advance. La Panthère Rose est bien décidée à trouver le trésor caché dans la maison de son oncle. Aidez-la à franchir tous les obstacles qui la séparent de ce fabuleux trésor. Le soft vous propose 6 univers différents à explorer de l'Egypte au château de Dracula en passant par la Préhistoire et le repère de gangsters.

locale.title: Pinobee - Wings of Adventure
locale.synopsis: Pinobee: Wings of Adventure takes full advantage of Game Boy Advance's 32-bit color graphics. From Pinobee's fluid animation to the detailed environments he explores, it's obvious that a lot of spit and polish has been applied to this Pak. Pinobee screenshots may lead you to believe that this is a standard action platform game, but that is far from an accurate description. Pinobee can walk along the ground or shimmy up walls, but his main means of locomotion is dashing through the air. As he makes it deeper in his quest, Pinobee gains the ability to dash farther and farther through the air. Soon enough, he's spending more time hovering and dashing through the sky than on the ground. This unique play control system gives Pinobee a fresh feel.

game.name: Pirates Of The Caribbean - The Curse Of The Black Pearl

locale.title: Pirates of the Caribbean - The Curse of the Black
locale.synopsis: It's mutiny on the high seas as you steal, barter and pillage your way to riches in the video game that accompanies Disney's major live action film for Summer 2003. Search for treasure as you defend your pirating skills with cannons, artillery and swords in an all out battle for the ultimate in pirate booty!

locale.title: Pirates des Caraïbes : La Malédiction du Black Pearl
locale.synopsis: Dans un grand groupement d'îles des Caraïbes durant l'âge d'or de la piraterie et des aventures en haute mer, vous prenez le commandement d'un navire et de son équipage. Dès lors, vous devrez croiser le fer contre d'autres capitaines, accepter les défis et les quêtes, et poursuivre la rumeur du danger et des richesses cachées.Adapté du blockbuster mondial de Disney, ce jeu d'action se voit légèrement teinté de quelques éléments propres au jeu de rôles. En adoptant une perspective isométrique, le soft combine des phases d'action pure à d'autres plus orientées vers l'exploration que le combat.

game.name: Pirates Of The Caribbean - Dead Man's Chest

locale.title: Pirates of the Caribbean - Dead Man's Chest
locale.synopsis:
Based on the follow-up to the blockbuster original movie, Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest follows the movie's unlikely heroes as they explore and brawl across land and sea on a memorable quest in search of the legendary Dead Man's Chest. The games not only features thrilling moments from the movie, but also expands the fantasy of the franchise by offering exciting new adventures and locations inspired by the rich "Pirates of the Caribbean" universe.
The Game Boy Advance version of Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest lets players take the helm of the Black Pearl as Captain Jack Sparrow in three-dimensional seafaring action to battle other ships or sail to 15 islands. The game includes 50 side-scrolling adventure maps.

locale.title: Pirates des Caraïbes : Le Secret du Coffre Maudit
locale.synopsis: Incarnez Jack Sparrow, Will Turner ou Elisabeth Swann et affrontez des pirates fous, des cannibales affamés de chair et de monstrueuses créatures surgies des profondeurs dans une aventure épique qui vous mène d'un bout à l'autre des Caraïbes. Défiez des hordes d'ennemis dans votre quête du coffre maudit en explorant un monde riche et dangereux.

locale.title: Pitfall - The Lost Expedition
locale.synopsis: Deep in the Peruvian Jungle, assume the role of Activision's classic platform hero, Pitfall Harry, a fearless, rough-and-ready treasure seeker who battles evil using his athletic ability and a knapsack filled with adventure gear. Harry competes against a rival explorer to find hidden treasures. The game features over lots of perilous levels, including lush rain forests, creature-ridden caves and vast glacial mountains. Players cross treacherous jungle terrain and dark areas filled with puzzles, tricks and traps, and -- true to the series -- swing on vines, avoid crocodiles and dodge rolling logs as they unearth artifacts and use their cunning to defeat dangerous foes.

Pitfall: "the lost expedition" es la nueva entrega de la que disponemos ahora en game boy advance, con una historia totalmente nueva respecto a las anteriores y muchas novedades tanto en el plano gráfico como en el jugable, todo ello sin descuidar en absoluto sus señas de identidad clásicas. Si dentro del género de las plataformas dejamos a un lado todos los refritos, remakes, ports, etc.., es decir, juegos que ya existían en consolas anteriores como todos los Mario advance por ejemplo, y nos centramos sólo en juegos totalmente nuevos para game boy advance, Pitfall: "the lost expedition" es uno de los mejores exponentes del género para la 32 bits de nintendo por varios motivos que pasamos a ver a continuación....

locale.title: Pitfall : L'Expédition Perdue
locale.synopsis: Pitfall: l'Expédition Perdue est un jeu de plates-formes sur Gameboy Advance. Plongez au coeur de la jungle en incarnant Pitfall Harry, un téméraire explorateur, et tentez de sauver les membres d'une expédition perdue. Il vous faudra déjouer les plans machiavéliques d'un grand prêtre et empêcher votre éternel rival de s'emparer des trésors de l'El Dorado. Mercenaires, crocodiles et scorpions font partie des ennemis que vous devez affronter.

locale.title: Pitfall : The Mayan Adventure
locale.synopsis: Harry Jr. I've been taken captive by the spirit of an evil Mayan warrior. Need help right away! Continue journey as planned - through the rain forests and mines, past the waterfalls and ruins. But be careful...the Mayan empire is filled with deadly traps and enemies. Think fast and move even faster. Hurry! Time is running out... - Pitfall Harry

Pitfall : The Mayan Adventure sur GBA est un jeu de plates-formes. Le joueur incarne Pitfall Harry, un explorateur qui doit évoluer dans la jungle en évitant toutes sortes d'obstacles tels que sables mouvants, serpents, tapirs, singes, jaguars, etc. Il peut éviter les trous, sauter par-dessus les obstacles, rebondir sur les toiles d'araignées, se balancer de liane en liane et attraper d'autres lianes élastiques qui lui permettent de monter verticalement.

locale.title: Pixeline i Pixieland
locale.synopsis: Pixeline i Pixieland is a Danish adventure game featuring Pixeline.

locale.title: Planet Monsters
locale.synopsis: There is only one rule with this game - Be the last one standing no matter what! Planet Monsters must confront themselves in eight unique countries each of 5 levels. Four monsters can play at once, so arm yourself with traps, blocks, jelly guns, grenades...and a great sense of humor!

Planet Monsters est un jeu d'action et de réflexion sur Gameboy Advance. Sélectionnez une créature et lancez-la dans les arènes pour y affronter 3 autres adversaires contrôlés par le jeu ou par d'autres joueurs. Au cours des combats, récoltez un grand nombre de bonus qui sont autant d'atouts pour venir à bout de ses adversaires.

locale.title: Planet of the Apes
locale.synopsis:
Based on the series of 1960's movies that starred legendary actors such as Charlton Heston and Roddy McDowell, the player takes control of a deep space astronaut by the name of Ulysses who crash lands on Earth after 200 years in space and awakens to discover that apes have become the dominant species and has nearly wiped out the human race. Joining with a group of survivors, the player must make their way to the heart of the Ape Empire and stop General Ursus, who is planning a final attack on mankind.
The gameplay is a side-scrolling action game, similar to Prince of Persia, having the player avoid various traps and pitfalls by jumping and climbing. They must also avoid various enemies including armed apes that will try to stop the player at all costs, but the player has weapons of there own. The player will start out with a knife and eventually will upgrade to a pistol and a shotgun.
There are 13 levels in all, with the story being told through still picture cut scenes that are modeled after the films. There is also a password feature for players to pick up and play at their leisure.

locale.title: Planète des Singes
locale.synopsis: Plongez dans l'univers du film de Tim Burton. Votre vaisseau s'est écrasé sur une planète où les singes ont réduit les hommes en esclavage. Face à une horde d'ennemis, vous ne pouvez que compter sur vous-même pour sauver l'humanité.

locale.title: Play Novel - Silent Hill
locale.synopsis:
Play Novel: Silent Hill is a side story to the original Silent Hill. It was only released in Japan. This is an adventure game along the lines of those "Choose Your Own Adventure" books. You are given some illustrated text, then choose from two or three options what you want to do next.
Players control officer Cybill Bennett in an adventure that takes place at the same time as Harry's game in the original. Don't think that because you played Silent Hill, you know how this ends, though.
This game was only released in Japan and outside the menus is entirely in Japanese.

locale.title: Play-Yan
locale.synopsis: The cartridge has an SD flash memory input that allows the user to store and play MP3

locale.title: Pocket Dogs
locale.synopsis: In Pocket Dogs , you interact with eight different dogs in an effort to improve your human-canine relationship. You'll be able to converse with your dog, with the dialogue changing depending on the species. You'll also be able to make the dog play games by sharing toys with it. As the player, you'll be able to play games for yourself via three mini games included in the title. By playing mini games players can win jewels which may be used to purchase items for their canine companion and decorate its living space. Featured breeds include the Pug, Chihuahua, and Shih Tzu. Pocket Dogs is developed in conjunction with the Hana Deka Club, a brand of toys and gifts featuring the signature cute dogs photographed with fisheye lenses.

Pockets Dogs sur Gameboy Advance est un titre où le joueur pourra s'amuser avec des chiots à travers différents mini-jeux. Ces jeux servent à collecter des objets et accessoires pour son animal adoptif ou encore à donner la possibilité de personnaliser l'habitat des chiens.

locale.title: Pocket Music
locale.synopsis: Make music on the move with Pocket Music, the music creation game. Create your own music from a selection of samples, drum beats, baselines, melodies, and other musical instruments. Play them back, save them to your cartridge, or swap them with a friend.

Pocket Music est un jeu de simulation sur Gameboy Advance. Devenez un véritable DJ en mixant l'énorme base de données de samples et enregistrez vos morceaux. Vous pouvez ensuite briller devant vos amis grâce aux morceaux que vous aurez composés. Ce soft est exclusivement solo.

Mit Pocket Music, einem Spiel zum Musik machen, können Sie auch unterwegs musizieren. Erstellen Sie Ihre eigene Musik aus einer Auswahl von Samples, Drumbeats, Baselines, Melodien und anderen Musikinstrumenten. Spielen Sie die Musik ab, speichern Sie sie auf Ihrer Cartridge oder tauschen Sie sie mit Ihren Freunden aus.

locale.title: Pocket Professor : Kwik Notes, Vol. 1
locale.synopsis: Pocket Professor: KwikNotes Volume One is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Pocket Direct, L.L.C., which was released in 2006.

locale.title: Pocky & Rocky with Becky
locale.synopsis:
A portable revival of the classic Pocky & Rocky shooter games. You take control of Shinto priestess Pocky, her raccoon buddy Rocky or newcomer priestess Becky and go out in search of an evil demon that has escaped imprisonment and is wreacking havoc across the land.
Gameplay wise the game is a top-down free-scrolling shooter, in which you must navigate your characters across the maze-like stages collecting items and power-ups in order to reach the level boss and proceed to the next stage. Across the way you'll have to deal with hundreds of enemies that can be vanquished by shooting your magic cards and spells. Additionally, each character has a unique offensive ability that allows you to use pattern shots, homing shots, etc... depending on the power-ups you acquire.

Pocky & Rocky with Becky sur Gameboy Advance est un shoot'em up où le joueur incarne l'un des 3 personnages disponibles : la prêtresse Shintô Pocky, son raton laveur Rocky ou une autre prêtresse Becky qui partent à la poursuite d'un démon échappé de sa prison. Le jeu se compose d'une succession de niveaux où il faut tirer sur tout ce qui bouge en collectant divers bonus qui aideront à vaincre le classique boss.

game.name: Pokemon : Liechi Berry Glitch Fix & Shiny Zigzagoon Distribution

locale.title: Pokemon : Liechi Berry Glitch Fix & Shiny Zigzagoon Distribution
Pokémon: Emerald Version
locale.synopsis: The Hoenn region is unstable ? Rayquaza has awakened! Your skills as a Trainer will be challenged like they've never been challenged before as you try to maintain balance between Kyogre & Groudon. Prove your skill by earning Badges & gaining access to Battle Frontier ? the front line of Pokémon battling that offers a whole new level of competition. Never-before-experienced battles await you!

Pokémon edición esmeralda (Inglés Pokémon Emerald) es un juego de tercera generación, salió a la venta el primero de mayo del 2005 (en América), es la continuación de Pokémon rubí y zafiro. Pokémon Emerald tiene cosas de las ediciones rubí y zafiro como también de cosas propias, el campeón del alto mando cambia, en vez de ser Máximo es Plubio. Ahora puedes tanto capturar a Groudon (mascota rubí) como a Kyogre (mascota zafiro). Puedes luchar y atrapar a Rayquaza antes de llegar a la liga Pokémon (lo que puede resultar muy ventajoso para ganarles sin problemas). El otro cambio que es el más sobresaliente es que en Pokémon Emerald aparece la nueva Battle Fronteir (Frente de batalla), en donde tienes que derrotar a siete poderosas personas que te darán una medalla especial como premio de haber ganado. Cabe destacar que luchar ahí es verdaderamente desafiante y el nivel de dificultad no se compara a ninguna otra batalla en el juego, ni los de la liga Pokémon

locale.title: Pokémon : Version Emeraude
locale.synopsis: Pokémon Version Emeraude sur Gameboy Advance est un jeu de rôle prenant pour cadre l'univers chamarré de la célèbre série. Accompagnez un chasseur de ces étranges bestioles et tentez de récupérer un exemplaire de chaque monstre existant. S'il est possible d'en gagner via des duels contre d'autres dresseurs, il vous faudra le plus souvent passer au peigne fin les divers environnements que vous serez amené à parcourir.

locale.title: Pokémon: FireRed Version
locale.synopsis: Set off on a grand adventure to fulfil your dreams of becoming a Pokémon Master! Explore the Kanto region and discover wild Pokémon around every corner. Build your Pokémon collection and train and battle your way to success?earn your badges as you develop winning strategies to use against experienced Gym Leaders in every town. Explore every inch to uncover amazing secrets that will help you in your quest to be the very best trainer ever!

Pokémon Edición Rojo Fuego es una reedición de la primera entrega de la saga para Game Boy, en la que encarnaremos a un joven del Pueblo Paleta que sueña con convertirse en el mejor entrenador Pokémon de la historia, con un montón de numerosos nuevos Pokémon que capturar!

locale.title: Pokémon : Version Rouge Feu
locale.synopsis: Une nouvelle aventure pleine de mystères vous attend dans le jeu de rôle Pokémon Version Rouge Feu sur Gameboy Advance. ! La région de Kanto réserve bien des épreuves et seuls les vrais dresseurs de Pokémon pourront toutes les surmonter ! Attrapez et dressez un maximum de monstres de poches puis recevez la reconnaissance de la Ligue Pokémon en affrontant seul la redoutable Team Rocket.

locale.title: Pokémon : Feuerrote Edition
locale.synopsis:
Die Feuerrote Pokémon-Edition ist ein Remake für den Game Boy Advance der ursprünglichen, ersten Roten Edition auf dem Game Boy Classic.
Du tritst dein Abenteuer in der Region Kanto an. Baue mit Pokémon eine Freundschaft auf, fange von jeder Art eines und komplettiere den Pokédex. Bestreite Kämpfe gegen andere Pokémontrainer und lege Team Rocket das Handwerk. Besiege alle Arenaleiter, um von jedem einen der 8 Orden zu bekommen. Sobald du alle Orden dein Eigen nennst, kannst du die Top Vier herausfordern. Hast du die Top Vier besiegt, folgt ein ultimativer letzter Kampf gegen den Champ, der zuvor die Top Vier geschlagen hat.
Schnapp sie dir alle!

locale.title: Pokémon: Ruby Version
locale.synopsis: The race to catch 'em all is on again in Pokémon Ruby. This entry in the Pokémon series features an all-new storyline, awesome new Pokémon, and addictive RPG gameplay. One of the biggest additions to Pokémon Ruby is the two-on-two battle system, which allows you to link up with three friends to battle competitively or cooperatively. You can also showcase your Pokémon's coolness, beauty, cuteness, smartness, and toughness in Pokémon contests. With new Pokémon, two-on-two battles, and an all-new region of Hoenn to explore, Pokémon Ruby takes the Pokémon experience to the next level.

La carrera para Hacerte con todos está de nuevo en Pokemon - Versión Rubí. Esta entrada en la serie de Pokemon cuenta con una nueva historia e impresionantes nuevos Pokemons. Una de las mayores adicciones a Pokemon - Versión Rubí es el sistema de batalla de dos contra dos, que te permite conectarte con tres amigos para luchar de forma competitiva o cooperativa. También puedes mostrar la frescura, belleza, inteligencia y dureza de tus Pokemon en los concursos de Pokemon. Con Pokemon 2 Vs 2 y una región totalmente nueva de Hoenn para explorar, lleva la experiencia de Pokemon al siguiente nivel.

locale.title: Pokémon : Version Rubis
locale.synopsis: Pokémon Version Rubis est un jeu de rôle sorti sur Gameboy Advance. Dirigez un dresseur de Pokémons qui doit devenir le meilleur d'entre tous. Pour cela, capturez des créatures et faites-les évoluer pour qu'elless deviennent de plus en plus fortes afin de battre la ligue Pokémon.

locale.title: Pokémon : Rubin-Edition
locale.synopsis:
Dein Abenteuer beginnt mit deinem Umzug nach Wurzelheim, das in der Hoenn-Region liegt. Durch dein/e Nachbar/in lernst du Professor Birk kennen, von dem du deinen Pokédex und dein erstes Pokémon bekommst. Ab hier beginnt dein Pokémonabenteuer. Reise durch die Region, fange alle Pokémon um deinen Pokédex zu vervollständigen und verhindere die Machenschaften von Team Magma, deren Mitglieder du immer wieder auf deiner Reise triffst. Sobald du alle 8 Orden gewonnen hast, kannst du dich den Top-Vier und anschließend dem Champ widmen. Besiegst du die Top-Vier und den Champ, nimmst du seinen Platz ein!
Schnapp sie dir alle!

locale.title: Pokémon: Sapphire Version
locale.synopsis: The race to catch 'em all is on again in Pokémon Sapphire. This entry in the Pokémon series features an all-new storyline, awesome new Pokémon, and addictive RPG gameplay. One of the biggest additions to Pokémon Sapphire is the two-on-two battle system, which allows you to link up with three friends to battle competitively or cooperatively. You can also showcase your Pokémon's coolness, beauty, cuteness, smartness, and toughness in Pokémon contests. With new Pokémon, two-on-two battles, and an all-new region of Hoenn to explore, Pokémon Sapphire takes the Pokémon experience to the next level.

locale.title: Pokémon : Version Saphir
locale.synopsis: Pokémon Version Saphir est un jeu de rôle sorti sur Gameboy Advance. Dirigez un dresseur de Pokémons qui doit devenir le meilleur d'entre tous. Pour cela, capturez des créatures et faites-les évoluer pour qu'elless deviennent de plus en plus fortes afin de battre la ligue Pokémon.

locale.title: Pokémon : Saphir-Edition
locale.synopsis:
Dein Abenteuer beginnt mit deinem Umzug nach Wurzelheim, das in der Hoenn-Region liegt. Durch dein/e Nachbar/in lernst du Professor Birk kennen, von dem du deinen Pokédex und dein erstes Pokémon bekommst. Ab hier beginnt dein Pokémonabenteuer. Reise durch die Region, fange alle Pokémon um deinen Pokédex zu vervollständigen und verhindere die Machenschaften von Team Aqua, deren Mitglieder du immer wieder auf deiner Reise triffst. Sobald du alle 8 Orden gewonnen hast, kannst du dich den Top-Vier und anschließend dem Champ widmen. Besiegst du die Top-Vier und den Champ, nimmst du seinen Platz ein!
Schnapp sie dir alle!

locale.title: Pokémon: LeafGreen Version
locale.synopsis: Pokémon FireRed Version and LeafGreen Version are enhanced remakes of the original Pokémon Red and Blue video games, which were released in 1996. They were first released in Japan in January 2004 and released in North America and Europe in September and October respectively. Nearly two years after their original release, Nintendo re-marketed them as Player's Choice titles. The two games hold the distinction of being the first enhanced remakes of previous games within the franchise.

locale.title: Pokémon : Version Vert Feuille
locale.synopsis: Une nouvelle aventure pleine de mystères vous attend dans le jeu de rôle Pokémon Version Vert Feuille sur Gameboy Advance ! La région de Kanto réserve bien des épreuves et seuls les vrais dresseurs de Pokémon pourront toutes les surmonter ! Attrapez et dressez un maximum de monstres de poches puis recevez la reconnaissance de la Ligue Pokémon en affrontant seul la redoutable Team Rocket.

locale.title: Pokémon : Blattgruene Edition
locale.synopsis:
Pokémon Blattgrün ist ein Remake für den Game Boy Advance der ursprünglichen, ersten Blauen Edition auf dem Game Boy Classic.
Du tritst dein Abenteuer in der Region Kanto an. Baue mit Pokémon eine Freundschaft auf, fange von jeder Art eines und komplettiere den Pokédex. Bestreite Kämpfe gegen andere Pokémontrainer und lege Team Rocket das Handwerk. Besiege alle Arenaleiter, um von jedem einen der 8 Orden zu bekommen. Sobald du alle Orden dein Eigen nennst, kannst du die Top Vier herausfordern. Hast du die Top Vier besiegt, folgt ein ultimativer letzter Kampf gegen den Champ, der zuvor die Top Vier geschlagen hat.
Schnapp sie dir alle!

game.name: Pokemon Mystery Dungeon - Red Rescue Team

locale.title: Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Red Rescue Team
locale.synopsis:
Introducing the newest Pokemon, YOU!
What if you woke up one day, and you were a Pokemon? What if all of the sudden you find yourself in a NEW world, where you can speak and interact with other Pokemon? The adventure begins when you and your partner Pokemon set out on rescue missions in a world ravaged by natural disasters. But what is your true purpose and destiny in this Pokemon world? That's the real mystery....

locale.title: Pokémon Donjon Mystère : Equipe de Secours Rouge
locale.synopsis: Pokémon Donjon Mystère : Equipe de Secours Rouge sur GBA vous propose une aventure particulière puisque la cartouche vous place dans la peau d'un Pokémon ! Vous vous réveillez un matin transformé en l'une de ces créatures et découvrez un monde ravagé par des catastrophes naturelles inexplicables. Vous décidez de monter un groupe de secours avec votre équipier pour découvrir ce qui se cache derrière tout ça.

locale.title: Pokémon Fushigi no Dungeon : Aka no Kyuujotai
Pokémon Pinball: Ruby & Sapphire
locale.synopsis: PokÃ©mon Pinball: Ruby & Sapphire has all the features you'd demand of a pinball game, including bonus tables, lots of bumpers and ways to score massive points. As with your standard videogame pinball game, the left button on the D-pad and the A-button control the flippers with the R/L triggers used to shake the table. The catch here is that everything is themed in PokÃ©mon. Instead of a ball, you make use of a PokÃ©ball. Instead of standard bumpers, you're hitting the PokÃ©ball against other PokÃ©mon, and the ultimate goal is of course to "catch 'em all". The game features 200 PokÃ©mon, two main tables, and link cable support.

Pokémon Pinball : Rubis & Saphir est un jeu de flipper sur Gameboy Advance. Jouez au flipper comme d'habitude mais remplacez la bille par une Pokéball avec laquelle vous pourrez capturer les quelques 200 Pokémon qui se baladent sur les plateaux de jeu.

locale.title: Pokémon Silver Moon
locale.synopsis:
Pokémon Silver Moon est la suite des aventures de Pokémon Rubis / Saphir / Emeraude, et prend place quasi-exclusivement dans la région de Johto.
Le jeu se déroule deux ans avant les évènements de Pokémon Or / Argent / Cristal, dans un Johto alternatif, où Giovanni est encore à la tête de la Team Rocket.
Mais tout n'est pas rose dans la hiérarchie de la Team Rocket, et de nombreux imprévus viendront perturber les plans machiavéliques de cette organisation criminelle...

locale.title: Pokémon Version Éclat Pourpre
locale.synopsis:
La région est submergée par une vague de crimes. Une organisation du nom de TEAM ROCKET procède à des enlèvements de masse de Pokémon, créant une panique sans précédent.
Les forces de police mettent tous les moyens en oeuvre pour mettre fin à cette période de répression, mais l'organisation des criminels est telle que cela s'avère insuffisant. Certains dresseurs décident donc de faire face à la TEAM ROCKET par leurs propres moyens, mais sans réel succès non plus, et ce malgré la réussite de certains à contrecarrer quelques plans de l'organisation.
C'est ainsi que pour renforcer les dresseurs et pour éviter de centraliser les Pokémon dans les laboratoires ou les centres, une mesure a été mise en place, consistant à équiper tous les dresseurs jugés aptes à se battre d'un Pokémon pour se défendre.
Cela sera-t-il suffisant pour mettre fin à la période de trouble qui règne au sein de la région ?

locale.title: Polarium Advance
locale.synopsis:
Polarium Advance is basically the same as Polarium for the Nintendo DS, but a couple of new blocks have been added.
This is a puzzle game in which the player must create horizontal lines of all the same color (either black or white). To change the color (or "polarity") of a block, you must select the blocks in one line. In most puzzles, you can use the border to lengthen the line. The new blocks in the Advance version are: Hurdle Tiles, which you cannot pass, Multi-Tiles, which count as black or white, and Solid Tiles, which will not turn but are removed so that the tiles above them fall down. There are 365 puzzles in this mode (Daily Polarium) ranging from very easy to quite challenging.
The Time Attack Mode requires you to solve either ten easy puzzles or five hard puzzles within the time given. Leaving a block of the wrong color in a line results in a 30 seconds penalty.
It is possible to create your own puzzles and share them with friends. Puzzles created in the Nintendo DS version of the game are compatible with the GBA version.

Polarium sur GBA est un jeu de réflexion qui vous confronte à des grilles avec des cases blanches et noires, réparties de manière bien précise. A vous de trouver le moyen de n'avoir plus qu'une seule couleur sur le tableau, en passant d'une case à l'autre sans jamais repasser deux fois par la même case. Le mode Défi lui vous propose de tenir le plus longtemps possible selon un principe analogue avant que l'écran ne soit submergé.

locale.title: Polly Pocket ! Super Splash Island
locale.synopsis: Join Polly and her friends for a day of fun and surprises at Super Splash Island. In Polly Pocket, you can play games and go on water rides while gaining special skills. Collect power-ups and prizes to help Polly move faster, or gain skills in each race to earn tickets. Water-park activities include sliding through colored tubes, racing in bumper boats, playing minigames, and more. As you progress through each event, you'll unlock dressing rooms full of fashion surprises. Polly Pocket also features two-player modes.

Polly Pocket ! Super Splash Island est un jeu d'action sorti sur Gameboy Advance qui vous propose de vivre une journée entière de la vie de Polly. Vous pourrez ainsi jouer à l'une des six attractions disponibles, que ce soit dans le toboggan ou l'arroseur.

locale.title: Popeye : Rush for Spinach
locale.synopsis: Popeye: Rush for Spinach has Popeye throwing the gauntlet in a series of races on different vehicles, trying to defeat the fierce opposition presented by other popular characters, such as Olive Oyl, Wimpy and Brutus. The Magic Pockets-developed game features four fully playable characters, 12 races in richly detailed and interactive landscapes, 13 locomotion types for each character, and a four-player link mode with confrontation and cooperation.

Popeye : Rush for Spinach sur GBA met en scène le célèbre marin mangeur d'épinards. C'est d'ailleurs de ça qu'il s'agit dans ce jeu de courses où vous incarnez au choix Popeye, Olive, Hercule ou Wimpy. Elancez-vous pour ramasser la précieuse denrée verte, sautez pour éviter les obstacles, ramassez des bonus pour gagner du temps et arriver ainsi premier de la course.

game.name: Postman Pat And The Greendale Rocket

locale.title: Postman Pat and the Greendale Rocket
locale.synopsis:
Postman Pat and the Greendale Rocket is based on the famous TV cartoon series about happy and friendly Postman Pat and his hometown Greendale. The old Greendale train station is in bad state and its steam train, the Greendale Rocket, does not seem to be working! The inhabitants of Greendale decide to repair the station and its train. And Pat is ready to help everyone!
The game features five different levels - each of which include a separate platform phase, a mini-game and a driving phase for a total of fifteen different stages. During platform stages Postman Pat should find certain inhabitant of Greendale such as Mrs. Goggins, Charlie Pringle, reverend Timms, Dorothy and Alf Thompson. Walking and jumping, he should collect stamps, letters, and parcels.
There are places that Pat can't reach by himself. In these situations, the player will take control of Pat's black-and-white cat, Jess, who can find buttons that allow Pat to continue. Upon finishing a level, Pat will be given an object that will help the villagers get the Greendale Rocket back on the tracks.
The 5 mini-games are arcade games presented by the inhabitants of Greendale. They include sorting the objects to find six parcels, making a kite fly and collecting a certain number of letters, catching the drops, catching the butterflies as Jess the cat, and stamping parcels and letters.
In the driving phases Pat with Jess the cat should drive in Pat's van through the streets of Greendale and the surroundings and should avoid various obstacles without losing too much time.

Postman Pat sur Gameboy Advance est un petit jeu de courses inspiré d'un dessin animé venu tout droit de chez nos amis les Grands-Bretons. Vous y incarnez Pat, un postier, dont la mission est de délivrer le courrier à temps. A vous de traverser le quartier en empruntant le bon trajet et en évitant les embûches pour ne pas prendre de retard dans votre tournée !

locale.title: Power Pro Kun Pocket 3
locale.synopsis:
Power Pro Kun Pocket 3 is the third game in the long-running arcade baseball series for hand-helds and the first to appear on the Game Boy Advance. As a whole, it is part of the larger Jikkyo Powerful Pro Yakyu series also developed for the main console systems.
The game includes a Success mode, where the baseball sequences are combined with a larger storyline introducing simulation and role-playing elements. Generally, the aim is to train a weak player to become one of the best, mixed with different intrigues. In this version, the player's character was once a famous high school baseball player who got killed. A doctor resurrected him as a robot and now he needs to go to three stages to regain his status. The first phase requires the character to get drafted with a team, in the second he needs to earn money to earn a life-long battery and the third and final phase requires acquiring a memory level of more than 80%. The character can go to his former high school and duel rivals in different mini-games.
The player's character has HP, a stress bar and a memory bar, which are affected by various events. The player can do jobs to earn money and power-ups, restore health, date a girlfriend, train or mediate, suffer from illness or emotional trauma, and there is even an inventory with items and a screen with all the acquired abilities.
Other modes are Exhibition, Arrange (create custom teams), Data and different mini-games. Playing against other people using a link cable is supported. The customization options are extensive, ranging from the amount of control the computer is given (hitting, pitching, running players, switching and fielding) to the different team and player statistics. Games consists of several innings where the player takes turns hitting and pitching. Most of the traditional game rules are followed.

locale.title: Power Rangers - Dino Thunder
locale.synopsis: A Power Rangers action game based on the latest iteration of the series featuring dinosaur Zords. Whenever Dinos threaten mankind, count on the Power Rangers to be there! With more than 20 levels and loads of puzzles and action, Power Rangers: Dino Thunder will give fans of the action team plenty to shout about. Released ahead of its console cousins, Power Rangers: Dino Thunder mixes puzzles and action for a unique brand of gameplay. Use special attacks and weapon power-ups to beat the competition and collect Dino Gems to control the Dino Zords.

locale.title: Power Rangers : Dino Tonnerre
locale.synopsis: Power Rangers : Dino Tonnerre sur GBA est un jeu d'action émulant les aventures de la série télé. Le vilain docteur Mesosog a pris un malin plaisir à ramener toute l'humanité à l'ère des dinosaures. Toute, non, car un vaillant groupe de jeunes lycéens va courageusement s'en prendre à ce savant fou. Vous voilà donc à parcourir les niveaux en tatannant joyeusement les sbires du scientifique, à grands renforts de dinosaures mécaniques.

game.name: Power Rangers - La Force Du Temps

locale.title: Power Rangers - La Force du Temps
locale.synopsis: Warp through the pages of history and stop the evil baddies, or else all of time will be erased forever! The Power Rangers travel through both space and time to thwart occurrences of evil throughout history.

locale.title: Power Rangers : La Force du Temps
locale.synopsis: Power Rangers : Time Force est un jeu d'action sur Gameboy Advance. Vous traversez les sept niveaux proposés et voyagez dans diverses époques à la recherche de Ransik. Votre mission : abattre tous les ennemis qui sont sur votre passage et sauver le monde.

locale.title: Power Rangers : Ninja Storm
locale.synopsis: Evil aliens led by Lothor have attacked all the ninja academies as part of his diabolical plot to take over the earth. Only three students from the Wind Ranger ninja academy and two students from the Thunder Ranger ninja academy remain. Now these students from rival ninja academies must team up with the mysterious Green Samurai Ranger to save the world.

Power Rangers : Ninja Storm est un jeu d'action sorti sur Gameboy Advance. Incarnez l'un des six justiciers et déjouez les plans maléfiques de Lother en utilisant moult bonus et armes spéciales. Bien sûr, le jeu vous permettra aussi de vous battre à bord du Megazord.

locale.title: Power Rangers : SPD
locale.synopsis: THQ sixth game based on the Might Morphin' Power Rangers takes the team into space. POWER RANGERS: SPACE PATROL DELTA for the Game Boy Advance puts players in control of all five members of the Space Patrol Delta team as they battle the evil Emperor Gruumm and his army of robots. In the future, Earth has become home to many different alien races. While most of them are peaceful, some are not. In order to protect earth, six teens were called to form the Space Patrol Delta team. Players will control a certain ranger for each of the nine levels. While the rangers' fighting abilities are similar, each has his or her own unique power. The Red Ranger can move through objects, the Yellow Ranger can create duplicates of herself, the Green Ranger can see heat trails, the Blue Ranger can create a force field, and the Pink Ranger can replicate objects she touches. There's also a Shadow Ranger who has special abilities players will uncover as they progress through the game. Each level in this platformer has players running, jumping, and attacking enemies as they guide the chosen ranger through the many obstacles that Gruumm has created. Each of the nine levels is controlled by a boss that the Rangers must defeat to move on. After certain levels, the Rangers will summon the Megazord to do battle with giant monsters. Fans of the POWER RANGERS won't want to miss this instalment in the series. POWER RANGERS: SPACE PATROL DELTA is an out-of-this-world fighting experience.

La nouvelle unité d'élite de guerre Power Rangers : Space Patrol Delta doit combattre pour sauver le monde de l'invasion des aliens ! Incarnez les cinq Power Rangers et pilotez les fameux véhicules Space Patrol Delta ! Affrontez enfin les robots maléfiques de l'Empereur Grum grâce au pouvoir du Mégazord. Power Rangers : SPD est un jeu d'action coloré sur GBA.

locale.title: Power Rangers : Wild Force
locale.synopsis: In Power Rangers Wild Force for Game Boy Advance, young gamers will play as their favorite Power Ranger, this time armed with the strength and characteristics of the Power Animals including the Bison, Tiger, Shark, Eagle and Lion. The top-down, 3D exploration adventure allows players to take on the Org, an ancient race of villains who are out to destroy the balance of nature.

Power Rangers : Wild Force est un jeu d'action sur Gameboy Advance. Il y a plus de 12 niveaux dans lesquels vous incarnez l'un des Power Rangers pour combattre les forces démoniaques qui attaquent la terre. Le soft est jouable jusqu'à 4 joueurs via une connexion multiconsole.

locale.title: Prehistorik Man
locale.synopsis:
In Prehistorik Man, the player takes control of a neanderthal who is on a quest to travel through various levels, collecting food items to get his village ready for the fast approaching fall feast. Along the way, the player will encounter an assortment of enemies ranging from spiders, giant rats and even the mighty T-Rex.
There are five levels in all and the player can upgrade their weapons to axes and mallets throughout the game as well as acquire a hang glider, giving the player the advantage of flight and covering long distances. The main goal of the game is to vanquish enemies, collect food items, and face a boss at the end of each level.

Redevenez un homme des cavernes grâce à Prehistorik Man sur Gameboy Advance. Toute la nourriture du village a été volée durant la nuit. En tant que héros du village, Sam doit aller chercher des os pour pouvoir les échanger contre de la nourriture. Vous êtes accompagné par le chef et un guide qui vous donneront des conseils, ainsi que par le forgeron et l'inventeur du village qui vous fourniront des objets. En plus de sa massue, Sam peut pousser éliminer les dinosaures en criant.

locale.title: Premier Action Soccer
locale.synopsis:
Premier Action Soccer is a budget priced title based on the FIFA World Cup 2006 held in Germany, released on its opening day. Including all 32 teams participating in the tournament rated in four areas (defense, midfield, attack and overall) with fictional player names (although fans will quickly recognize who T. Brinks and M. Pallack from Germany, Manillas from Spain and Romualdo of Brazil are), players can take part in friendlies, play the World Cup (the real 2006 groups are included, but it's possible to randomize them) or train for penalty shootouts.
Gameplay is simple and straightforward. A and B buttons control kicking the ball (low and high, respectively), being possible to shoot at goal using either one, all depending on distance to goal. After kicking the ball, the player can add aftertouch to the ball tapping the d-pad, making it go away from the goalkeeper of from a defender. The R button allows the player to accelerate, as long as he has enough stamina, shown by white circles under his name. Several tactical options such as formation, strategy and individual orders are included.

Premier Action Soccer sur GBA est un jeu de foot basé sur la coupe du Monde tenue en Allemagne en 2006. 32 équipes sont donc en lice, les noms des joueurs sont fictifs, mais vous pourrez aisément reconnaître vos footballeurs préférés. En plus de la coupe du monde vous pouvez jouer des matches amicaux ou encore vous entraîner aux penalties.

locale.title: Premier Manager 2003-04
locale.synopsis:
Premier Manager 2003-04 is a soccer management sim, in which the player is responsible for the athletic and financial success of a soccer team.
The game features all 4 divisions and domestic cups of the English leagues, all 4 divisions, FA and league cups of the Scottish one, and the top 2 divisions and domestic cups of the French, German, Italian and Spanish leagues.
The matches are shown using a 2D engine.

Premier Manager 2003-04 est un jeu de gestion footballistique sur Gameboy Advance. Pression, grands moments, désastres... La vie d'un manager de foot n'est pas de tout repos. Alors retroussez vos manches si vous voulez que votre équipe se retrouve à la tête du classement. A votre disposition, 5 championnats européens, 300 clubs et 8000 joueurs.

locale.title: Premier Manager 2004-2005
locale.synopsis:
Premier Manager 2004 - 2005 is a soccer manager where the player is responsibly for the athletic and financial success of his team. As usual there are a lot of details to take care of, e.g. searching for sponsors, stadium expansion, player transfers, lineup and tactics. But, as usual for English soccer managers, the emphasis is on the athletic aspect.
The matches itself use an abstract presentation: The soccer field is shown in a top-down, tactical perspective and the player movements are shown with blue and red balls. It also features a new meeting system where the player needs to convince the management of his views before important decisions.

Premier Manager 2004-2005 est un jeu de gestion footballistique sur GBA. Vous choisissez vos joueurs parmi les quelques 10 000 proposés et jouez dans 14 divisions et 12 coupes différentes dans 5 pays. Une interface vous aide à prendre les décisions et à modifier rapidement les tactiques lorsque vous gérez l'entraînement, les transferts, les ego des joueurs et bien d'autres choses encore.

locale.title: Premier Manager 2005-2006
locale.synopsis:
In this portable version of Premier Manager, the player has the ability to control a team of the top two division in England, Italy, Spain, Germany or France, but many players are available from non-playable leagues.
The manager is is charge of hiring and selling players and staff, improving club property such as the stadium, club shop and medical facilities, and of course, finding the perfect tactic (seven at disposal) for the players available. The player has the option to jump one day or straight to the next event, which can be player transfer offers (or new progress on one), injuries or other club related news.

Avec Premier Manager 2005-2006 sur Gameboy Advance, vivez toutes les émotions d'un entraîneur de football. Le jeu propose de choisir parmi six championnats européens avec 294 équipes réparties dans seize divisions. Le but est simple : faire les bons choix tactiques pour mener votre équipe à la victoire.

game.name: Prince Of Persia - The Sands Of Time And Lara Croft Tomb Raider - The Prophecy

locale.title: Prince of Persia - The Sands of Time & Lara Croft

game.name: Prince Of Persia - Les Sables Du Temps

locale.title: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time
locale.synopsis: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time is a 3D platformer which focuses on acrobatics and agility. Throughout much of the game, the player must attempt to traverse the palace by running across walls, ascending or descending chasms by jumping back and forth between walls, avoiding traps, climbing structures and jumping from platform to platform, making other types of well-timed leaps, solving puzzles, and using discovered objects to progress.

Prince of Persia : Les Sables du Temps est un jeu de plates-formes/action sur Gameboy Advance. Vous incarnez à nouveau le jeune prince qui commet l'erreur d'ouvrir un sablier maléfique condamnant immédiatement les âmes des habitants du palais. Le diabolique Vizir est encore une fois derrière tout ça, et c'est en arpentant le palais secondé par Farah que le joueur devra mettre un terme à la malédiction.

game.name: Princess Natasha - Student, Secret Agent, Princess

locale.title: Princess Natasha - Student, Secret Agent, Princess
locale.synopsis: Princess Natasha: Student, Secret Agent, Princess Natasha is a Zoravian princess and the only daughter of King Carl and Queen Lena. She's also a secret agent! She's been sent to Illinois to stop her evil Uncle Lubek from stealing the Zoravian throne. She pretends to be just an ordinary exchange student and can't tell any of her friends that she's actually a princess. That would spoil the whole 'secret' agent thing-like they'd believe her anyway!

game.name: Pro Yakyuu Team O Tsukurou! Advance

locale.title: Pro Yakyuu Team o Tsukurou! Advance
Pro Yakyuu Team o Tsukurou! Advance

game.name: Pukupuku Tennen Kairanban - Koi No Cupid Daisakusen

locale.title: PukuPuku Tennen Kairanban - Koi no Cupid Daisakuse
PukuPuku Tennen Kairanban : Koi no Cupid Daisakusen

game.name: Pukupuku Tennen Kairanban - Youkoso! Illusion Land He

locale.title: PukuPuku Tennen Kairanban - Youkoso! Illusion Land
PukuPuku Tennen Kairanban : Youkoso! Illusion Land he
Punch King - Arcade Boxing
locale.synopsis: The Ring Has A New King! Climb into the squared circle and go head-to-head with the baddest bunch of boxers around. Duck, jab and clobber your way to the championship title!

locale.title: Puppy Luv : Spa and Resort
locale.synopsis: Tend to the everyday needs of your puppy and kitty guests. Rid them of those pesky fleas. Groom, bathe and feed your pet guests to keep them happy. Pamper your VIP guests to earn extra money in order to move on to bigger and better 5 star resorts!

locale.title: Puyo Pop
locale.synopsis: Help Arle and Carbuncle make their way home! Take on all of the wacky characters you meet in challenging games of Puyo Pop so you can make your way through the land and back to safety. It's a mad scramble to erase Puyo, create chain combos, and fill up your opponent's playfield in this fast-paced puzzle game.

locale.title: Puyo Pop Fever
locale.synopsis:
Accord, teacher of the local magic school, has lost her magic flying cane. There is word of an award so the students are busy searching high and low for it. Naturally our heros, Amitie and her school nemesis Raffine, make their way toward the distant dark castle. Challenging, and being challenged by, everyone you come across in a game of, Puyo Pop!
A puzzle game of the falling-block variety the goal of which is to clear your blocks (Puyos) by is the combining four or more of the same color which will vanish. This will produce Nuisance Puyos. These colorless Puyos will fall onto you opponents screen, thus blocking chains and combos they could create. These pesky Puyos can only be exterminated by removing neighboring Puyos.
When an opponent send Nuisance Puyos to you screen you can try to "offset" by clearing your own Puyos and limiting the number that would fall on your screen. This will also increase your Fever Meter. When this meter fills you will be given a set of prearranged Puyos with which you can wrack up giant combos and send tons of Nuisance Puyos to you opponent. When any players field becomes so full they can no longer drop Puyos they lose the game.
Puyo Pop Fever features a Two Player Mode. Some versions allow for more people such as the DS version which allows up to eight players to compete in free-for-all or team modes.

Puyo Pop Fever sur GBA est un puzzle game dans lequel le but est d'aligner les Puyos de la même couleur afin de les faire disparaître. Si vous réussissez à faire plusieurs lignes à la suite, vous pouvez bloquer votre adversaire qui est en train de résoudre le même casse-tête que vous. En plus du mode classique découvrez des variantes du jeu qui permettent d'appréhender le gameplay sous d'autres angles.

game.name: Pyuu To Fuku! Jaguar - Byoo To Deru! Megane-kun

locale.title: Pyuu to Fuku! Jaguar - Byoo to Deru! Megane-kun
Pyuu to Fuku! Jaguar : Byoo to Deru! Megane-kun
Quad Desert Fury
locale.synopsis: Quad Desert Fury takes games to the desert tracks aboard their ATV's. Riders compete against three other computer controlled Quads to stay on course and not wipe out while finishing with the best time.

locale.title: Qui Veut Gagner des Millions
locale.synopsis: Host Chris Tarrant poses the questions in this UK version of the hit videogame series. Features all of the classic Lifelines (50/50, Ask the Audience, Phone a Friend), multiplayer game modes, and hundreds of challenging questions.

locale.title: Qui Veut Gagner des Millions
locale.synopsis: Retrouvez sur GBA le célèbre jeu présenté par Jean-Pierre Foucault. Qui Veut Gagner des Millions ? vous place en tête-à-tête avec votre culture générale et vos (mé)connaissances. A vous d'escalader la pyramide des gains et d'utiliser vos jokers à bon escient pour décrocher le pactole. Retrouvez l'ambiance de l'émission télé avec son animateur vedette vous posant les questions qui fâchent.

game.name: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire - 2nd Edition

locale.title: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire - 2nd Edition
locale.synopsis: Host Chris Tarrant poses the questions in this UK version of the hit videogame series. This second edition features all of the classic Lifelines (50/50, Ask the Audience, Phone a Friend), multiplayer game modes, new graphics and FMV, improved loadtimes and game saves that help eliminate repeat questions, and over 1000 new questions.

locale.title: Qui Veut Gagner des Millions : 2ème Edition
locale.synopsis: Retrouvez tous les éléments de l'émission télé sur votre console portable. Jean-Pierre Foucault est toujours de la partie pour vous poser des question délicates. Heureusement, les 3 jokers sont présents pour vous aider.

locale.title: Qwak
locale.synopsis:
In this game, you play a duck and the object of the game is to get the highest score without losing all your lives. This can be achieved by getting all the fruit and gems in the level, or killing off enemies. There are 80 levels to complete and once you complete all of them, the levels are repeated.
You exit each level by collecting all the gold keys then entering through the door that opens. You have a certain amount of time to complete the level before spikes fall down the level. There are eight areas, all consisting of ten levels. At the end of each area, there is a guardian waiting for you, and again, you have a certain amount of time to defeat them.
You kill enemies by throwing orange-colored eggs at them, and in the earlier levels, they go down in one or two shots, but in later levels, you'll find out that all of them take more than two shots to bring down, so your orange balls would be useless here. The solution is to get a special power-up that will give you chocolate eggs.
Besides gold keys, you can also collect silver keys. This lets you unlock a gate, giving you access to more shots or power-ups. There are also booby traps in the level, such as spikes, and some parts of a level are blocked off by spikes. Get a mushroom and they turn into flowers that you can pick up. Beware, getting another mushroom will make them turn into spikes again.
Apart from the normal levels, there are challenges where you have to complete a level and get all the fruit as you can under a 20-second time limit. Depending on gameplay, there are also tricks where the last key you have to get flies away and you have to catch it. Other tricks include turning on the lights to see enemies, and running away from the "happy ghost". You'll receive bonus points at the end of the level if you manage to collect every gem in the level.
Qwak can be played as either a one or two player game. The game was released at budget price, and later on a CD double pack with Alien Breed '92.

locale.title: R-Type III : The Third Lightning
locale.synopsis:
R-Type III was originally released only on the Super Famicom/SNES, but later ported to the Game Boy Advance. It was the first game in the series to introduce new Forces. As well as the original Force (which was now named the Round Force, later named as the Standard Force in R-Type Delta), the player could choose from two other Forces: the Shadow Force and the Cyclone Force. These both had new, different weapon sets and special enhancements.
It also refined the weapons and charging system. It reverted to the original Red-Blue-Yellow weapon system, and the Diffusion Wave Cannon from R-Type II was replaced with a more standard wave cannon. Charging this cannon to full beam strength results in a massive, powerful beam that passes through all enemies and obstacles. A new weapon called the Hyper Wave Cannon was also added to the ship, which the player could use instead of the normal wave cannon if desired. By switching to Hyper mode and supercharging the wave cannon, the ship temporarily gains the ability to use the Hyper Wave Cannon, which is unique among wave cannons in having a rapid fire capability. The shots fired create damaging explosions, and if the player has collected one or two Bits, they spin around the ship burning with energy. However, this Hyper mode causes the ship to overheat after a short while, and it must subsequently spend seconds cooling down, during which time the wave cannon is inoperative.
The fighter in R-Type III is identified in R-Type Final as the R-9Ø Ragnarök; it was originally referred to as 'R-90'. In fact, the original R-90 has been split into three in Final: the R-9S Strike Bomber has the R-90's basic Standard force unit and first wave cannon, identified as Mega Wave Cannon. Final's version of the R-90 has the Shadow Force and Hyper Wave Cannon, but is unable to choose its Force or switch between Wave Cannons. Finally, the R-9Ø2 Ragnarok II has the R-90's final Force, the Cyclone Force, and the Giga Wave Cannon, which can be charged through 7 loops. It can be assumed that this is because the original R-90 would simply be too powerful for the game to be any kind of challenge.

R-Type III : The Third Lightening sur Gameboy advance est un shoot'em up avec une vue de côté où vous pilotez un vaisseau en environnement hostile. Repoussez l'envahisseur en vous servant de votre arsenal améliorable grâce aux objets disposés dans les niveaux, couplés aux modules de force dont vous disposez pour une puissance de feu accrue. Affrontez vos ennemis et des boss gigantesques dans des décors spatiaux en mouvement.

Eine Legende kehrt zurück... Die legendäre Serie mit der alles begann kommt auf den Gameboy Advance: R-Type III: The Third Lightning ist kurz gesagt das definitive Shoot'em up. Diese originalgetreue Umsetzung des gefeierten Super Nintendo Originals aus dem Jahre 1994 beinhaltet all die aufreibende Action und das motivierende Spielprinzip welches man als ambitionierter Spieler von einem Arcade-Titel dieser Ära erwartet. Farbenfrohe dynamische Grafiken, detaillierte Hintergründe, eine große Auswahl an abgefahrenen Power-Ups, bildschirmfüllende Endgegner und zig Angriffswellen des bösen Bydo Empires fesseln den Spieler an den Gameboy Advance. Der "Must-Have"-Titel für jeden ambitionierten Spieler und ein idealer Einstiegstitel für alle Neuling in die Welt der Shoot'em Ups.

locale.title: Racing Fever
locale.synopsis: Choose from one of 6 sexy, super-charged vehicles as you speed your way across a variety of challenging tracks in the car of your dreams!

locale.title: Racing Gears Advance
locale.synopsis:
This handheld racing game offers a range of licensed cars, several courses and circuits, and a challenging set of opponents. To these stock elements, it adds one more: weaponry. Now you can choose to nitro past the opponent ahead of you, or slow him down with a missile.
With each vehicle and driver pair you can race in Practice Mode to familiarize yourself with tracks or choose a Championship Mode to progress through a series of circuits. After each race you'll need to spend some of the money you've earned (either by placing or picking up money icons during the race) to repair and -- if possible -- upgrade your car. The upgrades can improve your car as a racing machine (e.g. a larger engine or better brakes) or as a war machine (e.g. adding more weapons bays or buying a new type of weapon).
The track design uses the isometric view, and almost never puts the car behind an obstacle. However, among the twisty roads are a few shortcuts that require you to think outside the lines of the road, and occasionally take a leap of faith.

Racing Gears Advance sur Gameboy Advance est un jeu de courses qui vous propose d'affronter vos adversaires sur plusieurs circuits avec des voitures licenciées. Pour triompher vous aurez accès à plusieurs armes telles que la nitro ou encore les missiles.

locale.title: Rampage : Puzzle Attack
locale.synopsis:
Using a similar game style to the Game Boy classic, Tetris Attack, a line of blocks sits above the play field which you can change the order of and drop two at a time onto the blocks below.
